columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the ActiveCampaignSalesman record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign associated with this salesman (references campaign entity in business context).

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier of the salesman (represents a salesperson record in HR or CRM systems).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date when this ActiveCampaignSalesman record was created.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique address identifier.

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: First address line (commonly street name and number) in original/local language.

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Second address line for additional address detail (apartment, suite, building).

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Third address line often containing city, locality and postal code in local language.

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Fourth address line typically used for country or other high-level location text.

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate for the address (numeric).

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate for the address (numeric).

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Type indicator for the geocoding model used (enumeration for internal geocode provider/type).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version string of the geocoding model that produced the geocode data.

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the address was last geocoded or looked up by the geocoding service.

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Confidence or quality score returned by the geocoding model (higher is better).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Geocoding identifier for the first street match (provider-specific ID).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Geocoding identifier for the second street match (provider-specific ID).

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Geocoding identifier for the location/locality returned by the geocode service.

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal code value returned or normalized by the geocoding model (text form).

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Foreign key to Country.ID: identifies the country for this address.

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Original query string submitted to the geocoding service (free-text address used for lookup).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Normalized street name text as returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: Street number portion returned by the geocoding model (text to allow ranges and non-numeric values).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Normalized second street or thoroughfare text from geocoding results (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: Second street number or unit number from geocoding results (text).

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Locality or city name as returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude returned by the geocoding model (stored as text in this column).

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude returned by the geocoding model (stored as text in this column).

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: Hierarchical area codes or tokens returned by geocoding (used for spatial grouping or analysis).

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Postal / ZIP code stored as numeric (integer) for easier numeric comparison and joining.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: District or administrative area name returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Smaller area or neighborhood name returned by the geocoding model (local language).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integration key into external data management or source system (integer key used for joins to DMTable).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external source table or dataset that provided this address row.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key from the external data management system (string version of a source key).

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Single-character code describing the geocode classification/type returned by the geocoder.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the Line1 value was manually overridden by a user (true/false).

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: First address line in English (translated or English-format street and number).

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Second address line in English for additional details (apartment, suite, building).

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Third address line in English often containing city/locality and postal code.

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Fourth address line in English typically used for country name.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Normalized street text in English returned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Second street text in English from the geocoding model.

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Locality/city name in English as returned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: District or administrative area in English returned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Area or neighbourhood in English returned by the geocoding model.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the Line1En value was manually overridden by a user (true/false).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: Street number in English returned by the geocoding model (text to preserve non-numeric values).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: Second street/secondary number in English returned by the geocoding model (text).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the advanced payment policy (primary key).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the advanced payment policy.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Optional longer description or notes explaining the payment policy.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy record was last modified.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the policy record.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Optional percentage value associated with the policy (stored as integer/scale). May be null when not applicable.

columns.name: Plafon
columns.description: Optional plafond / maximum amount for the policy. Currency: USD (when present).

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Structured rule expression (XAML / workflow XML) that encodes the policy conditions and logic. Useful for evaluating applicability.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the policy is currently active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: AdvanceAmountCalculator
columns.description: Optional textual/calculation expression used to compute advance amounts. Often a script or formula; may be null.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Optional fixed amount associated with the policy. Currency hint: USD. Can be null when not used.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the advanced discount policy (primary key).

columns.name: DiscountType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the discount type or category. Interpretation depends on application code (enumeration).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the discount policy.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Optional detailed description explaining the purpose and behavior of the discount policy.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag that indicates if the discount policy is active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the discount policy record was created (may be null).

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the discount policy (may be null).

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the discount policy was last modified (may be null).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or system account that last modified the discount policy (may be null).

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Optional percentage defined by the policy. Null when the policy uses fixed amounts or other rules.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Optional fixed monetary amount for the discount. Currency hint: USD. Null if not applicable.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Optional structured rule expression (XAML / workflow XML) that defines when the discount applies.

columns.name: ApplyToUnit
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the discount applies per unit (true) or to the line/transaction (false).

columns.name: Bundle1Discount
columns.description: Optional discount (percentage or code) for bundle level 1. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: Bundle2Discount
columns.description: Optional discount for bundle level 2. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: Bundle3Discount
columns.description: Optional discount for bundle level 3. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: Bundle4Discount
columns.description: Optional discount for bundle level 4. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: BundleOtherDiscount
columns.description: Optional discount for other bundle cases. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: MaxApplicableDiscount
columns.description: Maximum applicable discount percentage enforced by this policy (may be null).

columns.name: MaxSupervisorDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage a supervisor can apply under this policy (may be null).

columns.name: MaxAreaManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage an area manager can apply (may be null).

columns.name: MaxSalesManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage a sales manager can apply (may be null).

columns.name: MaxSalesmanDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage a salesperson can apply (may be null).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data-mart key used for external reporting or dimensional mapping; currently empty for all records.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external data-mart table for integration; currently null in available data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key for external reporting or mapping; currently null in available data.

columns.name: Product1Discount
columns.description: Optional product-specific discount for product slot 1. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: Product2Discount
columns.description: Optional product-specific discount for product slot 2. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: Product3Discount
columns.description: Optional product-specific discount for product slot 3. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: Product4Discount
columns.description: Optional product-specific discount for product slot 4. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: ProductOtherDiscount
columns.description: Optional product-specific discount for other product cases. Mostly null in current data.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for each advertisement deactivation reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of why an advertisement was deactivated (localized text).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary numeric identifier for the advertisement sales type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Short textual code or name describing the sales type for advertisements.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for linking to an external data model or mapping table (often null in this dataset).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data model table related to this sales type (frequently not populated).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for textual mapping to an external system or dimension (may be null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the archived number record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric code representing the archived number (human-readable code used as label).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the archived number is currently active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when this archived number record was created.

columns.name: CreateById
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the archived number; references dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: CreateByUser
columns.description: Username of the user who created the archived number (readable account name).

columns.name: AttributeId
columns.description: Identifier for the attribute grouping or type (application-defined attribute identifier).

columns.name: AttributeType
columns.description: Type code for the attribute indicating the category or data type of the attribute.

columns.name: AttributeName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the attribute (e.g., Internet_Cities).

columns.name: AttributeLanguageId
columns.description: Language identifier for the attribute name (locale code for AttributeName).

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier for a specific attribute value (unique within the attribute set).

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: The textual value associated with the attribute (human-readable value, often localized).

columns.name: AttributeValueLanguageId
columns.description: Language identifier for the attribute value (locale code for AttributeValue).

columns.name: ActiveUdacPartDefinitionCodes
columns.description: Comma-separated codes indicating active UDAC part definitions for which this attribute value applies; may be null or 'None'.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the bank (primary key).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Full bank name or description (may contain Greek or English characters). This is the human-readable label for the bank.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the bank is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geographic model to which this area mapping belongs (e.g., '3.0'). Part of the composite primary key.

columns.name: BroaderAreaID
columns.description: Alphanumeric code identifying the broader geographic area (e.g., 'A1', 'B10'). Part of the composite primary key and used for lookup.

columns.name: AreaName
columns.description: Name of the broader area in the local language (often Greek). This is the primary human-readable name for the area.

columns.name: MasterGeoAreaGroupID
columns.description: Optional foreign key referencing dbo.MasterGeoAreaGroup.ID. Links this broader area to a master geographic area group when available.

columns.name: ShortAreaName
columns.description: Optional abbreviated or short form of the area name in the local language. May be NULL if not provided.

columns.name: AreaNameEn
columns.description: Name of the broader area in English. Useful for international reporting and search.

columns.name: ShortAreaNameEn
columns.description: Optional abbreviated or short English form of the area name. May be NULL for many records.

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geographic model used for this lookup (e.g., '1.0').

columns.name: BroaderAreaID
columns.description: Unique identifier code for the broader geographic area.

columns.name: AreaName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the broader area (native language, typically Greek).

columns.name: MasterGeoAreaGroupID
columns.description: Identifier of the master geographic area group this area belongs to (nullable).

columns.name: ShortAreaName
columns.description: Short or abbreviated form of the area name (nullable).

columns.name: AreaNameEn
columns.description: Area name translated into English (nullable).

columns.name: ShortAreaNameEn
columns.description: Short / abbreviated English name for the area (nullable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate numeric identifier for the business point (primary key).

columns.name: LocationNodeID
columns.description: Reference to a location classifier node (foreign key to dbo.ClassifierNode).

columns.name: LocationAddressID
columns.description: Reference to the address record for the business location (foreign key to dbo.Address).

columns.name: ActivityClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Reference to the activity/classifier node describing the business activity (foreign key to dbo.ClassifierNode).

columns.name: SalesNodeID
columns.description: Reference to sales-related classifier node (nullable; foreign key to dbo.ClassifierNode).

columns.name: BillingAddressID
columns.description: Reference to the billing address for the business point (nullable; foreign key to dbo.Address).

columns.name: SalesContactID
columns.description: Reference to the sales contact person for this business point (nullable; foreign key to dbo.Contact).

columns.name: LegalFormID
columns.description: Identifier for the legal form of the business (nullable; foreign key to dbo.LegalForm).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Official name of the business point or branch (human-readable).

columns.name: Url
columns.description: Website URL for the business point (nullable).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the business point is currently active.

columns.name: DeactivationReason
columns.description: Text reason explaining why the business point was deactivated (nullable).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the business point record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: System user or process that created the record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent modification to the record.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User who last modified the record (nullable).

columns.name: BrandName
columns.description: Brand or trading name associated with the business point (nullable).

columns.name: TaxOfficeID
columns.description: Reference to the tax office associated with this business point (nullable; foreign key to dbo.TaxOffice).

columns.name: VatCategoryID
columns.description: Identifier for the VAT category applicable to the business point (nullable; foreign key to dbo.VatCategory).

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Business point code (often a short numeric or alphanumeric identifier used in external systems).

columns.name: Profession
columns.description: Text field describing profession or specialization for this business point (nullable).

columns.name: IsPOI
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this business point is marked as a Point Of Interest (POI).

columns.name: CustomerSourceID
columns.description: Identifier for the customer source classification (nullable; foreign key to dbo.CustomerSource).

columns.name: LastUpdateOn
columns.description: Timestamp for the last update event related to the customer/customer data (nullable).

columns.name: LastUpdateBy
columns.description: User who last performed a customer data update (nullable).

columns.name: SalesAddressID
columns.description: Reference to an alternate sales address for the business point (nullable; foreign key to dbo.Address).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data mart key used to link this business point with analytical/data-mart tables.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Identifier or name of the source table in the data mart or ETL context.

columns.name: GLSeqCodeID
columns.description: Reference to a general ledger sequence code (nullable; foreign key to dbo.GLSeqCode).

columns.name: KEPYOStatusID
columns.description: Reference to a KEPYO status classification (nullable; foreign key to dbo.KEPYOStatus).

columns.name: HasCRMTicket
columns.description: Indicates whether there is an active CRM ticket associated with the business point.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by data mart/ETL processes (nullable).

columns.name: CustomerSolvencyID
columns.description: Reference to a customer solvency or credit classification (nullable; foreign key to dbo.CustomerSolvency).

columns.name: NoTaxVat
columns.description: Flag indicating that the business point is not subject to VAT (no VAT number applies).

columns.name: SpecialInformation
columns.description: Free-text field for special notes or additional information (nullable).

columns.name: ExtraCardInformation
columns.description: Additional card-related information for the business point (nullable).

columns.name: TransferDateToEBS
columns.description: Date and time when this record was transferred to the EBS system (nullable).

columns.name: CustomerSourceModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the customer source field was last modified (nullable).

columns.name: CustomerUpdateModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when customer update metadata was last modified (nullable).

columns.name: CustomerUpdateID
columns.description: Identifier referencing the type or batch of customer update (foreign key to dbo.CustomerUpdate).

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Row version / timestamp used for concurrency control.

columns.name: HasLiveProfilePageInXOGR
columns.description: Indicates whether the business point has a live profile page in the XOGR system (nullable).

columns.name: ShowDistrictInXOGR
columns.description: Flag that indicates whether to display district information for this business point in XOGR (nullable).

columns.name: InitialCustomerSourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the initial customer source when the record was created (foreign key to dbo.CustomerSource).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the attachment record.

columns.name: CommentID
columns.description: Reference to the related BusinessPointComment (foreign key to dbo.BusinessPointComment.ID).

columns.name: Filename
columns.description: Full stored file path or location of the attachment (may include folders and file name).

columns.name: DisplayName
columns.description: User-friendly file name shown in the UI for the attachment (display label for the file).

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the attachment has been marked as deleted (soft-delete).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the business point identification record.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the primary BusinessPoint (dbo.BusinessPoint.ID) that this identification belongs to.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Registered or primary name of the business point (human-readable).

columns.name: BrandName
columns.description: Commercial or brand name used by the business point.

columns.name: TaxCode
columns.description: Business tax identifier (tax registration code). Empty values may indicate missing registration data.

columns.name: Profession
columns.description: Short description of the type of business or profession / commercial activity.

columns.name: Phone1
columns.description: Primary telephone number for the business point.

columns.name: Phone2
columns.description: Secondary telephone number for the business point (may be empty).

columns.name: Phone3
columns.description: Tertiary telephone number / alternate contact number (often blank).

columns.name: MobilePhone
columns.description: Mobile phone number associated with the business contact.

columns.name: Fax
columns.description: Fax number for the business point (legacy contact channel).

columns.name: Email1
columns.description: Primary email address for the business point (may be null).

columns.name: Email2
columns.description: Secondary email address for the business point (often empty).

columns.name: Address
columns.description: Street address or mailing address of the business point.

columns.name: City
columns.description: City or town where the business point is located.

columns.name: PostalCode
columns.description: Postal or ZIP code for the business address.

columns.name: LegalForm
columns.description: Legal entity form of the business (e.g., sole proprietorship, corporation).

columns.name: TaxOffice
columns.description: Name or code of the tax office / authority responsible for this business.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data management / integration numeric key (sparse; may be used by external systems).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-management table associated with DMKey (rarely populated).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key for external data-management linkage (not populated in sample).

columns.name: BillingEmailAddress
columns.description: Email address used for billing or invoicing communications.

columns.name: BillingTelephone
columns.description: Telephone number used for billing or invoicing contacts.

columns.name: ExtraInformation
columns.description: Free-text field with additional information or notes about the business point.

columns.name: CustomerURL
columns.description: Customer or business website URL (empty in sample).

columns.name: Heading
columns.description: Optional heading or long title for the business point (not populated in sample).

columns.name: GeographicalPositionUrl
columns.description: URL linking to a map or geographical position (e.g., Google Maps link).

columns.name: NewBusinessPointCodes
columns.description: Delimited list of new or alternate business point codes (unused in sample).

columns.name: RelatedBPComments
columns.description: References or identifiers for related business point comments (text field).

columns.name: RejectionReasonId
columns.description: Foreign key to dbo.RejectionReason.ID indicating why this identification was rejected (if applicable).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the business point listing record.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Foreign key to the BusinessPoint table (dbo.BusinessPoint.ID) identifying the business point associated with this listing.

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Foreign key to the ClassifierNode table (dbo.ClassifierNode.ID) indicating the classifier/category node assigned to the business point.

columns.name: HeadingCode
columns.description: Human-readable code representing the heading or category (e.g., 'H3677'). This is used as the primary label for listings.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the listing record was created.

columns.name: CreatedByID
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the listing. References dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: CreatedOnLogGroupID
columns.description: GUID grouping log entries for the creation event; useful for tracing related audit/log records.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the listing record was last modified (nullable if never modified).

columns.name: ModifiedByID
columns.description: Identifier of the user who last modified the listing (nullable). References dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Part of the composite primary key. Identifier of the business point to which this default value applies.

columns.name: ContentAttributeDefinitionID
columns.description: Part of the composite primary key. Identifier of the content attribute definition for which a default value is stored.

columns.name: DefaultValue
columns.description: The default value (text) for the specified content attribute at the given business point. Nullable and may be empty.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the campaign.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code used to identify or group the campaign (up to 20 chars).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable campaign name. This is the primary display label for the campaign.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer textual description of the campaign purpose or details (up to 254 chars).

columns.name: CampaignTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the campaign type (lookup). Links to dbo.CampaignType.ID.

columns.name: State
columns.description: Numeric state code representing the campaign lifecycle status (e.g., draft, active, closed).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the campaign record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User or system account that created the campaign record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent modification to the campaign record (may be empty if never modified).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User or account that last modified the campaign record (may be empty if never modified).

columns.name: StartedOn
columns.description: Actual start date of the campaign (business start date).

columns.name: StartedBy
columns.description: User who started the campaign (if applicable).

columns.name: ClosedOn
columns.description: Date when the campaign was closed/completed.

columns.name: ClosedBy
columns.description: User who closed the campaign (if applicable).

columns.name: CancelledOn
columns.description: Date when the campaign was cancelled, if applicable.

columns.name: CancelledBy
columns.description: User who cancelled the campaign (if applicable).

columns.name: PlannedStartOn
columns.description: Planned or scheduled start date for the campaign.

columns.name: PlannedCloseOn
columns.description: Planned or scheduled close date for the campaign.

columns.name: SourceCampaignID
columns.description: Reference to a source or parent campaign (self-referential FK to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SelectedAllocationPlanID
columns.description: Reference to the selected allocation plan for this campaign (links to dbo.CampaignAllocationPlan.ID).

columns.name: TargetGroupItemNumber
columns.description: Number of items in the campaign target group (business-specific count).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integration key used for data mart or external system mapping.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-mart table where related data is stored.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for data mart mapping (text-based integration key).

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Reference to a medium version record (links to dbo.MediumVersion.ID) indicating channel/media configuration.

columns.name: GeographicDestinationID
columns.description: Reference to a geographic destination or market (links to dbo.GeographicDestination.ID).

columns.name: Version
columns.description: Integer version number used for optimistic concurrency or record versioning.

columns.name: RequiresTargetingRecalculation
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the campaign's targeting needs to be recalculated.

columns.name: PercentImprovementDeterioration
columns.description: Percentage measure indicating improvement or deterioration vs. a baseline (decimal with three fractional digits).

columns.name: PrintedTarget
columns.description: Printed target value used for reporting or distribution lists (decimal value).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the allocation plan.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the campaign this allocation plan belongs to (links to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SubChannelAssigned
columns.description: Identifier or code for the sub-channel assigned in this allocation plan (business-defined numeric code).

columns.name: TargetValueAssigned
columns.description: Numeric target value assigned for this allocation plan (business metric).

columns.name: PlanType
columns.description: Numeric code describing the type of allocation plan (e.g., standard, custom).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Short descriptive name for the allocation plan (used as the primary label).

columns.name: TargetUserAssigned
columns.description: Identifier of the user assigned as the target owner in this plan (user id reference stored as integer).

columns.name: HandlerUserAssigned
columns.description: Identifier of the user assigned to handle tasks for this plan.

columns.name: SupervisorAssigned
columns.description: Identifier of the supervisor responsible for this allocation plan.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integration key used for mapping to external data marts or systems.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-mart table used for integration related to this allocation plan.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for external system mapping (text-based integration key).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the campaign assignment request reason.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code representing the reason for the campaign assignment request (short text, often numeric or short alphanumeric).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the reason for assigning or reassigning a campaign (localized text, sample values in Greek).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this reason is currently active and available for use.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign. Part of the composite primary key linking this record to a campaign.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Identifier of the business point (location, store, or business entity). Part of the composite primary key linking a campaign to a business point.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying the campaign fixed offer record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the parent campaign (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID). Identifies which campaign this fixed offer belongs to.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the fixed offer. Used as the primary label for display and search.

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the channel type (foreign key to dbo.ChannelType.ID) indicating the channel where the offer is available (e.g., web, email, retail).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key uniquely identifying the product line entry associated with a campaign fixed offer.

columns.name: CampaignFixedOfferID
columns.description: Reference to the campaign fixed offer (foreign key to dbo.CampaignFixedOffer.ID). Links this product entry to its parent offer.

columns.name: PricelistItemID
columns.description: Reference to the pricelist item (foreign key to dbo.PricelistItem.ID) representing the product or SKU included in the fixed offer.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign fixed offer product detail record.

columns.name: CampaignFixedOfferProductID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.CampaignFixedOfferProduct.ID  identifies the parent fixed offer product for this detail row.

columns.name: PriceListItemDetailID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.PricelistItemDetail.ID  links to the specific price list item detail associated with the offer.

columns.name: NumberOfOccurencies
columns.description: Count of how many times this price-list item is applied in the fixed offer (number of occurrences).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign group.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.Campaign.ID  identifies which campaign this group belongs to.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the campaign group.

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.ChannelType.ID  channel type associated with this group (e.g., email, SMS, web).

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Text expression or rule that defines which recipients/items should be included in this group.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of items or recipients explicitly included by the group rules.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Text expression or rule that defines which recipients/items should be excluded from this group.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of items or recipients explicitly excluded by the group rules.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the campaign group record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the group was last initialized or activated for processing.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the group was finalized or no longer accepting changes.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND-style inclusion expression applied together with IncludeExpression to refine included items.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND-style exclusion expression applied together with ExcludedExpression to refine exclusions.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total number of items or recipients considered in the group (after inclusion/exclusion rules applied).

columns.name: IncludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used to assign or mark included items (note: column name retains original spelling 'Assigment').

columns.name: ExcludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used to assign or mark excluded items (note: column name retains original spelling 'Assigment').

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Optional count of 'other' included items (additional included category separate from IncludedQuantity).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for a campaign record.

columns.name: Y01BeginOn
columns.description: Start date/time for the campaign's Y01 (first year) period.

columns.name: Y01EndedOn
columns.description: End date/time for the campaign's Y01 (first year) period.

columns.name: AutoRenewBeginOn
columns.description: Start date/time when automatic renewals become active for the campaign (if applicable).

columns.name: AutoRenewEndedOn
columns.description: End date/time for the automatic renewal period for the campaign (if applicable).

columns.name: IncludeRenewable
columns.description: Flag indicating whether renewable items/products should be included in this campaign.

columns.name: PreprintedPriceWithDisctount
columns.description: Flag indicating if preprinted prices should be shown with discounts applied.

columns.name: PreprintedPriceChannel
columns.description: Identifier for the channel used when determining preprinted prices (references a channel enumeration).

columns.name: SalesmenDayOffs
columns.description: Number of days off configured for sales representatives during the campaign period.

columns.name: IsCreated
columns.description: Indicator that the campaign record has been created in the system.

columns.name: IsPreprintedTGFirst
columns.description: Flag that determines whether preprinted target group (TG) processing runs before other steps.

columns.name: ActiveOnlyBPs
columns.description: When true, only active business partners (BPs) are included in campaign processing.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypes
columns.description: Comma- or delimiter-separated list of customer update types to exclude from the campaign.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerSolvencyAnalysis
columns.description: List or expression indicating which customer solvency analysis results should be excluded.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifierNodes
columns.description: Collection of classifier node identifiers (as text) to exclude specific customer segments from the campaign.

columns.name: PreprintedContractStates
columns.description: List of contract states that qualify for preprinted handling in this campaign.

columns.name: PreprintedCPStates
columns.description: Preprinted states for CP (customer-product or charge point) entities relevant to the campaign.

columns.name: IncludeZeroPrintProductPriceInPreprinted
columns.description: Flag controlling whether products with zero print price are included in preprinted outputs.

columns.name: IncludeAdvEndedDateY01inPreprinted
columns.description: Flag to include advanced 'ended' dates from Y01 period in preprinted materials.

columns.name: WorkingManDays
columns.description: Configured count of working man-days allocated to the campaign (resource planning).

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifiers
columns.description: List of customer classifier identifiers to be excluded from campaign selection logic.

columns.name: IsReadyToFinalize
columns.description: Indicator that the campaign has met prerequisites and is ready to be finalized.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp indicating when the campaign was finalized (if finalized).

columns.name: AssignmentChannelTypeFromPreviousPeriod
columns.description: Flag indicating whether assignment channel type should be inherited from the previous period.

columns.name: CampaignTypeID
columns.description: Identifier for the campaign type; part of the composite primary key and foreign key to CampaignType.ID.

columns.name: MediumTypeID
columns.description: Identifier for the medium type (e.g., channel); part of the composite primary key and foreign key to MediumType.ID.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for data-mapping integration (mostly null in current data).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external/data-mapping table associated with this mapping (often empty/null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for external data mapping or lookups (often empty/null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign new-customer target record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign this target belongs to; links the target to a campaign context.

columns.name: DailyTargetForSalesman
columns.description: Planned daily new-customer target (per salesman) expressed as a decimal value.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the customer-loss rule record.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the loss customer rule (typically includes period or campaign reference).

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign associated with this loss-customer rule (references dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Type of channel used by the rule (enumeration of channel types).

columns.name: CreatorUserID
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the rule (references dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: CreatedON
columns.description: Date and time when the rule was created.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the rule is currently active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: DialerGroupID
columns.description: Optional identifier of the dialer group associated with the rule (references dbo.DialerGroup.ID).

columns.name: CustomerRegionCount
columns.description: Number of customers determined by the region criteria for this rule.

columns.name: CustomerMainActivityCount
columns.description: Number of customers matching the main activity criteria for this rule.

columns.name: CustomerTotalCount
columns.description: Total number of customers included by this rule.

columns.name: CustomerIndicatorCount
columns.description: Count of customers matching indicator-based criteria for the rule.

columns.name: CustomerSourceCount
columns.description: Count of customers grouped by source as evaluated by this rule.

columns.name: CustomerSourceName

columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent campaign rule (dbo.CampaignNewLossCustomerRule.ID). Indicates which rule this salesman mapping belongs to.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Foreign key to the User table (dbo.User.ID) identifying the salesman assigned to the campaign rule.

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Foreign key referencing the related Campaign (dbo.Campaign.ID). Identifies which campaign this org model belongs to.

columns.name: RoleID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Role (dbo.Role.ID) that is assigned to this node in the campaign organization model.

columns.name: Level
columns.description: Numeric level or depth of this node within the organizational hierarchy of the campaign (e.g., 0 = top).

columns.name: ID

columns.name: CampaignOrgModelID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the CampaignOrgModel.ID that this person is assigned to.

columns.name: UserID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the user/person (dbo.User.ID) assigned to the campaign organization role.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Date/time when the person assignment becomes effective.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Date/time when the person assignment ends or is scheduled to end.

columns.name: IsStopped
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the assignment has been stopped/terminated (true) or is active (false).

columns.name: ID

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the parent campaign (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: RangeType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the type/category of the range (business-defined enumeration).

columns.name: RangeUpLimt
columns.description: Upper bound of the range (decimal). Note: column name has a spelling of 'UpLimt'.

columns.name: RangeDownLimit
columns.description: Lower bound of the range (decimal).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the campaign range. Used as the default label when displaying records.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used by downstream data marts or integration processes.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data mart or external table associated with this range entry.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used by data mart or external system to link this range record.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the CampaignSalesman record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the campaign this salesman is associated with (foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Identifier of the salesman/user assigned to the campaign (foreign key to dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign-salesman assignment record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key that references the campaign associated with this assignment (dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Foreign key that references the assigned salesman / user (dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: BeginDate
columns.description: Date and time when the salesman assignment for the campaign begins.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Date and time when the salesman assignment for the campaign ends (may be null when open-ended).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the new-customer-target record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referring to the campaign for which targets are defined (dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier for the customer segment or group that this target applies to.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the salesman (user) to whom the new-customer target applies (dbo.User.ID).

columns.name: DailyTarget
columns.description: Configured daily target (base/default) for new customers for this campaign/segment. Stored as decimal.

columns.name: UserDailyTarget
columns.description: Optional user-specific daily target that overrides the default DailyTarget for this salesman; may be null.

columns.name: Target
columns.description: Calculated or configured target (aggregate) for the period (e.g., campaign duration) for new customers; can be null.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the campaign sales market calendar entry; unique identifier for the row.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the Campaign (dbo.Campaign.ID) that this calendar row belongs to.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Optional reference to the Salesman / User (dbo.User.ID) assigned for this calendar date; may be null when no specific salesman is assigned.

columns.name: CalandarDate
columns.description: Date for the calendar entry (represents the market/campaign activity date). Used as the human-readable label for the calendar row.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the campaign segment.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the parent Campaign (dbo.Campaign.ID) for this segment.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-friendly name of the campaign segment.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Start date/time when the segment becomes active.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: End date/time when the segment is no longer active.

columns.name: WorkingDays
columns.description: Number of working days in the segment period.

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Filter expression or criteria that defines which records are included in this segment.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Numeric count or target quantity of included records for the segment.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Filter expression or criteria that defines which records are excluded from this segment.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Numeric count or target quantity of excluded records for the segment.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the segment record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last initialization or refresh operation for the segment; may be null if never initialized.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the segment was finalized; null while still active or draft.

columns.name: AssignmentSalesmanSupervisorFromPreviousPeriod
columns.description: Flag indicating whether assignment of salesman/supervisor should be carried over from the previous period.

columns.name: SplitSalesmanSegment
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the segment should be split across salesmen.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional inclusion expression combined with IncludeExpression using AND logic.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional exclusion expression combined with ExcludedExpression using AND logic.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total quantity target for the segment across included groups.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Status code of the segment (e.g., draft, active, finalized) represented as an integer.

columns.name: IncludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used to determine assignment inclusion rules for salesmen or resources.

columns.name: ExcludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used to determine assignment exclusion rules for salesmen or resources.

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Optional additional quantity for other included groups; may be null when not used.

columns.name: SubStatus
columns.description: Secondary status code for more granular state tracking of the segment.

columns.name: SecondIncludedQuantity
columns.description: Secondary included quantity used for multi-tier inclusion targets.

columns.name: SecondExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Secondary excluded quantity used for multi-tier exclusion targets.

columns.name: SecondExcludedExpression
columns.description: Secondary exclusion expression for additional exclusion logic.

columns.name: SecondIncludeExpression
columns.description: Secondary inclusion expression for additional inclusion logic.

columns.name: SecondTotalQuantity
columns.description: Secondary total quantity used for another target group or tier within the segment.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the campaign-segment status record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the campaign this segment status belongs to (references dbo.Campaign.ID).

columns.name: SegmentID
columns.description: Identifier for the segment within the campaign. Maps to a segment definition used by the campaign.

columns.name: SegmentStatusID
columns.description: Lookup code representing the current status of the segment in the campaign (e.g., active/inactive).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: identifier for the system-level campaign criteria configuration (typically a singleton row).

columns.name: ActiveOnlyBPs
columns.description: Flag indicating if only active business partners (BPs) should be included when evaluating campaign criteria.

columns.name: ActiveOnlyBPsIsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the ActiveOnlyBPs rule is enabled in the system criteria.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypes
columns.description: Comma-separated list (or pattern) of customer update types to exclude from campaigns. Stored as text.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypesIsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the ExcludeCustomerUpdateTypes exclusion rule is active.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerSolvencyAnalysis
columns.description: Text field defining solvency analysis results or codes that should be excluded from campaign targeting.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerSolvencyAnalysisIsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the solvency analysis exclusion rule is enabled.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifierNodes
columns.description: Text list (potentially long) of classifier node identifiers to exclude customers from campaigns.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifierNodesIsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether classifier node exclusions are applied when determining campaign recipients.

columns.name: ExcludeCustomerClassifiers
columns.description: Text list of classifier identifiers used to exclude customers from campaigns (higher-level classifiers).

columns.name: PreprintedContractStates
columns.description: List of contract states related to preprinted contract handling that affect campaign selection.

columns.name: PreprintedContractStatesIsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating if PreprintedContractStates exclusions are active.

columns.name: PreprintedCPStates
columns.description: Text field listing preprinted customer-product states that influence campaign inclusion/exclusion logic.

columns.name: PreprintedCPStatesIsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether preprinted CP state exclusions are applied.

columns.name: IncludeZeroPrintProductPriceInPreprinted
columns.description: Flag to include products with zero printed price when evaluating preprinted product rules.

columns.name: IncludeZeroPrintProductPriceInPreprintedIsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the rule to include zero-price printed products is active.

columns.name: IncludeAdvEndedDateY01inPreprinted
columns.description: Flag that controls whether advertisements ended on year 01 are included in preprinted handling.

columns.name: IncludeAdvEndedDateY01inPreprintedIsActive
columns.description: Indicates if the IncludeAdvEndedDateY01 rule is currently enabled.

columns.name: IncludeRenewable
columns.description: Flag to include renewable contracts/customers in campaign selection.

columns.name: IncludeRenewableIsActive
columns.description: Determines whether the IncludeRenewable setting is active.

columns.name: PreprintedPriceWithDisctount
columns.description: Flag indicating whether preprinted prices should be considered with discounts applied.

columns.name: PreprintedPriceWithDisctountIsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the discounted preprinted price rule is active.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate unique identifier for the campaign target group record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the campaign this target group belongs to (links to campaign entity).

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Logical or filter expression that defines which customers/entities should be included in the target group.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of records or units included by the include expression for this target group.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Logical or filter expression that defines which customers/entities should be excluded from the target group.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Number of records or units excluded by the exclusion expression for this target group.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the target group record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the target group was last initialized or processed for targeting calculations.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the target group was finalized and no further changes are expected.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total number of records or units considered in the target group (after include/exclude logic).

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND-style exclusion expression to combine with ExcludedExpression for fine-grained exclusion.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Additional AND-style inclusion expression to combine with IncludeExpression for fine-grained inclusion.

columns.name: IncludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used to assign or map included records to assignment buckets or segments.

columns.name: ExcludeAssigmentExpression
columns.description: Expression used to assign or map excluded records to assignment buckets or segments.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this campaign user-defined string record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the parent campaign (dbo.Campaign.ID). Identifies which campaign this UDF belongs to.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name of the user-defined field (UDF) or string rule for the campaign.

columns.name: ValueExpression
columns.description: Stored expression (NVARCHAR) that defines the value or rule for this UDF. May contain formula or encoded logic.

columns.name: ValueExpressionText
columns.description: Readable text version of the value expression intended for display or search (expanded or formatted expression).

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Optional expression that defines inclusion criteria for this UDF (which records are included). Can be null when not used.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Count of items or recipients included by the include expression for this UDF.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Optional expression that defines exclusion criteria for this UDF (which records are excluded). Can be null when not used.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Count of items or recipients excluded by the exclude expression for this UDF.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this UDF string record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this UDF was last initialized or (re)computed. May be null if never initialized after creation.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this UDF was finalized and no further edits are expected. Null if not finalized.

columns.name: IncludeAndExpression
columns.description: Optional additional 'AND' expression applied to the include criteria to further restrict included items.

columns.name: ExcludeAndExpression
columns.description: Optional additional 'AND' expression applied to the exclude criteria to further restrict excluded items.

columns.name: TotalQuantity
columns.description: Total count of items or recipients evaluated for this UDF (typically included + excluded + others).

columns.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
columns.description: Optional count of additional items included by other rules or sources related to this UDF. May be null when not applicable.

columns.name: ValueExpression
columns.description: Stored expression (NVARCHAR) that defines the value or rule for this UDF. May contain formula or encoded logic.

columns.name: ValueExpressionText

columns.name: IncludeExpression
columns.description: Optional expression that defines inclusion criteria for this UDF (which records are included). Can be null when not used.

columns.name: IncludedQuantity
columns.description: Count of items or recipients included by the include expression for this UDF.

columns.name: ExcludedExpression
columns.description: Optional expression that defines exclusion criteria for this UDF (which records are excluded). Can be null when not used.

columns.name: ExcludedQuantity
columns.description: Count of items or recipients excluded by the exclude expression for this UDF.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when this UDF string record was created.

columns.name: LastInitializedOn

columns.description: Country name for the address (e.g. ).

columns.name: Phone1
columns.description: Primary contact phone number for this address.

columns.name: Phone2
columns.description: Secondary or mobile contact phone number (may be null).

columns.name: Fax
columns.description: Fax number associated with the address (may be null).

columns.name: Email
columns.description: Primary contact email address for this address record (may be null).

columns.name: InvoiceEmail
columns.description: Email used for invoices/billing (may be different from primary Email and may be null).

columns.name: ContactCode
columns.description: Identifier/code for the contact or address record in the source system.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Timestamp when this buffer row was last modified. Used for change tracking.

columns.name: CategoryId
columns.description: Categorization id for the address (business-defined group). May be null.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data management/integration numeric key (currently unused in samples).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source/integration table for data management (mostly null in this buffer).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by the integration layer (mostly null in this buffer).

columns.name: BatchID
columns.description: Identifier of the ETL load batch (GUID). Null in current samples.

columns.name: ScoreId
columns.description: Identifier for an external scoring or classification applied to this address (optional).

columns.name: CustomerID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the customer in the buffer/ERP staging table.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Primary customer code used in ERP systems (short human-readable code).

columns.name: AlternativeCode
columns.description: Alternative customer code or legacy code used for mapping (may be null).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Official customer name or trading name. Chosen as the primary label for display and search.

columns.name: TaxRegistrationNumber
columns.description: Tax registration number (VAT or local tax id) for the customer.

columns.name: TaxOfficeCode
columns.description: Code of the tax office associated with the customer's tax registration.

columns.name: Occupation
columns.description: Description of the customer's occupation or business activity.

columns.name: KEPYOStatus
columns.description: KEPYO status flag (business-specific status code).

columns.name: VATStatus
columns.description: Indicator of VAT status for the customer (business-specific encoded value).

columns.name: GLSeqCode
columns.description: General ledger sequence code used for accounting mapping.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the customer is active.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Timestamp of last modification of the customer record in the buffer.

columns.name: LegalForm
columns.description: Legal form of the company (e.g. O.E., E.E., ..).

columns.name: BrandName
columns.description: Brand or commercial name under which the customer operates.

columns.name: CompanyId
columns.description: Identifier of the company (or tenant) that owns the customer record (often single value).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data management/integration numeric key for mapping (unused in provided samples).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Source/integration table name used by the data mapping process (mostly null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used by integration/data map (mostly null in this buffer).

columns.name: BatchID
columns.description: ETL load batch identifier (GUID). Null in current sample rows.

columns.name: NoTaxVat
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating the customer is marked as no-tax/VAT exempt.

columns.name: ContractID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the contract record (unique contract identifier).

columns.name: CompanyID
columns.description: Identifier for the company/tenant that owns the contract (always 1 for this dataset).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Optional free-text name or title of the contract (mostly empty in this buffer).

columns.name: RelativeContractID
columns.description: Reference to a related or parent contract, when the contract is linked to another contract.

columns.name: MainCustomerBillingID
columns.description: Identifier of the primary billing customer associated with the contract.

columns.name: MainCustomerBillingCode
columns.description: Human-readable code for the primary billing customer (text code used in billing systems).

columns.name: CustomerBillingID
columns.description: Identifier of the billing customer for this specific contract line or agreement.

columns.name: CustomerBillingCode
columns.description: Primary billing code used to identify the customer in billing systems. Chosen as the default label for the contract.

columns.name: ShippingAddressID
columns.description: Identifier for the shipping/delivery address associated with the contract, if any.

columns.name: SignedDate
columns.description: Date when the contract was signed by the parties.

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Contract effective start date (may be empty in this buffer).

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Contract expiration or end date (may be empty in this buffer).

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the marketing campaign associated with the contract, if applicable.

columns.name: SalesmanCode
columns.description: Code identifying the salesperson or account representative associated with the contract.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Contract status (business state such as active, cancelled or pending).

columns.name: SalesChannelId
columns.description: Identifier for the sales channel through which the contract was sold (e.g., retail, direct).

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Timestamp when this buffer record was initially created or loaded.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Timestamp of the last modification to the buffer record; good for incremental sync and sorting.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data management key used by downstream ETL or data merge processes (often empty in buffer).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data management table used for merges or lineage (optional).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for data merges or reconciliation (optional).

columns.name: RelatedTicket
columns.description: Identifier for a related support or service ticket, if one exists.

columns.name: TicketType
columns.description: Type or category of the related ticket (when present).

columns.name: ContractAlteredAmount
columns.description: Monetary amount representing changes/adjustments applied to the contract (currency: USD).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the contract line record (unique line identifier).

columns.name: ContractID
columns.description: Identifier of the contract to which this line belongs.

columns.name: AdvertisementID
columns.description: Identifier of the advertisement or campaign placement associated with this contract line.

columns.name: UdacID
columns.description: Identifier for the UDAC (unit/agency/cost center) associated with the line.

columns.name: MediumID
columns.description: Identifier for the advertising medium (e.g., TV, radio, print) for this line.

columns.name: ProfessionalCategory
columns.description: Descriptive professional or product category for the contract line; used as the line label.

columns.name: NetAmount
columns.description: Net monetary amount for the contract line (currency: USD).

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Start date for the service/ad delivery associated with this contract line.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: End date for the service/ad delivery for this contract line.

columns.name: PaymentChannel
columns.description: Payment channel or method used for this line (e.g., cash, credit).

columns.name: AdvancedPayment
columns.description: Amount paid in advance for this line (if any).

columns.name: FirstInvoiceDate
columns.description: Date of the first invoice generated for this contract line.

columns.name: InvoiceQuantity
columns.description: Number of invoices expected/created for this contract line.

columns.name: InstallmentsPerInvoice
columns.description: How many installments are included per invoice for this line.

columns.name: InstallmentSequence
columns.description: Sequence number of the installment for this particular record.

columns.name: BillingPhoneNumber
columns.description: Phone number associated with billing or the customer for this line.

columns.name: ParentAdvertisementID
columns.description: Identifier for the parent advertisement when this line is a sub-ad or variant.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Timestamp of the last change to this line record; used for incremental processing and sorting.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data management key for ETL merges or downstream reconciliation.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the data management table used for merges (if present).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character-based key for data management operations (optional).

columns.name: IsRenewable
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the contract line is eligible for renewal.

columns.name: UdacCode
columns.description: Short code for the UDAC unit (text code used for grouping/costing).

columns.name: Status
columns.description: Status of the contract line (e.g., active, blocked, cancelled).

columns.name: InterruptionDate
columns.description: Date when the line was interrupted or suspended, if applicable.

columns.name: AlteredAmount
columns.description: Amount representing an adjustment made to the line's price (currency: USD).

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Optional scoring metric for the line (business-specific quality or priority score).

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the salesman in the ERP bridge buffer.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code assigned to the salesman (often matches SalesmanID). Used for quick lookup and integration with upstream ERP systems.

columns.name: FullName
columns.description: Human-readable full name of the salesman (may include additional context or source tags). Best label for UI lists and search results.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether the salesman record is active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Timestamp of the last update to this record in the buffer. Useful for synchronization and auditing.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data-mart / dimensional key placeholder. Currently null for all rows in this buffer; retained for ETL mapping and legacy compatibility.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the target dimension table in the data mart (placeholder). Currently not populated in the buffer.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key for data-mart mappings (placeholder). Not populated in current sample; used by some ETL flows.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the free listing group definition.

columns.name: VersionSectionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing VersionSection.ID. Associates this free listing group with a specific version/section in the application.

columns.name: Definition
columns.description: XML payload that stores the free-listing search criteria and configuration for this group. Large structured text suitable for deserialization by the application.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Placeholder for data-mart / dimensional key. Field appears unused (null) in current samples but retained for ETL compatibility.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Placeholder for the data-mart table name associated with this record. Currently not populated in sample data.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Placeholder text key for data-mart mapping. Not populated in provided samples.

columns.name: FinalizedOn
columns.description: Date/time when this free listing group was finalized or published. Nullable if the group has not been finalized.

columns.name: FinalizedBy
columns.description: User account (username) of the person who finalized the free listing group. Nullable when not finalized.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for a Free Listing Group Item record.

columns.name: FreeListingGroupID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.FreeListingGroup.ID. Identifies the free listing group this item belongs to.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.BusinessPoint.ID. Identifies the business point (location or entity) included in the group.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional legacy Data Mart numeric key. Currently all values appear null in samples.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional legacy Data Mart table name (text). Field is nullable and not populated in current samples.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional legacy Data Mart character key. Nullable text field; not populated in samples.

columns.name: IsExcluded
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the business point is excluded from the free listing group (True/False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for a Free Listing Group Template record.

columns.name: TemplateID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.FreeListingTemplate.ID. Identifies the template definition used by this group template entry.

columns.name: MediumID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.Medium.ID. Identifies the medium (channel/platform) associated with this template entry.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.MediumVersion.ID. Identifies the specific version of the medium used for this template.

columns.name: VersionSectionID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.VersionSection.ID. Indicates the section of the medium version this template maps to.

columns.name: ClassifierNodeID
columns.description: Optional foreign key referencing dbo.ClassifierNode.ID. Used when the template is scoped to a classifier node; nullable in samples.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional legacy Data Mart numeric key for the template entry. Field is nullable and not populated in samples.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional legacy Data Mart table name (text) associated with the template entry; nullable and not populated in samples.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional legacy Data Mart character key for the template entry. Nullable text field; not populated in sample data.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key: unique identifier for the free listing template.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or short description of the template (e.g., 'FreeListing Print', 'FreeListing Internet').

columns.name: Text
columns.description: Template body stored as XML/markup. Contains the layout and field placeholders used when rendering the free listing (may include Greek text and XML tags).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for integration with a data mart or dimensional model. Often null when not mapped.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the data mart / dimension table associated with this template. Null when not integrated.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for dimensional mapping or external reference. Null when not used.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the mapping record between a free template (or udac) and a heading.

columns.name: UdacID
columns.description: Identifier of the UDAC (listing classification / unit) associated with this mapping. Used to link templates or behaviors to a specific udac value.

columns.name: HeadingCode
columns.description: Code of the heading/category that this mapping applies to (human-readable code used for matching listings to templates).

columns.name: NeedRefreshForProducts
columns.description: Flag indicating whether associated product data needs a refresh when this mapping is processed. True = refresh required; False = no refresh.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Internal unique identifier for the GBAData record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or identifier used to reference this GBAData entry (human-readable).

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Geo-spatial model query string or parameters associated with this record.

columns.name: Line1
