columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Second descriptive line for the GBAData entry; additional address or location information.

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Third descriptive line for the GBAData entry; supplementary address or descriptive information.

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Fourth descriptive line for the GBAData entry; used for extended address or notes.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the geographical definition.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the geographic area (often local language).

columns.description: Numeric key linking to a dimensional table (Data Mart). Many values are null in the sample set.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the dimensional table associated with this geographic definition. Field is largely empty in samples.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key used for linking to dimension tables (alternative to DMKey); sample values are null/absent.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code used to identify the geographic destination (alphanumeric, may contain locale-specific characters).

columns.name: Description

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the geographic destination is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Formatted General Ledger sequence or account-like code (e.g., '30.00.00.0000').

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the GL sequence code (often contains localized/Greek text); used as the primary display label.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key for referencing an external dimension or lookup (currently null for observed rows).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the GL sequence code is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ID

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short alphanumeric code assigned to the heading (localized, up to 10 characters).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description or name of the heading (localized text).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the heading reference is active (true) or inactive (false).

columns.description: Foreign key linking this reference to the master heading (dbo.MasterHeading.ID).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used by downstream data-mapping processes (often null).

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key or flag used by data-mapping logic (e.g., 'HASLOWER').

columns.description: Identifier of the source/master heading in the synonym relationship (references dbo.MasterHeading.ID).

columns.name: TargetID
columns.description: Identifier of the target/master heading that is a synonym of the source (references dbo.MasterHeading.ID).

columns.description: Optional numeric key used by data-mapping processes for this synonym relationship (commonly null).

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key or flag used by data-mapping logic for the synonym (often empty).

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Reference to the product type. Foreign key to dbo.InternalProductType.ID that classifies the product.

columns.description: Timestamp when the product record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User account or username that created the product record (system user who performed creation).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional data-migration table name indicating the source/target legacy table. Nullable.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional data-migration character key (string) for legacy mappings. Nullable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key for the internal product communication record. Unique identifier for each communication entry.

columns.name: InternalProductID
columns.description: Reference to the internal product this communication belongs to. Foreign key to dbo.InternalProduct.ID.

columns.name: CommunicationText
columns.description: Free-text communication content or notes related to the internal product (often multi-line).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for legacy/data-migration linking for the communication record. Nullable.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional table name used in legacy systems for migration reference. Nullable.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used for legacy mapping of the communication record. Nullable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key: unique identifier for each internal product document record.

columns.name: InternalProductID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the related internal product (dbo.InternalProduct.ID). Identifies which product this document belongs to.

columns.name: Filename
columns.description: Name (and path fragment) of the stored file for the document, typically including a hash and extension (e.g., .pdf, .msg). Useful for locating or downloading the document.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the document record was created in the system.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: Username of the person who uploaded or created the document record.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key for external data-management or document-management integration. Currently null for sample rows.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data-management table related to this document. Currently null for sample rows.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used by an external document-management system. Currently null for sample rows.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key: unique identifier for the internal product type.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or label identifying the product type (e.g., 'Print 1', 'WEEKLY MESSAGE'). Useful for concise displays and filtering.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-friendly description of the internal product type. This is the preferred display label for product types.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the product type is active and should be available for selection or processing.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key for external data-management integration for the product type. Sample data shows null values.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional external table name used by an integration. Typically null in current sample records.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional external character/string key used by a document or data-management system. Sample rows show null values.

columns.name: ProductTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key reference to the InternalProductType table (identifies which product type this role is associated with).

columns.description: Foreign key reference to the Role table (identifies the role assigned to the product type).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the source/destination table used in data-mapping processes (nullable, NVARCHAR(50)).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for mapping or integration purposes (nullable, NVARCHAR(50)).

columns.name: InvoicePaymentMethodID
columns.description: Identifier for the invoice payment method. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key to InvoicePaymentMethod.ID.

columns.name: SalesCollectionID
columns.description: Identifier for the sales collection. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key to SalesCollection.ID.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the invoice policy record.

columns.name: PriceFrom
columns.description: Lower bound of the price range (USD) for which this invoice policy applies. Nullable when no minimum price is specified.

columns.name: PriceTo
columns.description: Upper bound of the price range (USD) for which this invoice policy applies. Nullable when no maximum price is specified.

columns.name: PaymentMethodTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the payment method type used by this policy. Foreign key to dbo.PaymentMethodType.ID.

columns.name: NumberOfInvoices
columns.description: Number of invoices to be issued under this policy (e.g., 1 means a single invoice).

columns.name: Installments
columns.description: Number of installments allowed for payments under this invoice policy.

columns.name: Interval
columns.description: Interval between installments or invoices, measured in the system's base unit (typically days).

columns.name: StartDate
columns.description: Optional start date from which this invoice policy is active.

columns.name: EndDate
columns.description: Optional end date after which this invoice policy is no longer active.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Reference to the marketing campaign associated with this invoice policy. Foreign key to dbo.Campaign.ID. Nullable when not tied to a campaign.

columns.name: ChannelTypeID
columns.description: Reference to the channel type (e.g., online, in-store) relevant to the policy. Foreign key to dbo.ChannelType.ID. Nullable when not channel-specific.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for integration with a data mart or dimensional model. Often null when not used.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the target data mart/dimension table associated with this record. Used for ETL/replication lineage.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for integration with the data mart or dimensional model. Typically a short string identifier.

columns.name: ProductID
columns.description: Identifier of the product to which this invoice policy applies. Foreign key to dbo.Product.ID. Nullable when the policy is generic.

columns.name: MediumVersionID
columns.description: Reference to the version of the medium/channel used (e.g., ad version). Foreign key to dbo.MediumVersion.ID. Nullable when not applicable.

columns.name: MediumID
columns.description: Identifier of the medium or channel associated with the invoice policy (foreign key to dbo.Medium.ID). Nullable when not channel-specific.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the KEPYO status entry.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric status code used in the KEPYO classification system.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the KEPYO status (stored in Greek in the source). This is the preferred display label for the status.

columns.name: ID

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Human-friendly code or external identifier for the listing (string). Often shown to end users and used for lookups.

columns.name: BusinessPointID
columns.description: Foreign key to BusinessPoint.ID. Identifies the business point associated with this listing.

columns.name: MasterHeadingCode
columns.description: Master heading code (categorization code) for the listing; stored as text and represents a classification.

columns.description: Foreign key to Address.ID (locality). Identifies the geographic locality or address entry for this listing.

columns.name: SourceUdacs

display.display_name: Windows User to Application User Mapping

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for this mapping record between a Windows account and an application user.

columns.name: UserID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing dbo.User.ID  identifies the target application user that WinUserName is mapped to.

columns.name: ID

columns.description: Foreign key to dbo.MasterHeading.ID  identifies the master heading that this group record is associated with.

columns.description: Numeric group identifier or category for the master heading. Small set of possible values used to group or categorize master headings.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the section (may contain localized text).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for integration with a data-mart or external system.

columns.name: DMTable

columns.name: FillOrder

columns.name: ColumnNames

columns.name: ID

columns.name: OffSiteStart
columns.description: Start date/time for the off-site measurement period for this channel. Highly sparse (many nulls) when off-site is not applicable.

columns.name: OnSiteNetManDays
columns.description: Net man-days on-site after adjustments (e.g., leave, sickness). Sparse; useful for productivity calculations.

columns.name: OffSiteNetManDays
columns.description: Net man-days off-site after adjustments. Very sparse in this dataset.

columns.name: OnSiteIllnessRate

columns.description: Illness/sickness rate (percentage) for off-site staff. Very sparse and often null in the table.

columns.description: Indicator whether this charge-of-responsibility entry is active and should be considered in business processes.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ticket priority (surrogate integer key).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name/description of the priority (localized text).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key intended for mapping to a dimension or external reference (currently unused / null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the dimension/external table used for mapping (currently not populated).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for external/dimension mapping (text), not currently populated.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this ticket priority is active and available for selection.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ticket request reason (surrogate integer key).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description of the reason for the ticket request (localized text).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key intended for mapping to an external dimension or reference (not populated in sample data).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the dimension/external table used for mapping (not populated in sample data).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for external/dimension mapping (text), currently empty in available rows.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this request reason is active and can be selected or used.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ticket resolution method.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the resolution method (Greek text).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used for mapping to an external data model (often null in this dataset).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data model table that this resolution method maps to (commonly null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key for mapping to an external data model (textual identifier, often null).

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the resolution method is currently active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ticket result communication type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Name or description of the communication type (e.g., Email, Fax). May be empty for a default/unspecified type.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicator whether this communication type is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ticket source type (surrogate key). Example values include numeric codes used to identify how a ticket was created.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the ticket source (for example: Email, Fax, Customer Care Team). This is the primary display label for the source type.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key used to map this source type to an external data model or data mart. Many rows appear to have no mapping (null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional external table name in a data model where this source type is mapped. Often null in this data set.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used for mapping to an external system. Typically used when the external mapping key is non-numeric or descriptive.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the ticket source type is active and available for selection (True = active, False = inactive).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the ticket type (surrogate key). Used to classify tickets into types or categories.

columns.name: ParentID
columns.description: Optional reference to another ticket type that acts as this type's parent (hierarchical relationship). Null indicates a top-level type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable name or description of the ticket type. This is the primary display label for ticket classification.

columns.name: IsSerial
columns.description: Flag indicating whether handling of this ticket type should be performed in serial (one after another) rather than in parallel.

columns.name: IsParallel
columns.description: Flag indicating whether tasks for this ticket type may be executed in parallel (True) instead of strictly sequentially.

columns.name: SLA
columns.description: Service Level Agreement value associated with this ticket type. The unit is not explicit in the source and many rows are null; it commonly represents a time threshold (minutes/hours/days).

columns.name: NeedsSupervisor
columns.description: Indicates whether this ticket type requires supervisor involvement or approval as part of processing.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional numeric key for mapping this ticket type to an external data model or data mart. Most values are null in the sample data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional external table name used for mapping this ticket type to another system or data model. Often null.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character/string key used for external mappings when a non-numeric mapping key is required.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether this ticket type is actively used in the system (True = active, False = inactive).

columns.name: SecretarySupervisorByPass
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a secretary-level user can bypass supervisor routing/approval for this ticket type.

columns.name: IsEditContractType
columns.description: Indicates whether users can edit the contract type field for tickets of this type.

columns.name: IsEditAdvertisementType
columns.description: Indicates whether users can edit the advertisement type field for tickets of this type.

columns.name: WebProductType
columns.description: Optional code linking this ticket type to a web product type or category. Many rows are null; when present it likely maps to a web product enumeration.

columns.name: CanSellWebChanges
columns.description: Flag indicating whether web-related changes for this ticket type can be sold or transacted through the web channel.

columns.name: IsCampaignLeadIdEditable
columns.description: Indicates whether the campaign lead identifier field is editable for tickets of this type. Nullable in the source.

columns.name: TicketTypeID
columns.description: Identifier of the ticket type. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key referencing dbo.TicketType.ID.

columns.name: RoleID
columns.description: Identifier of the role associated with the ticket type. Part of the composite primary key and a foreign key referencing dbo.Role.ID.

columns.name: SeqNo
columns.description: Sequence number that defines the ordering of roles for a ticket type (e.g., 1, 2). Nullable.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Auxiliary integer key used for integration with a data-mart or external system. Nullable and often empty in current data.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-mart table associated with the DMKey. Used for external integrations. Nullable.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key for external/data-mart integration (text). Nullable.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the UDAC record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Short code or SKU-like identifier for the UDAC. Typically unique and used for lookup.

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name for the UDAC. Primary label for display and identification.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer descriptive text about the UDAC. Nullable.

columns.name: IsComposite
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this UDAC is composite (contains multiple parts) or not.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the UDAC record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User account or identifier of the person who created the UDAC record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Timestamp of the last modification to the UDAC record. Nullable.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User account or identifier of the person who last modified the UDAC record. Nullable.

columns.name: ProductTypeID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the product type (dbo.ProductType.ID). Nullable.

columns.name: DiscountPolicyID
columns.description: Foreign key to a UDAC discount policy (dbo.UdacDiscountPolicy.ID). Often null in current data.

columns.name: MinMembers
columns.description: Minimum number of members/items required for this UDAC. Nullable.

columns.name: MaxMembers
columns.description: Maximum number of members/items allowed for this UDAC. Nullable.

columns.name: TargetValueType
columns.description: Type code indicating the type of target value associated with this UDAC. Nullable and often empty.

columns.name: TargetValueID
columns.description: Foreign key to the target value entity (dbo.UdacPart.ID). Nullable.

columns.name: HasOptionalMembers
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the UDAC supports optional members.

columns.name: IsDependent
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the UDAC depends on other UDACs or entities.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Soft-delete flag. True when the UDAC has been marked as deleted/archived.

columns.name: UdacType
columns.description: Numeric code representing the UDAC type/category.

columns.name: NewUdacID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing another UDAC that replaces or is related to this one (dbo.Udac.ID). Nullable.

columns.name: CanvasPlanningGroupID
columns.description: Foreign key to a canvas planning group (dbo.CanvasPlanningGroup.ID). Nullable.

columns.name: OldUdacCode
columns.description: Legacy/old code value for the UDAC from a previous system. Nullable.

columns.name: Characterization
columns.description: Numeric characterization/category code used for classification of the UDAC.

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Integer key for external/data-mart integration. Nullable.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external/data-mart table for the DMKey. Nullable.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character key for external/data-mart integration. Nullable.

columns.name: LineEditorEnabled
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the line editor is enabled for this UDAC.

columns.name: MaxAllowedChanges
columns.description: Maximum number of allowed changes for the UDAC. Default often 0.

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag controlling whether validation rules are enforced for this UDAC.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag indicating whether keyphrase creation is enabled for this UDAC.

columns.name: HasPriceRanges
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the UDAC has associated price ranges.

columns.name: Category
columns.description: Integer category code for the UDAC.

columns.name: ProdWorkflowID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing a production workflow (dbo.ProductionWorkflow.ID). Nullable.

columns.name: Deadline
columns.description: Deadline value (numeric). Often used as a code or number of days. Default is 0.

columns.name: IsAddOn
columns.description: Indicator (0/1) or code indicating whether this UDAC is an add-on.

columns.name: IsBudgetAmountExcluded
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the UDAC's amount should be excluded from budget calculations.

columns.name: NewSubscriptionUdacId
columns.description: Foreign key to a UDAC used for new subscriptions (dbo.Udac.ID). Nullable.

columns.name: CanBeSubscribed
columns.description: Flag indicating whether users can subscribe to this UDAC.

columns.name: IsDirProduct
columns.description: Flag indicating whether this UDAC is a direct product.

columns.name: UdacPartDefinitionID
columns.description: Reference to the parent part definition (foreign key to dbo.UdacPartDefinition.ID).

columns.name: Name

columns.name: Type
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the attribute's data type or input control (enumeration).

columns.name: IsRequired
columns.description: Flag indicating whether a value for this attribute is required.

columns.name: DefaultValue
columns.description: Default value displayed or applied when no explicit value is provided for the attribute.

columns.name: MaxValue
columns.description: Maximum numeric value allowed for the attribute (when applicable).

columns.name: IsReadonly
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the attribute is read-only and cannot be edited by users.

columns.name: VisibilityMask
columns.description: Bitmask or code that controls where and to whom this attribute is visible (e.g., UI contexts).

columns.name: DMKey

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the external data model table associated with DMKey when attribute maps to a lookup table.

columns.description: Optional text key used to link the attribute to an external data model when the key is non-numeric.

columns.name: MaxLength
columns.description: Maximum character length allowed for text values of this attribute.

columns.name: LookupTableName
columns.description: Name of a lookup table used to populate allowed values for this attribute, if applicable.

columns.name: EnableValidationRules
columns.description: Flag indicating whether server- or client-side validation rules are applied to this attribute.

columns.name: EnableKeyphraseCreation
columns.description: Flag that controls whether keyphrase generation or suggestions are enabled for this attribute.

columns.name: LookupFiltered
columns.description: Filter expression applied when populating the lookup for this attribute (may be null).

columns.name: DDLLookupFiltered
columns.description: Filter expression specifically for dropdown/DDL lookups associated with this attribute (may be null).

columns.name: ID

columns.name: RangeUpLimit

columns.name: EnableLimit

columns.name: AttributeId

columns.name: AttributeType
columns.description: Numeric or coded value representing the attribute classification or type (e.g., lookup type).

columns.name: AttributeLanguageId
columns.description: Locale/language identifier for the attribute name (e.g., 1032). Used to indicate which language the AttributeName is provided in.

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier for a specific value of the attribute. Together with AttributeId and language fields forms a unique value entry.

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: The text/value for the attribute (often localized). This is the business value shown for a given AttributeValueId.

columns.name: AttributeValueLanguageId
columns.description: Locale/language identifier for the AttributeValue (e.g., 1032). Indicates the language of the AttributeValue text.

columns.description: Comma-separated list of active UDAC part definition codes associated with this attribute/value (may be 'None' when not applicable).

columns.name: Code

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the migration activity or step that this mapping belongs to. Links the mapping to a specific migration activity.

columns.name: OldAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the source (old) attribute value being mapped. Represents the attribute id in the legacy/source system.

columns.name: NewAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the target (new) attribute that the old attribute maps to. Represents the attribute id in the destination/target system.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the migration activity or step associated with this value mapping. May be null for default/global mappings.

columns.name: OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the source (old) attribute value that is being migrated or translated from the legacy system.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the target (new) attribute value in the destination system that corresponds to the old value.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity associated with this keyword mapping. Links the mapping to a specific activity record in the migration context.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword being mapped. Represents the original keyword reference before it is mapped to a new attribute value.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the new attribute value that the keyword maps to as part of the migration or transformation process.

columns.name: SourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the source record that will be merged. Indicates the record being consolidated into the target during migration or cleanup.

columns.name: TargetID
columns.description: Identifier of the target record that receives data from the source during a merge operation.

columns.name: Initial_OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original attribute value that is being replaced. Acts as part of the composite primary key and typically references an AttributeValue entity.

columns.name: ReplaceWithAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value that will replace the original value. Acts as part of the composite primary key and typically references an AttributeValue entity.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the original keyword that should be replaced. Part of the composite primary key and typically references a Keyword entity.

columns.name: ReplaceWithKeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword that will replace the original keyword. Part of the composite primary key and typically references a Keyword entity.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity. Part of the composite key linking an activity to an attribute value.

columns.name: AttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value associated with the activity. Part of the composite key mapping activities to attribute values.

columns.name: Activity_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the activity. Use this value to join to activity-related tables or mappings.

columns.name: NameGr
columns.description: Activity name in Greek. Stored using Greek collation; useful for localized display and lookups.

columns.name: NameEn
columns.description: Activity name in English. Preferred human-readable label for UI displays and selections.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of all payment amounts recorded in this table. Note: Amount has no nulls in the sample and appears to represent payment value in USD.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average payment amount. Useful to analyze typical payment size (USD).

measures.name: PaymentCount
measures.description: Number of payment method records (number of rows). Grain is ID so this counts payments.

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceiptCount
measures.description: Count of distinct system receipt numbers associated with the payments. SystemReceiptNumber is frequently populated and provides a useful alternate grouping for receipts.

measures.name: NonZeroPaymentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Amount > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payments with a positive Amount. Helps exclude zero-value or placeholder records.

measures.name: PolicyAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount values (USD). Note: this column is almost entirely null in the sample (high null rate) and may often be empty; include with caution.

measures.name: AverageCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Average number of credit-card installments. The sample shows this column is not populated (null_rate ~100%)  measure may be null or unavailable until data is present.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of recorded payment amounts for the payment method rows.

measures.name: AveragePaymentAmount
measures.description: Average payment amount per record.

measures.name: NumberOfPayments
measures.description: Total number of payment method records (rows) in this table.

measures.name: TotalPolicyAmount
measures.description: Sum of policy-related amounts where available. Many rows are null; treat nulls as absent values.

measures.name: AverageCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Average number of credit card installments when installment data is present.

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceipts
measures.description: Number of distinct system receipt numbers referenced (useful to detect grouping by external receipt identifiers).

measures.name: AssociationCount
measures.description: Total number of association rows in this fact (row count).

measures.name: DistinctSalesCollections
measures.description: Number of distinct SalesCollection records referenced by these associations.

measures.name: DistinctAdvancedPaymentMethods
measures.description: Number of distinct advanced payment methods referenced by these associations.

measures.name: AverageAssociationsPerSalesCollection
measures.description: Average number of advanced payment method associations per distinct SalesCollection (NULL if no SalesCollections). Useful to understand how many payment methods are linked to a typical sales collection.

recommended_explores.name: ByPaymentMethod
recommended_explores.description: Explore how many sales collections each advanced payment method is associated with.

recommended_explores.name: BySalesCollection
recommended_explores.description: Explore how many payment methods are linked to each sales collection.

measures.name: Advertisement Count
measures.description: Number of advertisement records (one row per advertisement).

measures.name: Distinct Products
measures.description: Number of distinct products referenced by the advertisements in the current context.

measures.name: Total Price
measures.description: Sum of the Price column for advertisements. Represents gross price before discounts.

measures.name: Total Discount
measures.description: Sum of explicit discounts applied to advertisements.

measures.name: Total Rules Discount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied by rules/automations for advertisements.

measures.name: Total Other Discounts
measures.description: Combined sum of PaymentDiscount, ProductDiscount and BundleDiscount (treats nulls as zero).

measures.name: Total All Discounts
measures.description: All discounts combined (explicit, rules, payment, product and bundle). Nulls are treated as zero.

measures.name: Net Amount (Price minus primary discounts)
measures.description: Net amount after primary discounts (Price less Discount and RulesDiscount).

measures.name: Net Revenue (Price minus all discounts)
measures.expression: SUM(COALESCE(Price,0) - COALESCE(Discount,0) - COALESCE(RulesDiscount,0) - COALESCE(PaymentDiscount,0) - COALESCE(ProductDiscount,0) - COALESCE(BundleDiscount,0))
measures.description: Estimated net revenue after applying all known discounts. Null discount values are treated as zero.

measures.name: Total Altered Amount
measures.description: Sum of AlteredAmount values (manually adjusted amounts), nulls treated as zero.

measures.name: Total Budget Amount
measures.description: Sum of BudgetAmount for advertisements (where provided).

measures.name: Total One-Time Amount
measures.description: Sum of one-time fees for advertisements.

measures.name: Total Extra Fee Amount
measures.description: Sum of extra fees associated with advertisements.

measures.name: Total One-Time Amount After Discount
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts after discounts have been applied (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Total Extra Fee After Discount
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after discount (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Total Extra Fee After Credit Card
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after credit card adjustments (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Total Altered PPC Amount After CC
measures.description: Sum of altered pay-per-click amounts after credit card adjustments (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Total Actual Spent Budget
measures.description: Sum of actual spent budget recorded for advertisements (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Average Price
measures.description: Average Price per advertisement.

measures.name: Average Discount Percentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Price) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(Discount) / NULLIF(SUM(Price),0)) END
measures.description: Discount as a share of Price (SUM(Discount)/SUM(Price)). Returns null if total Price is zero.

measures.name: Sum Months
measures.description: Sum of Months across advertisements (nulls treated as zero).

measures.name: Average Months
measures.description: Average Months value for advertisements (nulls ignored).

measures.name: Deactivated Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DeactivationDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements that have a DeactivationDate (i.e., were deactivated).

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of recorded batch action rows (one per history entry).

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches that have one or more actions recorded.

measures.name: RowsAffectedSum
measures.description: Total number of rows affected across all batch actions.

measures.name: RowsAffectedAvg
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per batch action.

measures.name: RowsAffectedMax
measures.description: Maximum rows affected by a single batch action.

measures.name: RowsAffectedMin
measures.description: Minimum rows affected by a single batch action.

measures.name: SuccessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batch actions that have Status = 1 (interpreted as successful).

measures.name: ErrorCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of batch actions that have Status = 0 (interpreted as not successful / error).

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of actions marked as successful (Status = 1) out of total actions.

measures.name: AverageActionsPerBatch
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) END
measures.description: Average number of actions recorded per batch.

foreign_keys.description: References the batch record that this action history row belongs to.
Lookup to the batch action type / code table (categorical).
Lookup to action status (e.g., success/failure).
Lookup to a secondary type/category classification for the action.

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of action rows in the slice (number of recorded batch actions).

measures.name: DistinctEntityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct entities affected by actions.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctActionTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct action types (values in the Type column).

measures.name: PercentActionsWithEntityData
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(1)=0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(1) END
measures.description: Share of actions that include non-null EntityData.

measures.name: AverageActionsPerBatch
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(1) / COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) END
measures.description: Average number of actions per batch in the result set.

foreign_keys.note: Likely reference to a Batch dimension (in source metadata no FK declared).
Probable reference to an Entity dimension containing entity attributes.
EntityType appears to be a small lookup; treat as a dimension if available.
Type appears to be an action type code; link to an ActionType dimension if present.

measures.name: DepositCount
measures.description: Number of deposit detail records (one per ID). Use this as the primary event count for the table.

measures.name: DistinctBankDepositNumbers
measures.description: Count of distinct bank deposit numbers contained in the selection. Useful to identify aggregated deposits spanning multiple detail rows.

measures.name: FirstDepositDate
measures.description: Earliest deposit timestamp in the current filter context.

measures.name: LastDepositDate
measures.description: Latest deposit timestamp in the current filter context.

measures.name: AverageDaysSinceDeposit
measures.description: Average age in days of the deposits relative to the current time. Null-safe when BankDepositDate is present for rows.

foreign_keys.description: Reference to the Bank dimension (dbo.Bank.ID). Use to join bank attributes such as name, branch, and country.
Surrogate/technical key that links this deposit detail row to the SalesCollection record (one-to-one or one-to-many depending on source design).

measures.name: CommentCount
measures.description: Total number of comment records.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointsCommented
measures.description: Number of distinct business points that have at least one comment.

measures.name: DistinctUsersCommenting
measures.description: Number of distinct users who authored comments.

measures.name: TotalCommentCharacters
measures.description: Sum of characters across all comment text values.

measures.name: AverageCommentLength
measures.description: Average length of comment text in characters.

measures.name: FirstCommentDate
measures.description: Earliest comment timestamp in the selected context.

measures.name: LastCommentDate
measures.description: Most recent comment timestamp in the selected context.

measures.name: CommentType_0_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CommentType = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of comments of type 0 (only type observed in sample). Useful if additional types are added later.

measures.name: CommentsWithTextCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(CommentText, '')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of comments that contain non-empty text.

measures.name: TotalConfirmations
measures.description: Total number of confirmation/history events (one row per event).

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPointsConfirmed
measures.description: Number of distinct business points that have at least one confirmation event.

measures.name: ConfirmationsWithTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of confirmation events that are associated with a Task (TaskID is not null).

measures.name: ConfirmationsWithTaskPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of confirmation events that are associated with a Task. NULL if there are no events.

measures.name: ThirdPartyDataSourceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsThirdPartyDataSource = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events that originated from a third-party data source (IsThirdPartyDataSource = true).

measures.name: ActionType_0_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionType = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where ActionType = 0. ActionType is a coded value  join to an ActionType dimension (if available) to get labels.

measures.name: ActionType_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where ActionType = 1. ActionType is a coded value  join to an ActionType dimension (if available) to get labels.

measures.name: ActionType_Other_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionType NOT IN (0,1) OR ActionType IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events with ActionType values other than 0 or 1 (or null). Useful to capture unexpected/other action codes.

measures.name: SourceType_0_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SourceType = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where SourceType = 0. SourceType is a coded value  join to a SourceType dimension to get labels if available.

measures.name: SourceType_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SourceType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where SourceType = 1. SourceType is a coded value  join to a SourceType dimension to get labels if available.

measures.name: SourceType_Other_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SourceType NOT IN (0,1) OR SourceType IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events with SourceType values other than 0 or 1 (or null). Useful to capture unexpected/other source codes.

measures.name: EarliestConfirmationTime
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest confirmation event in the aggregation window.

measures.name: LatestConfirmationTime
measures.description: Timestamp of the latest confirmation event in the aggregation window.

measures.name: AvgConfirmationsPerDay
measures.description: Average number of confirmation events per day over the date range of the aggregation. Uses DATEDIFF(day, MIN(TimeStamp), MAX(TimeStamp)) + 1 to include both endpoints; returns NULL when no events.

display.notes: ActionType and SourceType are coded integers  for readable labels join to corresponding dimension/lookup tables. Default filter excludes third-party-sourced events; remove if third-party data should be included.

measures.name: AttributeValueCount
measures.description: Total number of custom attribute value records (rows).

measures.name: DistinctAttributeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct custom attributes present in the table.

measures.name: DistinctListingCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business point listings that have at least one custom attribute value.

measures.name: DraftValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DraftValue IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(DraftValue)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where a DraftValue is present (non-null and not empty).

measures.name: DraftInitializedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDraftInit = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the draft initialization flag (IsDraftInit) is true.

measures.name: NumericValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TRY_CAST(Value AS FLOAT) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where Value can be parsed as a single numeric value. Values that are comma-delimited lists will generally not be counted.

measures.name: NumericValueSum
measures.description: Sum of Value parsed as numeric where parsing succeeds. Non-numeric or list values are ignored (NULL in TRY_CAST).

measures.name: NumericValueAvg
measures.description: Average of Value parsed as numeric where parsing succeeds.

measures.name: EstimatedListElements
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NULL OR LTRIM(RTRIM(Value)) = '' THEN 0 ELSE LEN(Value) - LEN(REPLACE(Value, ',', '')) + 1 END)
measures.description: Estimated total number of items across all Value fields when Value is treated as a comma-separated list. This is an approximation and counts 1 for empty/non-comma single values.

measures.name: PercentRowsWithDraft
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN DraftValue IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(DraftValue)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of rows that have a DraftValue present.

foreign_keys.description: Provided foreign key linking the attribute value to the business point listing.
Inferred reference: AttributeID is likely a foreign key to a custom attribute dimension table. Confirm with source model.

default_filters.description: By default exclude draft-initialized rows to focus on published/active values.

notes: Value is stored as NVARCHAR and may contain comma-separated lists or non-numeric content. Numeric measures (NumericValueSum/Avg/Count) use TRY_CAST and only include rows where Value can be parsed as a single numeric.
EstimatedListElements provides a heuristic count of items when Value is a comma-delimited list; consider normalizing list values into a child table for accurate element-level analysis.
