measures.description: Average strike rate (operational) for the channel (fraction 0-1).

measures.name: Average Strike Rate (Lapsed)
measures.description: Average strike rate for lapsed category (fraction 0-1).

measures.name: Average Strike Rate (NP)
measures.description: Average strike rate for NP category (fraction 0-1).

measures.name: Average ClossAvg
measures.description: Average of ClossAvg field (precomputed average loss metric stored per row).

measures.name: Average DecrAvg
measures.description: Average of DecrAvg (precomputed decrease average per row).

measures.name: Average IncrAvg
measures.description: Average of IncrAvg (precomputed increase average per row).

measures.name: Average ULossAvg
measures.description: Average of ULossAvg (precomputed uninsured loss average per row).

measures.name: Average New Amount (NewAvg)
measures.description: Average new amount/value per channel row (NewAvg). Currency not captured.

measures.name: Sum AVO NP (amount)
measures.description: Sum of AVONP values (interpreted as amount/value).

measures.name: Sum AVO Lapsed (amount)
measures.description: Sum of AVOLapsed values (interpreted as amount/value).

display.notes: Many columns are stored as decimals in fraction form (0-1) and are exposed as percentage measures (formatted). Several GroupValues* columns are likely monetary or value metrics but the table does not include a currency code; they are therefore exposed as 'amount' with number(2) formatting. If a currency is available upstream, set the currency code on the corresponding measures.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in this fact - one row per CampaignAllocationPlan user entry.

measures.name: DistinctUsers
measures.description: Count of unique users represented in the selection.

measures.name: TotalClosesOp
measures.description: Sum of ClosesOp values across rows. Interpreted as the aggregate 'ClosesOp' metric (raw numeric total).

measures.name: TotalGroupValuesNew
measures.description: Sum of GroupValuesNew across rows. 'GroupValues*' columns appear to be aggregate value metrics (e.g., monetary or value-of-group)  treat as numeric totals unless a currency is known.

measures.name: TotalGroupValuesCO
measures.description: Sum of GroupValuesCO across rows (group-level value measure).

measures.name: TotalGroupValuesRoCO
measures.description: Sum of GroupValuesRoCO across rows (group-level value measure).

measures.name: TotalGroupValuesCI
measures.description: Sum of GroupValuesCI across rows (group-level value measure).

measures.name: Avg_ULoss
measures.description: Average user loss rate across rows (assumes column is a proportion between 0 and 1). Use AVG when you want the mean rate per row/user.

measures.name: Avg_Closs
measures.description: Average close loss rate across rows (assumes column is a proportion between 0 and 1).

measures.name: Avg_Decr
measures.description: Average decrease rate across rows (assumes column is a proportion between 0 and 1).

measures.name: Avg_Incr
measures.description: Average increase rate across rows (assumes column is a proportion between 0 and 1).

measures.name: Avg_ClossAvg
measures.description: Average of the ClossAvg column. This is a pre-computed per-row average; AVG here gives the mean of those values across the selected rows.

measures.name: Avg_IncrAvg
measures.description: Average of the IncrAvg column (assumed proportion).

measures.name: Avg_DecrAvg
measures.description: Average of the DecrAvg column (assumed proportion).

measures.name: Total_GroupNew
measures.description: Sum of GroupNew across rows (group-level count/aggregate).

measures.name: Total_GroupCO
measures.description: Sum of GroupCO across rows (group-level count/aggregate).

measures.name: Total_GroupRoCO
measures.description: Sum of GroupRoCO across rows (group-level count/aggregate).

measures.name: Total_GroupProspect
measures.description: Sum of GroupProspect across rows (group-level prospect counts/aggregates).

measures.name: Total_ClosesLapsed
measures.description: Aggregate of ClosesLapsed; column appears fractional in sample data and may represent either a count fraction or a rate. Treated as a numeric total unless business semantics indicate otherwise.

measures.name: Avg_StrikeOp
measures.description: Average of StrikeOp values. StrikeOp values show mixed scale in samples (small decimals and integer 10)  use AVG for a simple mean; if this represents a rate, consider using percentage formatting after validation.

measures.name: Total_NewAvg
measures.description: Sum of NewAvg values across rows. NewAvg appears as a per-row average (large numeric), so SUM gives the aggregate of those values across the selection.

display.notes: Many columns appear to be rates (values between 0 and 1) and many are group aggregates ('GroupValues*'). The precise interpretation (rate vs absolute vs currency) should be validated with business owners. Where a column is assumed to be a rate, an AVG aggregation is provided; where a column is an aggregate or count, SUM is provided. If any 'GroupValues*' columns are actually monetary, update the unit to 'currency' and set the appropriate currency code.

measures.name: DetailRowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (assignment detail records) in the table.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Business Points (BPID) referenced by these assignment detail records.

measures.name: DistinctRequestCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Campaign Assignment Requests referenced by these detail records.

measures.name: AverageAssignmentsPerRequest
measures.description: Average number of assignment detail rows per distinct RequestID. NULL when there are no requests.

measures.name: DistinctBPShareOfRows
measures.description: Share of rows that represent distinct Business Points (distinct BPID divided by total rows). Useful to understand row-to-BP uniqueness.

measures.name: Request Count
measures.description: Total number of campaign assignment request rows.

measures.name: Open Requests
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that are not closed (ClosedOn IS NULL).

measures.name: Closed Requests
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that have been closed (ClosedOn IS NOT NULL).

measures.name: Closed Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of requests that have been closed (Closed Requests / Request Count).

measures.name: Average Time to Close (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(SECOND, CreatedOn, ClosedOn) / 86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time between CreatedOn and ClosedOn for closed requests, expressed in days (fractional).

measures.name: Distinct Requested Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen who were requested across these requests.

measures.name: Requests With Performer Assigned
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PerformerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests where a performer (the user assigned to perform the request) has been set.

measures.name: Requests With Type Specified
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RequestType IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of requests that have a RequestType value (non-null). Useful to track coverage of type classification.

measures.name: AssignmentRows
measures.description: Total number of assignment detail rows (rows in this table)

measures.name: ChangedAssignments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL OR NewSegmentID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of assignments where either a new salesman or a new segment has been provided (i.e., this row represents a change)

measures.name: PercentChanged
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL OR NewSegmentID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of assignment rows that include a change (new salesman or new segment)

measures.name: DistinctBucketCount
measures.description: Number of distinct buckets referenced by the selected rows

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns referenced by the selected rows

measures.name: DistinctOldSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct old salesmen in the selected rows

measures.name: DistinctNewSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct new salesmen in the selected rows (nulls excluded)

default_filters.expression: NewSalesmanID IS NOT NULL OR NewSegmentID IS NOT NULL
default_filters.description: Show only rows that include a change (new salesman or new segment)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (buckets) in the table

measures.name: TotalAmountSum
measures.description: Total allocated amount for the bucket (sum of TotalAmount)

measures.name: XOgrAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of XOGRAmount (XO.gr / external channel spend) across buckets

measures.name: WebSiteAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of WebSiteAmount (website spend) across buckets

measures.name: PPCAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of PPCAmount (pay-per-click spend) across buckets

measures.name: PrintAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of PrintAmount (print media spend) across buckets

measures.name: TargetingAmountCalculatedSum
measures.description: Sum of system-calculated targeting amount for buckets

measures.name: TargetingAmountByUserSum
measures.description: Sum of user-provided targeting amounts (when present)

measures.name: AvgTargetingAmountCalculated
measures.description: Average of the calculated targeting amount per bucket

measures.name: AvgScoreTotal
measures.description: Average total score (ScoreTotal) assigned to buckets

measures.name: MaxScoreTotal
measures.description: Maximum total score (ScoreTotal) observed in the dataset

measures.name: AvgScoreDifferenceToAvg
measures.description: Average difference of bucket score to campaign average (ScoreDifferenceToAvg)

measures.name: ActiveItemsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ItemStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of buckets where ItemStatus = 1 (active)

measures.name: WorkingItemsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN WorkingStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of buckets where WorkingStatus = 1 (working)

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the selected set of buckets

measures.name: TotalUploads
measures.description: Total number of file upload records (rows) in the current query context.

measures.name: DistinctFileNames
measures.description: Number of distinct file names uploaded.

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns that have at least one file upload.

measures.name: DistinctUploadingUsers
measures.description: Number of distinct users who performed uploads (CreatedByUserID).

measures.name: FirstUploadTimestamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest file upload in the current query context.

measures.name: LastUploadTimestamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the most recent file upload in the current query context.

measures.name: AverageUploadsPerCampaign
measures.description: Average number of uploads per campaign (total uploads divided by number of campaigns). NULL if there are no campaigns in context.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the fact; useful for row-level counting and completeness checks.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of reported total amounts for the campaign bucket row. Includes all amount components recorded in this row.

measures.name: PrintAmount
measures.description: Sum of amounts attributed to print media for the row. Many rows are null; nulls are ignored by the SUM.

measures.name: PPCAmount
measures.description: Sum of pay-per-click (PPC) amounts for the row. Often null for non-paid-search rows.

measures.name: XOGRAmount
measures.description: Sum of XOGR amount component. Frequently populated and a major contributor to TotalAmount.

measures.name: WebSiteAmount
measures.description: Sum of website-related amounts for the row.

measures.name: AvgTotalAmountPerRow
measures.description: Average TotalAmount per row (ignores rows with NULL TotalAmount).

measures.name: TotalAmountShareWithinFile
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalAmount) OVER (PARTITION BY FileID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalAmount) / SUM(TotalAmount) OVER (PARTITION BY FileID) END
measures.description: Row-level contribution of TotalAmount as a share of the TotalAmount for the same FileID (file upload). Returns NULL when the file total is zero.

measures.name: UploadCount
measures.description: Total number of file upload records in the current aggregation context.

measures.name: DistinctFileNameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct file names uploaded for the current aggregation context.

measures.name: FirstUploadOn
measures.description: Earliest upload timestamp in the aggregation context.

measures.name: LastUploadOn
measures.description: Most recent upload timestamp in the aggregation context.

measures.name: ActiveDays
measures.description: Number of days between the first and last upload in the aggregation context. Returns 0 when first and last are the same day.

measures.name: AverageUploadsPerActiveDay
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CAST(CreatedOn AS DATE)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(COUNT(ID) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(DISTINCT CAST(CreatedOn AS DATE)) END
measures.description: Average number of uploads per day across days that had at least one upload in the aggregation context.

measures.name: Rows
measures.description: Number of rows (configurations) in the selected scope (useful for summarizing row-level counts).

measures.name: Included Quantity
measures.description: Total number of included entities (sum of IncludedQuantity) for the campaign-channel configurations.

measures.name: Excluded Quantity
measures.description: Total number of excluded entities (sum of ExcludedQuantity) for the campaign-channel configurations.

measures.name: Total Quantity
measures.description: Total quantity (sum of TotalQuantity) representing the overall set considered for the configuration.

measures.name: Included Others Quantity
measures.description: Sum of IncludedOthersQuantity  additional included counts that are tracked separately (nullable at source).

measures.name: Average Included per Configuration
measures.description: Average number of included entities per campaign-channel configuration (uses AVG over IncludedQuantity).

measures.name: Inclusion Rate
measures.description: Portion of the total that is included: SUM(IncludedQuantity) / SUM(TotalQuantity). Returns NULL when TotalQuantity is zero.

measures.name: Exclusion Rate
measures.description: Portion of the total that is excluded: SUM(ExcludedQuantity) / SUM(TotalQuantity). Returns NULL when TotalQuantity is zero.

display.notes: When exploring counts/rates, break down by CampaignID and ChannelTypeID; use CreatedOn or FinalizedOn to scope by time.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of mapping rows (campaign  business point  contract  contract product  advertisement).

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the selected set.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points associated with campaigns.

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts referenced.

measures.name: DistinctContractProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct contract products referenced.

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisements
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements referenced.

measures.name: RepeatCampaignCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PreviousCampaignID IS NOT NULL AND PreviousCampaignID <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that reference a previous campaign (indicates this mapping is part of a repeated or follow-on campaign).

measures.name: RepeatCampaignRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PreviousCampaignID IS NOT NULL AND PreviousCampaignID <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of rows that reference a previous campaign (RepeatCampaignCount / RecordCount).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of assignment rows. When grouped at the grain (CampaignID, BusinessPointID, SalesManCode) this will be 1; when aggregated it shows total assignments.

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points involved in the selected scope (e.g., per campaign). Useful to measure campaign coverage across locations.

measures.name: UniqueSalesPeople
measures.description: Number of distinct salespeople associated with the selected scope/campaign.

measures.name: UniqueSupervisors
measures.description: Number of distinct supervisors for the selected scope. Useful to understand supervisory span across campaign assignments.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignDescriptions
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign descriptions observed in the selected scope. Can surface inconsistent/multiple descriptions for a campaign ID.

display.notes: Because this table is factless (no monetary measures), key analytics are counts and distinct counts by campaign, business point, salesperson and supervisor. Use the distinct-count measures when rolling up by campaign or channel.

measures.name: AlterRecords
measures.description: Total number of alter records (rows) in this fact  i.e., the number of business-point alterations captured.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of unique business points affected by alters in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctOffers
measures.description: Number of unique alter offers referenced in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct sales people (SalesManCode) associated with the alter records.

measures.name: RecordsWithSupervisor
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Supervisor IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of alter records where a Supervisor value is present.

measures.name: AvgBusinessPointsPerOffer
measures.expression: CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID) AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT AlterOfferID), 0)
measures.description: Average number of distinct business points per distinct alter offer (NULL when there are no offers in the scope).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of campaign candidate records (row count).

measures.name: RequestedSuspendCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToSuspend = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records where a suspend was requested.

measures.name: RequestedResumeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToResume = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records where a resume was requested.

measures.name: SuspendedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSuspended = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records currently marked as suspended.

measures.name: NewRecordCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsNewRecord = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records flagged as new.

measures.name: BatchedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BatchID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records assigned to a batch (BatchID is not null).

measures.name: DialerActionNonNullCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DialerAction IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records with a dialer action code present.

measures.name: DialerActionDistinctCount
measures.description: Number of distinct dialer action codes observed.

measures.name: ActionResultNoneCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionResult = 'None' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records where ActionResult explicitly equals 'None'.

measures.name: SuspensionRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSuspended = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of records that are suspended (SuspendedCount / RecordCount).

measures.name: RequestedSuspendRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRequestedToSuspend = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of records with a suspend request (RequestedSuspendCount / RecordCount).

measures.name: DialerActionCoverage
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DialerAction IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of records that include a dialer action code.

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Number of campaign customer item records (at the row grain)

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the selected rows

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Count of rows that have an action recorded (non-null Action)

measures.name: DistinctActionSalesmanCount
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen who performed actions

measures.name: LastActionDateTime
measures.description: Most recent action timestamp for the selected rows

measures.name: Assignments
measures.description: Total number of assignment rows (one row per BusinessPoint -> Salesman association).

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (BusinessPoints) referenced in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen assigned customers in the result set.

measures.name: AverageCustomersPerSalesman
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT SalesmanID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT SalesmanID) END
measures.description: Average number of distinct customers (BusinessPoints) assigned to each distinct salesman.

measures.name: DistinctCustomersPerAssignmentRatio
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Ratio of distinct customers to total assignment rows. Value <1 indicates duplicate BusinessPoint assignments (same customer appears in multiple rows).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in this temporary selection. Each row represents one business point targeted by a rule.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of business point references (may equal RowCount if BusinessPointID is always populated).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Count of unique business points present in the selection.

measures.name: DistinctRuleCount
measures.description: Count of distinct campaign rules represented in this dataset.

measures.name: BusinessPointsPerRule_Avg
measures.description: Average number of business points targeted per rule (total business point rows divided by number of distinct rules).

foreign_keys.description: References the campaign rule that produced this selection. Replace with actual campaign/rule dimension if different in your model.
References the business point (customer location/account) dimension.

display.notes: Common default view is counts by RuleID. This table is temporary and often refreshed; prefer joins to stable campaign and business point dimensions for long-running analyses.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of log events (rows) in the table.

measures.name: DistinctUsers
measures.description: Number of distinct users that were the subject of the logged action.

measures.name: DistinctPerformers
measures.description: Number of distinct performers (actors) who performed actions recorded in this log.

measures.name: DistinctActions
measures.description: Number of distinct action codes observed in the sample/time range.

measures.name: ActionCode_2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where Action = 2. (Example: commonly-observed action code in sample data.)

measures.name: ActionCode_3_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where Action = 3. (Example: commonly-observed action code in sample data.)

measures.name: TotalActiveDays
measures.description: Sum of the interval (in days) between StartDate and EndDate across all records. Use with care if EndDate < StartDate or if time components matter.

measures.name: AvgActiveDaysPerRecord
measures.description: Average number of days between StartDate and EndDate per record.

foreign_keys.note: Provided in source metadata
Inferred from naming: user that is the subject of the action
Inferred from naming (may be null); represents parent/manager user
Inferred from naming; link to campaign dimension
Inferred from naming; organizational model identifier
Inferred from naming; parent organization model identifier

display.notes: Common analysis use-cases: trend of events over PerformedOn, distribution by Action, and counts by CampaignId / Performer. Action codes are integer enumerations  map to a dimension table or codebook for readable labels.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the pivot/report (records)

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the current filter context

measures.name: NumberOfCases
measures.description: Total number of cases (sum of NumberOfCases)

measures.name: LossQuantity
measures.description: Total lost quantity across the selected records

measures.name: NewQuantity
measures.description: Total new quantity across the selected records

measures.name: COQuantity
measures.description: Total CO (changeover/comp) quantity across the selected records

measures.name: AvgLossQuantityPercentage
measures.description: Average of stored LossQuantityPercentage values (simple average across rows)

measures.name: AvgNewQuantityPercentage
measures.description: Average of stored NewQuantityPercentage values (simple average across rows)

measures.name: AvgCOQuantityPercentage
measures.description: Average of stored COQuantityPercentage values (simple average across rows)

measures.name: LossQuantityRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCases) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(LossQuantity) * 100.0 / SUM(NumberOfCases) END
measures.description: Weighted loss rate: sum(LossQuantity) divided by sum(NumberOfCases), expressed as a percent

measures.name: NewQuantityRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCases) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(NewQuantity) * 100.0 / SUM(NumberOfCases) END
measures.description: Weighted new quantity rate: sum(NewQuantity) divided by sum(NumberOfCases), expressed as a percent

measures.name: COQuantityRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCases) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COQuantity) * 100.0 / SUM(NumberOfCases) END
measures.description: Weighted CO quantity rate: sum(COQuantity) divided by sum(NumberOfCases), expressed as a percent

measures.name: ContractAmount
measures.description: Sum of contract amounts (monetary). Stored with 3 decimal precision; shown to 2 decimals.

measures.name: SubscriptionAmount
measures.description: Sum of subscription amounts (monetary)

measures.name: RenewalAmount
measures.description: Sum of renewal amounts (monetary)

measures.name: NonSubscriptionAmount
measures.description: Sum of non-subscription amounts (monetary)

measures.name: TotalMonetaryAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount across contract, subscription, renewal and non-subscription fields (sum of amounts, nulls treated as 0)

measures.name: AvgSubscriptionAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average of stored SubscriptionAmountPercentage values (simple row average)

measures.name: AvgRenewalAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average of stored RenewalAmountPercentage values (simple row average)

measures.name: AvgNonSubscriptionAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average of stored NonSubscriptionAmountPercentage values (simple row average)

measures.name: SubscriptionAmountShareOfTotal
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(SubscriptionAmount) * 100.0 / SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) END
measures.description: Subscription amount as a percentage of total monetary amount (weighted share)

measures.name: RenewalAmountShareOfTotal
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(RenewalAmount) * 100.0 / SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) END
measures.description: Renewal amount as a percentage of total monetary amount (weighted share)

measures.name: NonSubscriptionAmountShareOfTotal
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(NonSubscriptionAmount) * 100.0 / SUM(COALESCE(ContractAmount,0) + COALESCE(SubscriptionAmount,0) + COALESCE(RenewalAmount,0) + COALESCE(NonSubscriptionAmount,0)) END
measures.description: Non-subscription amount as a percentage of total monetary amount (weighted share)

display.notes: PivotType can be used to interpret the row (e.g., breakdown level). If you need time-based analysis, join with a date dimension where appropriate (this table has no intrinsic date column).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of history rows (records) in this table.

measures.name: NumberOfRecords_Sum
measures.description: Sum of NumberOfRecords across the selected rows. Represents the total underlying records aggregated for the segments in the selected set.

measures.name: TotalScore_Sum
measures.description: Total of TotalScore across rows. Stored as currency (USD) in the source; use this to see aggregated monetary score value for selected segments/batches.

measures.name: TotalScore_Avg
measures.description: Average TotalScore per row (USD). Useful for comparing typical monetary score level across segments or time.

measures.name: AvgScore_Avg
measures.description: Average of the AvgScore column across selected rows. Represents the mean campaign score (points) for the segments/time period.

measures.name: AvgScore_Max
measures.description: Maximum AvgScore observed in the selected rows.

measures.name: XOGR_ROCO_Avg
measures.description: Average XOGR ROCO value for the selected rows. Channel-specific ROCO metric  treated as a numeric score/ratio.

measures.name: PPC_ROCO_Avg
measures.description: Average PPC ROCO value for the selected rows. Channel-specific ROCO metric for PPC.

measures.name: Print_ROCO_Avg
measures.description: Average Print ROCO value for the selected rows. Channel-specific ROCO metric for print.

measures.name: XOGR_ROCO_User_Avg
measures.description: Average user-level XOGR ROCO presented as a percentage (source values appear on a 0-100 scale). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: PPC_ROCO_User_Avg
measures.description: Average user-level PPC ROCO presented as a percentage (source values appear on a 0-100 scale). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: Print_ROCO_User_Avg
measures.description: Average user-level Print ROCO presented as a percentage (source values appear on a 0-100 scale). Many rows are null/empty; average ignores nulls.

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Sum of the Amount values for the snapshot rows (monetary). Reflects the total USD amount for the selected scope.

measures.name: Average Amount
measures.description: Average Amount per snapshot row (mean). Useful to understand typical amount associated with behaviour snapshots.

measures.name: Minimum Amount
measures.description: Minimum Amount observed in the selected scope.

measures.name: Maximum Amount

measures.name: FirstRecordedAt

measures.name: LastRecordedAt
measures.description: Most recent CreatedOn timestamp in the dataset.

measures.name: RecordingPeriodDays
measures.description: Number of days between the earliest and latest CreatedOn values (span of recorded history).

measures.name: AvgRecordsPerCampaign
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) END
measures.description: Average number of history records per campaign (total records divided by distinct campaigns).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of detail rows (records) in this slice.

measures.name: SumScoreTotal
measures.description: Sum of the overall score (ScoreTotal) across the selected rows.

measures.name: AvgScoreTotal
measures.description: Average of the overall score (ScoreTotal) across the selected rows.

measures.name: SumScoreMainActivity
measures.description: Aggregate of the ScoreMainActivity component.

measures.name: SumScoreSeniority
measures.description: Aggregate of the ScoreSeniority component.

measures.name: SumScoreValueBillingRange
measures.description: Aggregate of the ScoreValueBillingRange component.

measures.description: Aggregate of the ScoreCombinationMedium component.

measures.description: Aggregate of the ScoreMaxInvestmentMedium component.

measures.description: Aggregate of the ScoreCombinationProduct component.

measures.name: SumScoreCustomerBehavior
measures.description: Aggregate of the ScoreCustomerBehavior component.

measures.name: SumScoreSalesmanManagement
measures.description: Aggregate of the ScoreSalesmanManagement component.

measures.name: SumScoreComponents
measures.expression: SUM(ScoreMainActivity + ScoreSeniority + ScoreValueBillingRange + ScoreCombinationMedium + ScoreMaxInvestmentMedium + ScoreCombinationProduct + ScoreCustomerBehavior + ScoreSalesmanManagement)
measures.description: Sum of all score components. Use to compare against SumScoreTotal (ScoreTotal may be precomputed or weighted differently).

measures.name: AvgScoreDifferenceToAvg
measures.description: Average of the ScoreDifferenceToAvg value (difference between this bucket's score and the campaign average).

measures.name: SumTargetingAmountCalculated
measures.description: Total targeting amount calculated for the bucket (system-calculated).

measures.name: SumTargetingAmountByUser
measures.description: Total targeting amount assigned/entered by users. Note: many rows may be NULL.

measures.name: SumPrintAmount
measures.description: Total amount allocated for print for the selected rows.

measures.name: SumPPCAmount

measures.name: SumXOGRAmount
measures.description: Total amount allocated to XO.gr for the selected rows.

measures.name: SumWebSiteAmount
measures.description: Total website-related amount for the selected rows (sparse).

measures.name: SumTotalAmount
measures.description: Total amount across channels for the selected rows (should be approximately the sum of channel amounts).

measures.name: PercentTargetingAssigned
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TargetingAmountByUser IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of rows where a user-provided targeting amount exists (TargetingAmountByUser is not null).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (stores/locations) in the selected set.

measures.name: Total Amount

measures.name: Average Amount

measures.name: Min Amount

measures.name: Snapshot Row Count

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total recommended/maximum investment amount summed across snapshot rows (useful when aggregating multiple media or snapshots).

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average recommended/maximum investment amount per row (medium) in the snapshot.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum recommended/maximum investment amount observed in the snapshot rows.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum recommended/maximum investment amount observed in the snapshot rows.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of snapshot records (rows) in the current aggregation scope.

measures.name: DistinctMediumCount
measures.description: Number of distinct media/channels (Name) represented in the snapshot.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount for the medium combination in the snapshot (stored with 3 decimal places).

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average monetary amount per snapshot row for this medium combination.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum recorded amount for this medium combination.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum recorded amount for this medium combination.

measures.name: SnapshotCount
measures.description: Number of snapshot records (rows) for the medium combination.

measures.name: DistinctMediumTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct medium type codes observed in the result set.

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Total monetary amount (score/price) summed across snapshot rows for the selected scope. Stored with three decimal precision; formatted to two decimals for presentation.

measures.name: Average Amount
measures.description: Average monetary amount per product combination in the snapshot.

measures.name: Combination Count
measures.description: Number of product-combination snapshot records (unique snapshot rows).

measures.name: Distinct Combination Names
measures.description: Count of distinct product-combination name variants captured in the snapshot.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the campaign score report (record-level count).

measures.name: TotalCustomers
measures.description: Total number of customers aggregated for the report rows (sum of NumberOfCustomers).

measures.name: TotalCoAmount
measures.description: Aggregate Company (Co) amount for the campaign/segment (sum of TotalCoAmount).

measures.name: TotalRoCoAmount
measures.description: Aggregate RO Company amount for the campaign/segment (sum of TotalRoCoAmount).

measures.name: TotalNew
measures.description: Aggregate new business amount (sum of TotalNew).

measures.name: AvgCoPerCustomer
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalCoAmount) / SUM(NumberOfCustomers) END
measures.description: Average Company amount per customer = SUM(TotalCoAmount) / SUM(NumberOfCustomers). NULL when customer count is zero.

measures.name: AvgRoCoPerCustomer
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalRoCoAmount) / SUM(NumberOfCustomers) END
measures.description: Average RO Company amount per customer = SUM(TotalRoCoAmount) / SUM(NumberOfCustomers). NULL when customer count is zero.

measures.name: AvgNewPerCustomer
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalNew) / SUM(NumberOfCustomers) END
measures.description: Average new-business amount per customer = SUM(TotalNew) / SUM(NumberOfCustomers). NULL when customer count is zero.

default_filters.description: Exclude rows with zero or missing customers to focus on active segments.

measures.name: AverageROCO
measures.description: Average Return On Campaign Cost (ROCO) for the grouping. Values are stored as a decimal fraction (for example 0.10 = 10%). Nulls are ignored by the aggregation.

measures.name: AverageUserROCO
measures.description: Average user-level ROCO index for the grouping. Stored as an index/percentage where 100 represents the baseline. Many rows may be null and are ignored by the aggregation.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (campaign x segment x medium records) in the current grouping or filter context.

measures.name: DistinctSegments

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of campaign-segment-salesman assignment records.

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of the TotalQuantity for the assignment (full population count for the segment-salesman within the campaign).

measures.name: IncludedQuantity
measures.description: Sum of items explicitly included for this salesman/segment in the campaign.

measures.name: ExcludedQuantity
measures.description: Sum of items explicitly excluded for this salesman/segment in the campaign.

measures.name: IncludedOthersQuantity
measures.description: Sum of items included via 'other' inclusion logic for this assignment (nullable).

measures.name: SecondIncludedQuantity
measures.description: Secondary included quantity (alternate inclusion rule) summed for the assignment.

measures.name: SecondExcludedQuantity
measures.description: Secondary excluded quantity (alternate exclusion rule) summed for the assignment.

measures.name: SecondTotalQuantity
measures.description: Secondary total quantity measure (corresponding to secondary inclusion/exclusion logic).

measures.name: IncludedPercent
measures.description: Portion of TotalQuantity that is included (IncludedQuantity / TotalQuantity).

measures.name: ExcludedPercent
measures.description: Portion of TotalQuantity that is excluded (ExcludedQuantity / TotalQuantity).

measures.name: IncludedOthersPercent
measures.description: Portion of TotalQuantity coming from 'included others' logic (IncludedOthersQuantity / TotalQuantity).

measures.name: AllocationRate
measures.description: Share of TotalQuantity that has been categorized (included, excluded or included-others). Useful to assess completeness of segmentation/assignment.

measures.name: UnallocatedQuantity
measures.description: Estimated remaining quantity not accounted for by includes/excludes (TotalQuantity minus known included/excluded quantities).

measures.name: DistinctSegments
measures.description: Number of distinct segments represented in the filtered set of records.

measures.name: DistinctSubStatusCount
measures.description: Count of distinct SubStatus codes present; SubStatus is typically a categorical/state code rather than a continuous measure.

measures.name: Targeting Events

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns Targeted

measures.name: Distinct Segments Targeted

measures.name: Average Events Per Day

measures.name: RowCount

measures.name: TotalTarget
measures.description: Sum of Target values across the selected scope. Represents the total planned number (or units) of new customers targeted in these detail records.

measures.name: MinTarget

measures.description: Maximum Target value observed in the selected scope.

measures.name: TargetNonNullCount
measures.description: Count of records with a non-null Target value.

measures.name: TotalDailyTarget
measures.description: Sum of DailyTarget values. Note: DailyTarget is fully null in the current profiling sample; include with caution.

measures.name: TotalUserDailyTarget
measures.description: Sum of UserDailyTarget values. Note: UserDailyTarget is fully null in the current profiling sample; include with caution.

display.notes: Target appears to be a planned target (likely a count of new customers). DailyTarget and UserDailyTarget are currently all NULL in the provided sample; visuals should handle sparse/null values appropriately.

measures.description: Total number of assignment rowseach row represents a campaign-rule-salesman association to a business point (customer).

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (business points) targeted in the dataset.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen assigned to campaign customers.

measures.name: DistinctRules
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign rules represented in these assignments.

measures.name: AvgAssignmentsPerSalesman
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT SalesmanID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT SalesmanID) END
measures.description: Average number of assignments (rows) per salesman. Useful to understand workload distribution across salesmen for the selected scope.

measures.name: AvgCustomersPerRule
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT RuleID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT RuleID) END

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of unique business points (distinct BusinessPointID) represented in the snapshot.

measures.name: BusinessPointRecords
measures.description: Total number of rows/records in the source table (should equal UniqueBusinessPoints if BusinessPointID is unique).

measures.description: Count of business points marked as active.

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1),0)
measures.description: Share of business points that are active (ActiveBusinessPoints / total records).

measures.name: PaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points with a recorded payment refusal flag.

measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContinuousPaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points with continuous payment refusals.

measures.name: SealedCheckCount

measures.description: Number of business points flagged with a sealed check.

measures.name: DisappearedCount

measures.description: Number of business points marked as disappeared.

measures.name: PrecariousnessLegalCount

measures.description: Number of business points flagged as legally precarious.

measures.name: TotalContractAmount
measures.description: Sum of ContractAmount for the detail rows

measures.name: AverageContractAmount
measures.description: Average contract amount across detail rows

measures.name: TotalCPPrice
measures.description: Sum of contract product list prices (CPPrice)

measures.name: TotalCPDiscount
measures.description: Sum of direct discounts applied to contract products

measures.name: TotalCPRulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied to contract products

measures.name: TotalCPAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of altered amounts for contract products (manual adjustments)

measures.name: TotalAdvPrice
measures.description: Sum of advertisement prices (AdvPrice)

measures.name: TotalAdvDiscount
measures.description: Sum of direct discounts applied to advertisements

measures.name: TotalAdvRulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied to advertisements

measures.name: TotalAdvAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of altered amounts for advertisement lines (manual adjustments)

measures.name: TotalDiscounts
measures.description: Combined sum of all discount types across contract products and advertisements

measures.name: CPDiscountRate
measures.description: Share of CP discounts relative to CP price (CPDiscount / CPPrice). Null when CPPrice sum is zero.

measures.name: AdvDiscountRate
measures.description: Share of advertisement discounts relative to advertisement price (AdvDiscount / AdvPrice). Null when AdvPrice sum is zero.

measures.name: BundleCount
measures.description: Number of rows flagged as bundles

measures.name: CPSubscriptionBasedCount
measures.description: Number of contract products that are subscription-based

measures.name: CPRenewableCount
measures.description: Count of contract products marked as renewable

measures.name: CPRenewedCount
measures.description: Count of contract products marked as renewed

measures.name: AdvEndsInY01Count
measures.description: Count of advertisement lines whose end falls in year 01 flag

measures.name: AdvDeactivatedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AdvDeactivationDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisement lines that have a deactivation date

measures.name: NoSubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount
measures.description: Total amount before discount for non-subscription items (summed at the contract-product grain)

measures.name: SubrTotalAmountBeforeDiscount
measures.description: Total amount before discount for subscription items (summed at the contract-product grain)

measures.name: RenewalTotalAmountBeforeDiscount
measures.description: Total renewal amount before discount (summed at the contract-product grain)

measures.name: TotalAmountBeforeDiscount
measures.description: Combined total amount before discounts across non-subscription, subscription and renewal amounts

measures.name: NoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Total amount after discount for non-subscription items (summed at the contract-product grain)

measures.name: SubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Total amount after discount for subscription items (summed at the contract-product grain)

measures.name: RenewalTotalAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Total renewal amount after discount (summed at the contract-product grain)

measures.name: TotalAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Combined total amount after discounts across non-subscription, subscription and renewal amounts

measures.name: DiscountAmount
measures.description: Total discount realized (before discounts minus after discounts)

measures.name: PrePrintedTotalAmount
measures.description: Total amount for pre-printed items associated with the contract product

measures.name: FinalPrice_Total
measures.description: Sum of FinalPrice values across contract-product rows

measures.name: FinalPrice_Average
measures.description: Average final price across contract-product rows

measures.name: ContractProductCount
measures.description: Number of contract-product rows (useful when aggregating by ContractID)

measures.name: EarliestSignedDate
measures.description: Earliest sign date observed for the contract-product (use MIN(MinSignedDate) at aggregation)

measures.name: LatestSignedDate
measures.description: Latest sign date observed for the contract-product (use MAX(LastSignedDate) at aggregation)

measures.name: EarliestAdvanceEndDate
measures.description: Earliest advance end date observed for the contract-product

foreign_keys.note: Suggested reference to the Contract dimension
Suggested reference to a ContractProduct (or Product) dimension

measures.name: Case Count
measures.description: Total number of case records (row count).

measures.name: Completed Cases
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that have a completion date (CompletedOn is not null).

measures.name: Open Cases
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that are still open (no CompletedOn).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of cases that are completed (Completed Cases / Case Count).

measures.name: Average Time to Complete (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) END) / 86400.0
measures.description: Average elapsed time from CreatedOn to CompletedOn for completed cases, expressed in days.

measures.name: Average Age (days, closed or open)
measures.description: Average age of cases in days. For closed cases uses CreatedOn -> CompletedOn; for open cases uses CreatedOn -> now (GETUTCDATE()).

measures.name: Pct Completed within 7 days
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) <= 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) END
measures.description: Percentage of completed cases that finished within 7 days of creation.

display.notes: Use PointName, CaseTypeID and ContextEntityType as primary dimensions for analyses. State currently appears to have a single value in the sample and is better treated as a dimension only if it contains multiple meaningful states in production.

measures.name: Attachment Count
measures.description: Total number of attachment records

measures.name: Unique Cases with Attachments
measures.description: Number of distinct cases that have one or more attachments

measures.name: Deleted Attachments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments marked as deleted

measures.name: Active (Not Deleted) Attachments
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments not marked as deleted

measures.name: Current Attachments (IsLast = true)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsLast = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments flagged as the latest version (IsLast = true)

measures.name: Attachment Type 1 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AttachmentType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attachments where AttachmentType = 1 (system-specific type code)

measures.name: Percent Deleted
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of attachments that are deleted (Deleted Attachments / Total Attachments)

measures.name: Average Attachments per Case
measures.description: Average number of attachments per case across the selected scope

measures.name: Comment Count
measures.description: Total number of comment records (rows).

measures.name: Distinct Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct cases that have at least one comment in the aggregated result.

measures.name: First Comment Date
measures.description: Earliest CreatedOn timestamp among the comments in the aggregation window.

measures.name: Last Comment Date
measures.description: Most recent CreatedOn timestamp among the comments in the aggregation window.

measures.name: Average Comment Length
measures.description: Average length (characters) of the CommentText values.

measures.name: Maximum Comment Length
measures.description: Length in characters of the longest CommentText value in the aggregated set.

measures.name: Comments Per Case (Average)
measures.description: Average number of comments per case (COUNT(ID) divided by number of distinct CaseID).

default_filters.description: CommentType currently has a single known value (0) in the sample; keep as explicit filter when meaningful.

measures.name: TotalFinalPrice
measures.description: Total final price (sum of sumFinalPrice) in USD for the row set. Use this to measure total monetary value inserted by the migration script.

measures.name: AverageFinalPrice
measures.description: Average of sumFinalPrice (USD) across the selected grain. Useful to understand typical line value.

measures.name: TotalRows
measures.description: Total number of rows in the result set (acts as a row-level measure).

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contract identifiers present in the filtered result set.

measures.name: AverageSenniority
measures.description: Average Senniority value. Senniority appears to be an integer-coded seniority measure  aggregate as average to understand central tendency. Interpret domain semantics with source owners.

measures.name: MostRecentContactDate
measures.description: The most recent ContactDate for the selected grain. Useful to find last contact occurrence.

measures.name: EarliestBPMinAdvBeginDate
measures.description: Earliest BPMinAdvBeginDate in the selection  indicates earliest advertised/active begin date associated with records.

foreign_keys.description: Likely references a business-partner/owner dimension (heuristic). Confirm with source system owners before enforcing.
Likely references a contract dimension or contract master table. The column stores contract identifiers as strings.

measures.name: TargetedCustomers
measures.description: Number of preprinted (targeted) customers for the campaign-channel row

measures.name: TargetedAmount
measures.description: Total preprinted (targeted) monetary amount for the campaign-channel row

measures.name: LossCustomerPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of customers lost (as stored) for this campaign-channel

measures.name: LossAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of amount lost (as stored) for this campaign-channel

measures.name: IncreaseCustomerPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of customers with increased activity (as stored)

measures.name: IncreaseAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage change in amount for increased customers (as stored)

measures.name: ReductionCustomerPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of customers with reduced activity (as stored)

measures.name: ReductionAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage change in amount for reduced customers (as stored)

measures.name: AvoNew
measures.description: Stored AvoNew value (interpretation depends on source - typically an average/order value indicator)

measures.name: NumberOfVisits
measures.description: Total number of visits (may be fractional if measured as averages) for the campaign-channel row

measures.name: NumberOfVisitsCO
measures.description: Total number of customer-offers visits (CO) for the campaign-channel row

measures.name: ConversionRate
measures.description: Average conversion rate (stored ConvRatePercentage) for the campaign-channel row

measures.name: NumberOfCO
measures.description: Number of CO (customer-offers) occurrences

measures.name: AmountOfCO
measures.description: Total monetary amount associated with CO (customer-offers)

measures.name: NumberOfCOPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of CO occurrences (as stored)

measures.name: AmountOfCOPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of amount attributed to CO (as stored)

measures.name: LossCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers lost in this campaign-channel

measures.name: LossAmount
measures.description: Total lost monetary amount for this campaign-channel

measures.name: IncreaseCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers with increased activity (as stored)

measures.name: IncreaseAmount
measures.description: Total monetary increase amount for customers flagged as increased

measures.name: ReductionCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers with reduced activity

measures.name: ReductionAmount
measures.description: Total monetary reduction amount for customers flagged as reduced

measures.name: NoChangesCustomers
measures.description: Number of customers with no changes

measures.name: NoChangesCustomersPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of customers with no change (as stored)

measures.name: NoChangesAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount for customers with no change

measures.name: NoChangesAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of amount with no change (as stored)

measures.name: ROCOCustomers
measures.description: Number of ROCO customers (as defined by source)

measures.name: ROCOCustomersPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of ROCO customers (as stored)

measures.name: ROCOAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount for ROCO customers

measures.name: ROCOAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of amount for ROCO (as stored)

measures.name: NewCustomers
measures.description: Number of new customers acquired in this campaign-channel

measures.name: NewCustomersPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of new customers (as stored)

measures.name: NewAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount attributed to new customers

measures.name: NewAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of amount attributed to new customers (as stored)

measures.name: CICustomers
measures.description: Number of CI (competitive/incremental) customers

measures.name: CICustomersPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of CI customers (as stored)

measures.name: CIAmount
measures.description: Total monetary amount attributed to CI customers

measures.name: CIAmountPercentage
measures.description: Average percentage of amount attributed to CI customers (as stored)

measures.name: WorkingDays
measures.description: Number of working days associated with this campaign-channel row

measures.name: Salesmen
measures.description: Number of salesmen assigned to this campaign-channel row

measures.name: Mandays
measures.description: Total mandays (person-days) for the campaign-channel row

measures.name: NumberOfVisitsTotal
measures.description: Total number of visits (aggregate) for the campaign-channel

measures.name: NumberOfVisitsCOTotal
measures.description: Total number of CO visits (aggregate) for the campaign-channel

measures.name: NumberOfVisitsNew
measures.description: Total number of visits for new customers

measures.name: NumberOfChecks
measures.description: Total number of checks (row count).

measures.name: DistinctCheckPublishers
measures.description: Number of distinct check publishers in the selected scope.

measures.name: SamePublisherCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSamePublisher = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of checks where the publisher is the same as the related party (IsSamePublisher = true).

measures.name: PercentSamePublisher
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsSamePublisher = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of checks issued by the same publisher (IsSamePublisher).

measures.name: AverageDaysBetweenPublishAndExpiration
measures.description: Average number of days from check publish date to check expiration date. Positive if expiration is after publish.

measures.name: StdDevDaysBetweenPublishAndExpiration
measures.description: Standard deviation of days between publish and expiration  indicates dispersion in check term lengths.

measures.name: ExpiredCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckExpirationDate < GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of checks whose expiration date is before the current date (i.e., already expired). Uses server current timestamp (GETDATE()).

measures.name: ChecksWithPublishDate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckPublishDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of checks that have a publish timestamp recorded.

foreign_keys.description: Reference to bank that issued/holds the check.
Link to the sales collection or receipt row associated with the check.

default_filters.description: By default exclude rows without a publish timestamp to focus on recorded checks.

measures.name: Classification Count
measures.description: Total number of classification records (row count).

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of unique business points that have a classification.

measures.name: Distinct Classifiers
measures.description: Number of distinct classifiers represented in this table.

measures.name: Distinct Classifier Nodes
measures.description: Number of distinct classifier nodes represented in this table.

measures.name: Distinct DM Keys
measures.description: Number of distinct DMKey values (mapped dimension keys). Null DMKey values are excluded.

measures.name: CallEventCount
measures.description: Total number of click-to-call events (rows) in the selected context.

measures.name: UniquePhoneCount
measures.description: Number of distinct phone numbers that were called.

measures.name: UniqueUserCount
measures.description: Number of distinct users who initiated click-to-call events.

measures.name: DistinctTargetGroupItemCount
measures.description: Number of distinct target-group-item values associated with call events.

measures.name: CallsPerUser
measures.description: Average number of calls per active user in the selected context.

measures.name: PercentWithKSCallIdentifier
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN KSCallIdentifier IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of call events that include a non-null KSCallIdentifier.

measures.name: FirstCallTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest call timestamp in the selected context.

measures.name: LastCallTimestamp
measures.description: Most recent call timestamp in the selected context.

measures.name: EntryCount
measures.description: Total number of log entries (rows) in the selection.

measures.name: DistinctLogEntryTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct LogEntryType values present in the selection.

measures.name: ErrorEntryCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LogEntryType = 2 OR UPPER(Text) LIKE '%ERROR%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Heuristic count of log entries that appear to be errors. Uses LogEntryType = 2 and a case-insensitive Text search for 'ERROR' to identify likely error records.

measures.name: ExternalCallRequestCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Text LIKE 'http%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of entries whose Text appears to contain an external call request (Text begins with 'http'). Useful to measure outbound request events recorded in the log.

measures.name: MinTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest timestamp among the selected log entries.

measures.name: MaxTimestamp
measures.description: Latest timestamp among the selected log entries.

measures.name: DurationSeconds
measures.description: Elapsed time in seconds between the earliest and latest log entry in the current aggregation. Most meaningful when grouped by ClickToCallHarmonyHistoryID (i.e., per parent call history).

measures.name: AverageEntriesPerHistory
measures.description: Average number of detail entries per parent ClickToCallHarmonyHistory (computed as total entries divided by distinct parent histories in the selection).

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of action history rows (row-level count).

measures.name: Distinct Batches
measures.description: Number of distinct processing batches represented in the current context.

measures.name: Distinct Actions
measures.description: Number of distinct ActionIDs observed in the current context.

measures.name: Distinct Entity Types
measures.description: Number of distinct EntityType codes present.

measures.name: Actions Per Batch (avg)
measures.description: Average number of action rows per BatchID in the current context.

measures.name: EntityType=2 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityType = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where EntityType equals 2. Use other EntityType values for analogous measures.

measures.name: EntityType=2 Percentage
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityType = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of rows with EntityType = 2 as a percentage of total rows in the current context.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Total number of history events (rows) recorded.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches referenced by these history records.

measures.name: SumRowsAffected
measures.description: Sum of RowsAffected across all events. Represents the total number of rows impacted by the recorded batch operations.

measures.name: AvgRowsAffected
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per event.

measures.name: ZeroRowsAffectedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RowsAffected = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of events where RowsAffected = 0. Useful for identifying no-op or unsuccessful operations.

measures.name: MinTimeStamp
measures.description: Earliest timestamp in the selected set of history events.

measures.name: MaxTimeStamp
measures.description: Latest timestamp in the selected set of history events.

display.notes: BatchActionType, Type and EntityType are stored as integer codes. Join to the corresponding lookup tables (suggested in foreign_keys) to show friendly labels. The Text column contains the message/message locale and can be used as context when drilling into events.

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Number of error-action history records (row count) in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctActionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct ActionID values present in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches (BatchID) represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: ActionsPerBatch
measures.description: Average number of error-action records per distinct batch in the current filter context. NULL when no batches are present.

measures.name: EntityType_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where EntityType = 1. EntityType is a categorical code; this measure captures one observed category (may not cover all codes).

measures.name: EntityType_1_Pct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityType = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of records with EntityType = 1 as a percentage of total records in the current filter context.

measures.name: Type_8_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 8 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records where Type = 8. Type is a categorical code; this measure captures one observed category (may not cover all codes).

measures.name: Contract Count
measures.description: Number of contracts (row count).

measures.name: Active Contract Count
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN CancelledOn IS NULL THEN ID END)
measures.description: Number of contracts that are not cancelled (CancelledOn IS NULL).

measures.name: Subscription Contract Count
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN ID END)
measures.description: Number of contracts flagged as subscription-based.

measures.name: Total Final Price
measures.description: Sum of FinalPrice for contracts. FinalPrice may be NULL for some rows; NULLs are ignored by SUM.

measures.name: Average Final Price
measures.description: Average FinalPrice across contracts (ignores NULL FinalPrice values).

measures.name: Total User Discount Amount
measures.description: Sum of user-applied discounts on contracts.

measures.name: Average User Discount Percent
measures.description: Average of UserDiscountPercent. Assumes stored as percent (e.g. 5 = 5%).

measures.name: Estimated Net Revenue (FinalPrice - Discounts)
measures.description: Estimated net revenue computed as sum(FinalPrice) minus sum(UserDiscountAmount). Uses 0 for NULL values.

measures.name: Average Days to Release
measures.description: Average number of days between contract creation (CreatedOn) and its ReleaseDate. NULL ReleaseDate rows are ignored.

measures.name: Average Days to Transfer to EBS
measures.description: Average days between creation and TransferDateToEBS (when the contract was pushed to EBS).

measures.name: PDF Sent Rate
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN PdfID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percentage of contracts with a PdfID (indicates a PDF document exists).

measures.name: Average UserDiscountAmountPPC
measures.description: Average per-product/category user discount amount (UserDiscountAmountPPC). Many rows are NULL.

measures.name: TotalChanges
measures.description: Total number of archived-number change events (rows) recorded in the history table.

measures.name: ChangesWithNewArchivedNumber
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NewArchivedNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of change events where a new archived number value was provided (NewArchivedNumber is not NULL).

measures.name: ChangesWithOldArchivedNumber
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OldArchivedNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of change events where an old archived number value existed (OldArchivedNumber is not NULL).

measures.name: PercentWithNewArchivedNumber
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN NewArchivedNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of change events that included a new archived number (NewArchivedNumber not NULL).

measures.name: PercentWithOldArchivedNumber
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN OldArchivedNumber IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of change events that included an old archived number (OldArchivedNumber not NULL).

measures.name: DistinctContractsChanged
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that had archived-number change events.

measures.name: DistinctNewArchivedNumbers
measures.description: Count of distinct NewArchivedNumber values observed (NULLs are not counted).

measures.name: DistinctOldArchivedNumbers
measures.description: Count of distinct OldArchivedNumber values observed (NULLs are not counted).

measures.name: AverageChangesPerDay
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CAST(CreatedOn AS DATE)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(ID) / COUNT(DISTINCT CAST(CreatedOn AS DATE)) END
measures.description: Average number of change events per distinct day in the current query scope.

measures.name: DocumentCount
measures.description: Total number of document records (row count) in this fact at the grain of ID.

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that have at least one document in the set.

measures.name: DocumentsWithDMKeyCount
measures.description: Count of documents that are linked to a data-management record (non-null DMKey). Note: DMKey appears almost entirely null in the current sample.

measures.name: DocumentsWithDMCharKeyCount
measures.description: Count of documents that have a non-null DMCharKey (textual external key). Useful to track migrated or externally-referenced documents.

measures.name: DocumentsMissingDMIdentifiers
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NULL AND DMCharKey IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of documents that do not have either DMKey or DMCharKey set  i.e., not linked to external data-management identifiers.

measures.name: AverageDocumentsPerContract
measures.description: Average number of documents per contract within the current filter context. Returns decimal when there are multiple contracts.

recommended_dimensions: ContractDocumentType (categorical integer; treat as document type code)
display.notes: ContractDocumentType is a small integer-coded dimension (distinct_count=5). Prefer exposing it as a dimension for breakdowns rather than as a numeric measure. DMKey and DMTable are mostly null in the sample; DMCharKey contains the majority of external keys when present.

measures.name: Offer Count
measures.description: Total number of contract offers (row count).

measures.name: Distinct TargetGroupItemValue Count
measures.description: Number of distinct TargetGroupItemValueID values represented in the offers.

measures.name: Average Age (days)
measures.description: Average number of days since each offer was created (CreatedOn -> now).

measures.name: Earliest CreatedOn
measures.description: The earliest CreatedOn timestamp among the offers.

measures.name: Most Recent ModifiedOn
measures.description: The most recent ModifiedOn timestamp among the offers.

measures.name: Percent Modified
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ModifiedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of offers that have a non-null ModifiedOn (i.e., have been modified).

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of the Amount values for contract offer detail lines (stored with 3 decimal places). Represents the total monetary value for the detail rows.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average Amount per contract offer detail row.

measures.name: AmountPerUnit
measures.description: Average monetary amount per unit (total amount divided by total quantity). NULL when total quantity is zero.

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Total number of units across contract offer detail rows.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of contract offer detail rows.

measures.name: ContractProductCount
measures.description: Number of contract product rows (rows in this fact table)

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts referenced by these contract products

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of quantities for contract products

measures.name: TotalListAmount
measures.description: Total list amount before discounts (Price multiplied by Quantity, summed)

measures.name: AveragePrice
measures.description: Average unit price across contract products

measures.name: TotalDiscounts
measures.description: Aggregate of monetary discounts applied to contract products (explicit discounts + rule discounts + payment/product/bundle discounts)

measures.name: NetAmount
measures.expression: SUM(Price * Quantity) - SUM(Discount + RulesDiscount + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount, 0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount, 0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount, 0))
measures.description: Net amount after discounts (list amount minus all discounts)

measures.name: AlteredAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of altered amounts (manual adjustments) where present

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.description: Count of contract products marked as subscription-based

measures.name: AverageDiscountPct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Price * Quantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(Discount + RulesDiscount + COALESCE(PaymentDiscount, 0) + COALESCE(ProductDiscount, 0) + COALESCE(BundleDiscount, 0)) / SUM(Price * Quantity) END
measures.description: Total discounts as a percent of total list amount (null when total list amount is zero)

measures.name: Payment Rows
measures.description: Number of offline credit card payment records (row count).

measures.name: Total Installments
measures.description: Sum of installment counts across offline credit card payments. Useful to measure total installment portions sold.

measures.name: Average Installments per Payment
measures.description: Average number of installments chosen per offline credit card payment.

measures.name: Distinct Card Hashes
measures.description: Count of distinct stored/hashed credit card identifiers used in offline payments. Note: values may be hashed or tokenized.

measures.name: Transaction Count
measures.description: Number of credit-card detail rows (total records).

measures.name: Distinct Transaction Codes
measures.description: Number of distinct CreditCardTransactionCode values observed.

measures.name: Distinct Code Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT CreditCardTransactionCode) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Ratio of distinct transaction codes to total rows (distinct codes / total rows).

measures.name: Average Transaction Code Length
measures.description: Average length in characters of the CreditCardTransactionCode string.

measures.name: Max Transaction Code Length
