measures.description: Maximum length in characters for CreditCardTransactionCode.

measures.name: Null Transaction Code Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CreditCardTransactionCode IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where CreditCardTransactionCode is NULL (expected 0 per profiling).

measures.name: Case Count
measures.description: Total number of customer care case records in the selected context

measures.name: Active Case Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases flagged as active

measures.name: Cancelled Contract Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCancelledContract = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases where the related contract was cancelled

measures.name: Assigned Case Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AgentId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that have an assigned agent

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the selected set

measures.name: Sum Current Contacts
measures.description: Sum of the CurrentContact values across cases (represents total current contact occurrences)

measures.name: Average Current Contacts
measures.description: Average CurrentContact value per case

measures.name: Sum Total Contacts
measures.description: Sum of TotalContacts across cases

measures.name: Average Total Contacts
measures.description: Average TotalContacts per case

measures.name: Cases with Contact Email
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CustomerContactEmail IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that include a customer contact email

measures.name: Cases with Contact Name
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CustomerContactName IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of cases that include a customer contact name

measures.name: Distinct Agents
measures.description: Number of distinct agents referenced in the selected set (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Average Days from Contract Start to Activation
measures.description: Average number of days between the earliest contract start date and activation date

measures.name: Min Days from Contract Start to Activation
measures.description: Minimum number of days between contract start and activation among cases

measures.name: Max Days from Contract Start to Activation
measures.description: Maximum number of days between contract start and activation among cases

measures.name: Percent Active
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(Id) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(Id) END
measures.description: Share of cases that are active (active cases divided by total cases)

measures.name: RuleCount
measures.description: Total number of customer care case rules (row count).

measures.name: ActiveRuleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rules currently marked as active.

measures.name: InactiveRuleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rules currently marked as inactive.

measures.name: ActiveRulePercentage
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(Id), 0)
measures.description: Share of rules that are active (ActiveRuleCount / RuleCount).

measures.name: DistinctContacts
measures.description: Number of distinct Contacts code values referenced by rules.

measures.name: MinAmountFrom
measures.description: Minimum AmountFrom value across rules. Represents the lower bound of the amount range for the rule.

measures.name: MaxAmountFrom
measures.description: Maximum AmountFrom value across rules.

measures.name: AvgAmountFrom
measures.description: Average AmountFrom value. Useful when AmountFrom is used as a numeric threshold for rules.

measures.name: AmountToNullRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AmountTo IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(Id), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of rules where AmountTo is null (i.e., open-ended upper bound).

measures.name: AvgSeniority
measures.description: Average Seniority value across rules. Negative values may indicate unspecified or special codes.

measures.name: SeniorityUnknownCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Seniority < 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rules where Seniority is negative (commonly used to indicate unknown/unset).

measures.name: SeniorityZeroCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Seniority = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rules where Seniority equals zero (explicit zero seniority).

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of rows / business points in the dataset (one row per BusinessPointID).

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Distinct business points (by BusinessPointID). Useful when the source may contain duplicates.

measures.name: TotalSubscriptionValue
measures.description: Sum of SubscriptionValue for business points. Stored as DECIMAL(18,3) in source; currency code not specified in source metadata.

measures.name: TotalPreprintedAdValue
measures.description: Sum of pre-printed advertisement value (Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue). Source metadata indicates USD.

measures.name: TotalLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Total of LossPrintedNew across business points (integer counter captured in source).

measures.name: ContactableByPrimaryPhone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points with a non-empty primary Phone value.

measures.name: PhoneM11_OptInCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PhoneM11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points where PhoneM11 flag is true (phone opt-in / indicated as available for calls).

measures.name: AlternatePhonesAvailable
measures.expression: SUM( (CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone1)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone4 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone4)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone5 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone5)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) )
measures.description: Total number of alternate phone numbers (Phone1..Phone5) populated across all business points.

measures.name: AvgAlternatePhonesPerBusinessPoint
measures.expression: AVG( (CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone1)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone4 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone4)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone5 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone5)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) )
measures.description: Average number of alternate phone numbers populated per business point.

display.notes: Many monetary fields are zero in the sample. Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue has source hint USD. SubscriptionValue is stored as DECIMAL(18,3) but source did not provide currency metadata.

measures.name: LogEntries
measures.description: Total number of log rows (one per ID).

measures.name: DistinctBatches
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the selection.

measures.name: RowsAffectedTotal
measures.description: Total number of rows affected across all log entries.

measures.name: RowsAffectedAveragePerEntry
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per log entry.

measures.name: AverageProcessingTimeSeconds
measures.description: Average elapsed time in seconds between the log Timestamp and CompletedOn. Null or negative intervals should be validated upstream.

measures.name: P90ProcessingTimeSeconds
measures.expression: PERCENTILE_CONT(0.9) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY DATEDIFF(second, [Timestamp], [CompletedOn])) OVER ()
measures.description: 90th percentile of processing time (seconds) between Timestamp and CompletedOn. Useful to understand tail latency.

measures.name: DistinctOperations
measures.description: Number of distinct operation types recorded in the logs.

measures.name: StatusNonZeroCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of log entries where Status is non-zero. Use this to identify entries that may require attention (interpretation of Status values depends on system semantics).

measures.name: StatusZeroCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of log entries where Status equals zero. Many systems use zero for success; confirm semantics before using as a success metric.

measures.name: Request Count
measures.description: Total number of dialer requests (one row per request).

measures.name: Distinct Task Count
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks associated with requests in the log.

measures.name: Distinct Initial User Count
measures.description: Number of unique users who initiated dialer requests.

measures.name: Distinct Token Count
measures.description: Number of unique tokens observed in the log. Useful to detect reuse or duplication.

measures.name: Duplicate Token Rate
measures.description: Share of requests that reuse a token (1 - unique_tokens / total_requests). Higher values indicate token reuse or duplicates.

measures.name: Distinct Call Result Count
measures.description: Number of different call result codes observed in the requests.

measures.name: Average Requests per User
measures.description: Average number of requests per initiating user over the selected scope.

measures.name: RequestCount
measures.description: Total number of dialer request log entries (rows) in the aggregation.

measures.name: DistinctRequestingUsers
measures.description: Number of distinct users associated with requests. Null UserID values are ignored.

measures.name: UniqueOperations
measures.description: Number of distinct operation types recorded in the log entries.

measures.name: EarliestRequestTimestamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest request in the aggregation window.

measures.name: LatestRequestTimestamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the latest request in the aggregation window.

measures.name: NonZeroStatusCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of requests whose Status value is not zero. Use as a generic proxy for non-default or potentially problematic statuses (interpretation of codes is system-specific).

measures.name: AverageStatusCode
measures.description: Average numeric value of Status codes for the aggregated rows. Intended for diagnostics  meaningful only if numeric averaging of status codes is useful for your system.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Total number of dialer task rows (at the grain of ID)

measures.name: NotFoundCount
measures.description: Total number of tasks marked as NotFound (assumes NotFound is 0/1)

measures.name: NotFoundRate
measures.description: Share of tasks flagged NotFound (NotFoundCount / TaskCount)

measures.name: PendingImportCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PendingImport = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks currently pending import

measures.name: PermitCallCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PermitCall = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks where calling is permitted

measures.name: PermitCallRate
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN PermitCall = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0))
measures.description: Share of tasks where calling is permitted (PermitCallCount / TaskCount)

measures.name: RequiresSynchronizationCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RequiresSynchronization = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks flagged as requiring synchronization

measures.name: DistinctTargetGroupItemValues
measures.description: Number of distinct TargetGroupItemValueIDs represented in the selected set

measures.name: DistinctDialerCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct DialerCampaignIDs present (nulls excluded by most SQL engines)

measures.name: LastSynchDateMax
measures.description: Most recent LastSynchDate for the selected tasks

measures.name: LastSynchDateMin
measures.description: Earliest LastSynchDate for the selected tasks

measures.name: ExportDateMax
measures.description: Most recent ExportDate for the selected tasks

measures.name: ExportDateMin
measures.description: Earliest ExportDate for the selected tasks

default_filters.description: Focus on tasks that have been exported

measures.name: CallCount
measures.description: Total number of dialer call records (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: CompletedCallCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN FinishedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of calls that have a FinishedOn timestamp (calls that completed/terminated).

measures.name: CompletionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN FinishedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of calls that completed (FinishedOn not null) out of total calls.

measures.name: TotalDurationSeconds
measures.description: Sum of call durations in seconds. Null FinishedOn values are excluded from the sum.

measures.name: AverageDurationSeconds
measures.description: Average call duration in seconds across calls that have a FinishedOn time.

measures.name: AverageDurationSeconds_CompletedOnly
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN FinishedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, StartedOn, FinishedOn) END)
measures.description: Average duration (seconds) for completed calls (explicitly excludes in-progress/unfinished calls).

measures.name: CallsWithRecallCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN JSON_VALUE(Payload, '$.RecallDateTime') IS NOT NULL AND JSON_VALUE(Payload, '$.RecallDateTime') <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of calls that have a RecallDateTime set in the Payload (follow-up / scheduled recall).

measures.name: CallsWithRecordingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LTRIM(RTRIM(ISNULL(JSON_VALUE(Payload, '$.DialerRecordingID'), ''))) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of calls that have a non-empty DialerRecordingID in the Payload (indicates an available recording id).

measures.name: UniqueDialedPhoneNumbers
measures.description: Number of distinct phone numbers dialed as extracted from the Payload JSON field CallHistoryEntityPhoneNumber.

measures.name: CallsWithResult_3_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TRY_CAST(JSON_VALUE(Payload, '$.CallResultId') AS INT) = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of calls where the Payload's CallResultId equals 3. (Adjust the numeric list or logic if your business maps different result codes.)

display.notes: Payload is a JSON blob; many measures extract fields via JSON_VALUE(JSON path). Consider a persisted computed column or view that extracts common JSON fields (CallResultId, CallHistoryEntityPhoneNumber, RecallDateTime, DialerRecordingID, CallId) for faster filtering/grouping.

measures.name: Item Count
measures.description: Number of discount policy items (rows) in the selected scope

measures.name: Enabled Item Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EnableLimit = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items where the limit/enable flag is set (EnableLimit = 1). Useful to identify active tiers

measures.name: Enabled Item Share
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN EnableLimit = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share (%) of items that are enabled (EnableLimit = 1) within the selected scope

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Sum of the Amount values for the selected items. Amount is recorded in USD

measures.name: Average Amount
measures.description: Average Amount per discount item (in USD)

measures.name: Min Amount
measures.description: Minimum Amount among items in the selected scope

measures.name: Max Amount
measures.description: Maximum Amount among items in the selected scope

measures.name: Average Percentage
measures.description: Average percentage value across discount items. Assumes Percentage column stores percent points (e.g., 25 = 25%)

measures.name: Min Percentage
measures.description: Minimum percentage defined in the selected scope

measures.name: Max Percentage
measures.description: Maximum percentage defined in the selected scope

measures.name: Min Range Down Limit
measures.description: Minimum lower bound (RangeDownLimit) across selected items

measures.name: Max Range Up Limit
measures.description: Maximum upper bound (RangeUpLimit) across selected items

measures.name: Average Range Down Limit
measures.description: Average of the RangeDownLimit values. CAST used to allow fractional average

measures.name: Average Range Up Limit
measures.description: Average of the RangeUpLimit values. CAST used to allow fractional average

measures.name: CriteriaCount
measures.description: Total number of criteria records (rows) in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctUsers
measures.description: Number of distinct users who created criteria.

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns that have at least one criterion.

measures.name: AverageCriteriaPerUser
measures.description: Average number of criteria created per user in the current filter context (null-safe).

measures.name: AverageCriteriaPerCampaign
measures.description: Average number of criteria associated with each campaign (null-safe).

measures.name: LatestCriteriaTimestamp
measures.description: Most recent criteria creation timestamp in the current filter context.

measures.name: EarliestCriteriaTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest criteria creation timestamp in the current filter context.

measures.name: AverageTextLength
measures.description: Average number of characters in the Text field for criteria (useful for content-length analysis).

measures.name: DistinctTextVariants
measures.description: Number of distinct text values used across criteria (helps identify reuse or templating).

notes: DMKey / DMTable / DMCharKey columns are fully null in the sample and can be treated as deprecated/unused in analyses unless populated.
Text content appears to be Greek; consider language-aware text processing if doing NLP on Text.

measures.name: OperationCount
measures.description: Number of recorded operations (rows) in the history table

measures.name: TotalRowsAffected
measures.description: Total number of rows affected across all operations

measures.name: AverageRowsAffected
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per operation

measures.name: MaxRowsAffected
measures.description: Maximum rows affected by a single operation

measures.name: MinRowsAffected
measures.description: Minimum rows affected by a single operation

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the selected rows

measures.name: SuccessfulOperations
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of operations recorded with Status = 1 (interpreted as success)

measures.name: FailedOperations
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of operations with a Status value other than 1 (interpreted as failure/other)

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of operations that are successful (Status = 1)

measures.name: AverageProcessingSeconds
measures.description: Average processing time in seconds from TimeStamp (start) to CompletedOn (end)

measures.name: TotalProcessingSeconds
measures.description: Total accumulated processing time in seconds for the selected operations

measures.name: MaxProcessingSeconds
measures.description: Longest single processing time in seconds between TimeStamp and CompletedOn

default_filters.description: Show successful operations by default

measures.name: Error Count
measures.description: Total number of error records (rows).

measures.name: Distinct Batches with Errors
measures.description: Number of distinct batches (BatchID) that contain one or more errors.

measures.name: Distinct Error Types
measures.description: Number of distinct error type codes observed in the selected scope.

measures.name: Average Errors per Batch
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(ID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT BatchID) END
measures.description: Average number of error records per batch in the selected scope.

measures.name: Earliest Error Date
measures.description: Earliest (minimum) ErrorDate in the selected scope.

measures.name: Most Recent Error Date
measures.description: Most recent (maximum) ErrorDate in the selected scope.

measures.name: Average Error Age (days)
measures.description: Average age of errors in days measured from ErrorDate to the current timestamp. Useful to assess how long errors have remained unresolved.

foreign_keys.note: Inferred: BatchID groups multiple post-check rows. Confirm existence of ErpBridgeBatches (or equivalent) table.
Inferred lookup for entity type names / metadata. If there is a dimension or lookup for entity types, map to it.

display.notes: For troubleshooting UIs, show ErrorDescr and a snippet of EntityData (XML) alongside counts. Consider adding a derived column to parse key identifiers (e.g., CustomerCode, ContractID) from EntityData for joining to domain dimensions.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total collected amount for receipts (sum of Amount). Currency inferred from source as USD.

measures.name: ReceiptCount
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the buffer.

measures.name: AverageReceiptAmount
measures.description: Average amount per receipt. Computed as AVG(Amount).

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Count of distinct customers represented in the data (based on CustomerCode).

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.description: Number of receipts marked as payoff (IsPayoff = 1). IsPayoff appears to be a 0/1 flag.

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.description: Share of receipts flagged as payoff: PayoffCount / ReceiptCount. Returns 0 when no receipts (guarded by NULLIF).

measures.name: AverageCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Average number of credit card installments for receipts that include credit card installment data. Note: CreditCardInstallments has a very high null rate (~99%), so this metric will be based on a very small subset.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of rows / business points in the result set (one row per BusinessPointID).

measures.name: UniqueBrandCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BrandName values present.

measures.name: UniqueMainActivityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct main activities (MainActivityID) represented.

measures.name: HasInternetMasterHeadingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasInternetMasterHeading = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points that have an Internet master heading flag set (HasInternetMasterHeading = true).

measures.name: IsRegularCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRegular = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points marked as regular customers (IsRegular = true).

measures.name: IsProspectCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsProspect = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points marked as prospects (IsProspect = true).

measures.name: SolvencyKnownCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points that have a solvency rating (SolvencyID is not null).

measures.name: SolvencyGreenCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyDescription = 'GREEN' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points explicitly flagged with a GREEN solvency description.

measures.name: CompanyPhoneAvailableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompanyPhone IS NOT NULL AND CompanyPhone <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points with a non-empty CompanyPhone value.

measures.name: LastSignedDateMax
measures.description: Most recent LastSignedDate among the rows (nulls are ignored).

measures.name: LastSignedDateMin
measures.description: Earliest LastSignedDate among the rows (nulls are ignored).

measures.name: DaysSinceLastSignedAvg
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN LastSignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, LastSignedDate, GETDATE()) END)
measures.description: Average number of days since LastSignedDate for business points with a LastSignedDate.

measures.name: CompletenessAverage
measures.expression: AVG((CASE WHEN BrandName IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN Address IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN CompanyPhone IS NOT NULL AND CompanyPhone <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END + CASE WHEN LastSignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / 4.0)
measures.description: Average completeness score across four key fields (BrandName, Address, CompanyPhone, LastSignedDate). Value ranges 0.0-1.0 and is shown as a percentage.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (template records) in the table

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points referenced by these templates

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of Quantity across all template rows

measures.name: TotalPrice
measures.description: Sum of unit Price values (sum of Price column). Use with caution  Price appears constant in samples.

measures.name: GrossAmount
measures.description: Gross amount calculated as sum of Price multiplied by Quantity

measures.name: TotalDiscounts
measures.description: Combined total of explicit discount fields (Discount, RulesDiscount, PaymentDiscount, ProductDiscount, BundleDiscount)

measures.name: NetAmount
measures.expression: SUM(Price * Quantity) + SUM(OneTimeAmount) + SUM(ExtraFeeAmount) - (SUM(Discount) + SUM(RulesDiscount) + SUM(PaymentDiscount) + SUM(ProductDiscount) + SUM(BundleDiscount)) + SUM(AlteredAmount)
measures.description: Estimated net amount: gross (Price*Quantity) plus one-time/extra fees and altered amounts minus all discounts

measures.name: BudgetAmountTotal
measures.description: Total budget amount (BudgetAmount)

measures.name: ActualSpentBudgetTotal
measures.description: Total actual spent budget

measures.name: OneTimeAmountAfterDiscountTotal
measures.description: Total one-time amounts after discounts

measures.name: ExtraFeeAmountAfterDiscountTotal
measures.description: Total extra-fee amounts after discounts

measures.name: ExtraFeeAmountAfterCCTotal
measures.description: Total extra-fee amounts after credit-card adjustments

measures.name: AlteredPPCAmountAfterCCTotal
measures.description: Total altered PPC amounts after credit-card adjustments

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of templates marked as subscription based

measures.name: SubscriptionRatio
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of rows that are subscription-based (percentage)

measures.name: InterruptedFromCRMCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInterruptedFromCRM = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged as interrupted from CRM

measures.name: AvgPricePerUnit
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Quantity) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(Price * Quantity) / NULLIF(SUM(Quantity), 0) END
measures.description: Average price per unit (weighted by Quantity). NULL when total Quantity = 0

measures.name: DistinctDMKeys
measures.description: Number of distinct DMKey values (useful for joins to marketing / dimensional mappings)

measures.name: AdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of advertisement records

measures.name: ActiveAdvertisementCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DeactivationDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of advertisements that have not been deactivated

measures.name: TotalPrice
measures.description: Sum of Price for the advertisement records

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Aggregate of all discount types applied to the advertisement (Discount + RulesDiscount + PaymentDiscount + ProductDiscount + BundleDiscount)

measures.name: TotalAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of manual or system altered amounts affecting the advertised price

measures.name: NetAmountApprox
measures.expression: SUM( ISNULL(Price,0) - ISNULL(Discount,0) - ISNULL(RulesDiscount,0) - ISNULL(PaymentDiscount,0) - ISNULL(ProductDiscount,0) - ISNULL(BundleDiscount,0) + ISNULL(AlteredAmount,0) )
measures.description: Approximate net amount after discounts and adjustments (does not include one-time/extrafee post-discount / CC adjustments)

measures.name: TotalBudgetAmount
measures.description: Sum of BudgetAmount allocated for these advertisements

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts before discounts

measures.name: AverageOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Average one-time amount per advertisement (NULLs ignored)

measures.name: TotalExtraFeeAmount
measures.description: Aggregate of extra fees before discounts

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts after applying discounts

measures.name: TotalExtraFeeAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Sum of extra fees after discounts

measures.name: TotalActualSpentBudget
measures.description: Total budget actually spent for the advertisements

measures.name: TotalExtraFeeAfterCC
measures.description: Total extra fee amounts after credit-card or final adjustments

measures.name: TotalAlteredPPCAmountAfterCC
measures.description: Total altered PPC amounts after credit-card or final adjustments

measures.name: TotalCompletedChanges
measures.description: Sum of CompletedChanges (number of completed modifications tracked per advertisement)

measures.name: PercentVerified
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsVerified = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Percent of advertisements marked as verified

measures.name: PercentSubscriptionBased
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Percent of advertisements that are subscription-based

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of attribute value rows.

measures.name: NonNullValueCount
measures.description: Number of rows where Value is not NULL.

measures.name: ValueFillRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(Value) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of rows that have a populated Value (non-NULL).

measures.name: DistinctAttributeDefinitionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct content attribute definitions represented in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctProductPartCount
measures.description: Number of distinct product parts referenced by these attribute values.

measures.name: QAFlagCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN QA = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows marked with the QA flag.

measures.name: MaxSeqNo
measures.description: Maximum SeqNo observed (note: current data shows SeqNo = 0 for all rows).

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Total number of distributed items (sum of Quantity) for the distribution records in scope.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of distribution records (rows) in the selected scope.

measures.name: AverageQuantityPerRecord
measures.description: Average Quantity per distribution record (mean number of items per record).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of inset records (rows) in the table.

measures.name: TotalQuantity
measures.description: Sum of the Quantity values for all inset records. Use when Quantity represents an additive metric (e.g., number of items).

measures.name: AverageQuantity
measures.description: Average Quantity per inset record.

measures.name: TotalQuantityPerCategory
measures.description: Sum of QuantityPerCategory across records. Useful when QuantityPerCategory is a pre-computed per-category allocation.

measures.name: CategorySummaryTotal
measures.description: Sum of CategorySummary values. Treat this measure only if CategorySummary is numeric aggregation; otherwise treat CategorySummary as an attribute.

measures.name: InsetCount
measures.description: Count of records marked as having an inset (HasInset = 1).

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisements
measures.description: Number of distinct Advertisement records referenced by these insets.

display.notes: Category appears as an integer code; if there is a Category dimension, prefer joining to that dimension for meaningful labels. DMKey/DMTable/DMCharKey are management keys and typically used for lineage/lookups rather than as analysis dimensions.

measures.name: RunCount
measures.description: Total number of batch run records (row count).

measures.name: CompletedRunCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of runs that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is not null).

measures.name: PercentCompleted
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(Id), 0)
measures.description: Percent of runs that have completed (CompletedOn is not null).

measures.name: DistinctBatchSearchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BatchSearch entities referenced by these runs.

measures.name: AverageRunDurationSeconds
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, ScheduledOn, CompletedOn) END)
measures.description: Average run duration in seconds between ScheduledOn and CompletedOn. Only includes runs with a non-null CompletedOn.

measures.name: MinRunDurationSeconds
measures.expression: MIN(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, ScheduledOn, CompletedOn) END)
measures.description: Shortest run duration (seconds) among runs that have CompletedOn.

measures.name: MaxRunDurationSeconds
measures.expression: MAX(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, ScheduledOn, CompletedOn) END)
measures.description: Longest run duration (seconds) among runs that have CompletedOn.

measures.name: AveragePriority
measures.description: Average Priority value. Note: dataset contains large sentinel values (e.g., 2147483647) potentially indicating 'unset'  interpret accordingly.

measures.name: MinPriority
measures.description: Minimum Priority value observed.

measures.name: MaxPriority
measures.description: Maximum Priority value observed.

measures.name: RunsWithStatus_0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs with Status = 0. Status codes are numeric; map to business labels in a lookup/dimension if available.

measures.name: RunsWithStatus_2
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs with Status = 2. Status codes are numeric; map to business labels in a lookup/dimension if available.

measures.name: RunsWithStatus_3
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of runs with Status = 3. Status codes are numeric; map to business labels in a lookup/dimension if available.

measures.name: SearchCount
measures.description: Number of individual search requests (rows) in the selected scope.

measures.name: TotalResults
measures.description: Total number of results returned by all searches in the selected scope.

measures.name: AverageResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Average number of results returned per search.

measures.name: MaxResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Maximum results returned by a single search within the selected scope.

measures.name: MinResultsPerSearch
measures.description: Minimum results returned by a single search within the selected scope.

measures.name: ZeroResultSearchCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultsCount = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of searches that returned zero results.

measures.name: DistinctSearchTexts
measures.description: Number of distinct search text values observed in the selected scope.

measures.name: ResultCount
measures.description: Number of search result rows (rows in this fact).

measures.name: CurrentResultCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCurrent = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results flagged as current (IsCurrent = true).

measures.name: HasMultipleBusinessPointsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasMultipleBusinessPoints = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results where HasMultipleBusinessPoints is true.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPointId values in the result set (nulls excluded by DB engine semantics).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessUniqueIdCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessUniqueId values returned by searches.

measures.name: ResponseNonNullCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Response IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results that include a non-null Response payload (JSON).

measures.name: ComparisonStatus_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ComparisonStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results with ComparisonStatus = 1. (One of the status buckets; helps distribution analysis.)

measures.name: ComparisonStatus_2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ComparisonStatus = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results with ComparisonStatus = 2. (One of the status buckets; sample data shows many 2s.)

measures.name: ComparisonStatus_3_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ComparisonStatus = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results with ComparisonStatus = 3. (One of the status buckets.)

measures.name: AverageCompletenessRatio
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore) > 0 AND TRY_CAST(LEFT(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore)-1) AS FLOAT) IS NOT NULL AND TRY_CAST(SUBSTRING(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore)+1, 100) AS FLOAT) IS NOT NULL THEN TRY_CAST(LEFT(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore)-1) AS FLOAT) / NULLIF(TRY_CAST(SUBSTRING(CompletenessScore, CHARINDEX('/', CompletenessScore)+1, 100) AS FLOAT),0) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average completeness parsed from CompletenessScore strings like '8/9' (interpreted as numerator/denominator). Nulls or unparsable values are ignored.

measures.name: ProgressPoint Count
measures.description: Number of progress point rows (one per ID).

measures.name: Related Link Count
measures.description: Number of rows that have a related progress point linked (non-null RelatedID).

measures.name: RelatedActualFlag Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RelatedActualFlag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where RelatedActualFlag is true.

measures.name: RelatedActualFlag Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RelatedActualFlag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of progress points marked as related actual (RelatedActualFlag = true) out of all rows.

measures.name: RelatedDays Average
measures.description: Average RelatedDays value for rows where RelatedDays is populated.

measures.name: RelatedDays Min
measures.description: Minimum RelatedDays value observed.

measures.name: RelatedDays Max
measures.description: Maximum RelatedDays value observed.

measures.name: EstimatedDate Earliest
measures.description: Earliest EstimatedDate across rows (NULL if none).

measures.name: EstimatedDate Latest
measures.description: Latest EstimatedDate across rows (NULL if none).

measures.name: ActualDate Earliest
measures.description: Earliest ActualDate across rows (NULL if none).

measures.name: ActualDate Latest
measures.description: Latest ActualDate across rows (NULL if none).

measures.name: EstimatedDate Present Count
measures.description: Number of rows with an EstimatedDate value.

measures.name: ActualDate Present Count
measures.description: Number of rows with an ActualDate value.

measures.name: Comments Present Count
measures.description: Number of rows that have non-empty Comments.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of shipping records (rows) in this fact.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of the Amount values as recorded in the source. Source unit is not specified (could be monetary or quantity depending on upstream definition).

measures.name: TotalPackages
measures.description: Total number of packages across the selected records.

measures.name: TotalPalets
measures.description: Total number of palets across the selected records.

measures.name: AverageAmountPerPackage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Packages) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CAST(Amount AS FLOAT)) / SUM(Packages) END
measures.description: Average Amount per package (calculated as SUM(Amount) / SUM(Packages)). NULL when total packages is zero.

measures.name: PolicyCount
measures.description: Number of payment date policy records (one row per policy ID).

measures.name: PoliciesWithOtePayment
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OtePaymentFlag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of policies where the OTE payment flag is set (true).

measures.name: OtePaymentRate
measures.expression: AVG(CAST(CASE WHEN OtePaymentFlag = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END AS FLOAT))
measures.description: Share of policies with OTE payment flag set (0..100%).

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns referenced by the selected policies.

measures.name: AvgUdacCharacterization
measures.description: Average UDAC characterization score (UDAC is stored as integer codes). Useful as a high-level indicator of coded characterization.

measures.name: AvgPolicyDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration of the policy interval in days (ToDate - FromDate). Null-safe when FromDate/ToDate present.

measures.name: PoliciesWithCampaign
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CampaignID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of policies that are associated with a campaign (non-null CampaignID).

display.notes: PaymentDate is the natural date for time-series analysis. CustomerType and UdacCharacterization are coded integers; join to their lookup tables (if available) to show descriptive labels. CampaignID references dbo.Campaign.

measures.name: PaymentMethod Count
measures.description: Total number of payment method records (rows).

measures.name: Distinct Payment Method Types
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method types observed.

measures.name: Sum of Installments
measures.description: Total count of installments across all payment method records. Installments is generally an integer (often 1 in sample data).

measures.name: Average Installments
measures.description: Average number of installments per payment method.

measures.name: Sum of Interval
measures.description: Sum of interval values. Interval appears to be an integer interval (0 in sample).

measures.name: Sum of AdvancedPayment
measures.description: Total advanced payment amount recorded on payment methods. Currency inferred as EUR based on source locale; verify if a different currency applies.

measures.name: Average AdvancedPayment
measures.description: Average advanced payment amount per payment method record.

measures.name: Sum of NumberOfInvoices
measures.description: Total number of invoices associated with the payment methods.

measures.name: Exchange Sale Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of payment method records flagged as exchange sales.

measures.name: PaymentPhone Associated Count
measures.description: Count of payment method records that have a non-null PaymentPhoneID (i.e., associated phone entry).

measures.name: User Specified PaymentMonth Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UserSpecifiedPaymentMonth = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records where the payment month was explicitly specified by the user.

measures.name: Latest PaymentMonth
measures.description: Most recent PaymentMonth value recorded (null for many rows in sample).

measures.name: PaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Total number of payment method type records.

measures.name: ActivePaymentMethodCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment method types marked as active (IsActive = 1).

measures.name: PctActive
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of payment method types that are active (Active count / total count).

measures.name: AdvancedPaymentPermittedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AdvancedPaymentPermited = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment method types where advanced payment is permitted (AdvancedPaymentPermited = 1).

measures.name: PctAdvancedPaymentPermitted
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN AdvancedPaymentPermited = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of payment method types that permit advanced payment.

measures.name: AdvancedPaymentAvailableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AdvancedPaymentAvailable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment method types where advanced payment is available (AdvancedPaymentAvailable = 1).

measures.name: MaxInstallmentCount
measures.expression: MAX(CASE WHEN InstallmentSequence IS NULL OR InstallmentSequence = '' THEN NULL ELSE LEN(InstallmentSequence) - LEN(REPLACE(InstallmentSequence, ',', '')) + 1 END)
measures.description: Maximum number of installments present in the InstallmentSequence across payment method types. Computed by counting commas + 1; returns NULL for rows without an InstallmentSequence.

measures.name: DistinctPaymentWayCount
measures.description: Number of distinct values in the PaymentWay column.

foreign_keys.description: Self reference for subscription-related payment method types.

default_filters.description: By default show only active payment method types.

measures.name: Policies
measures.description: Number of payment policy records (distinct ID).

measures.name: TotalInvoices
measures.description: Total number of invoices represented by these policies (sum of NumberOfInvoices).

measures.name: AvgInvoicesPerPolicy
measures.description: Average number of invoices per policy.

measures.name: TotalInstallments
measures.description: Total installments across policies (sum of Installments).

measures.name: AvgInstallmentsPerPolicy
measures.description: Average number of installments per policy.

measures.name: AvgInterval
measures.description: Average interval value for policies (units as stored in the Interval column).

measures.name: AvgPriceFrom
measures.description: Average lower price bound (PriceFrom). Nulls are excluded from the average.

measures.name: AvgPriceTo
measures.description: Average upper price bound (PriceTo). Nulls are excluded from the average.

measures.name: MinPriceFrom
measures.description: Minimum PriceFrom value for the policies (ignores nulls).

measures.name: MaxPriceTo
measures.description: Maximum PriceTo value for the policies (ignores nulls).

measures.name: AvgPriceRangeWidth
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN PriceFrom IS NOT NULL AND PriceTo IS NOT NULL THEN PriceTo - PriceFrom END)
measures.description: Average difference between PriceTo and PriceFrom for policies where both bounds are present.

measures.name: PoliciesWithPriceBounds
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN PriceFrom IS NOT NULL OR PriceTo IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of policies that specify either a PriceFrom or a PriceTo (at least one price bound present).

measures.name: DistinctUdacCharacterizations
measures.description: Number of distinct UdacCharacterization codes present in the current scope.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of pricelist item rows (same as number of ID values).

measures.name: Distinct Products
measures.description: Number of distinct products referenced by these pricelist items.

measures.name: ApplyToSection Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ApplyToSection = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items where ApplyToSection flag is set (true).

measures.name: ApplyToSubSection Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ApplyToSubSection = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items where ApplyToSubSection flag is set (true).

measures.name: Inactive Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInactive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items explicitly marked as inactive.

measures.name: Active Count (includes nulls)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInactive = 0 OR IsInactive IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items considered active. Null IsInactive values are treated as active.

measures.name: Inactive Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInactive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of items marked inactive relative to total items.

measures.name: Active Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInactive = 0 OR IsInactive IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of items treated as active relative to total items.

measures.name: Average Items per VersionSection
measures.description: Average number of pricelist items per VersionSection (useful for understanding distribution across sections).

default_filters.description: By default show active items only (treats NULL as false/active).

measures.name: TotalUnitAmount
measures.description: Total of UnitAmount across matching pricelist item detail rows.

measures.name: AverageUnitAmount
measures.description: Average UnitAmount per pricelist item detail row.

measures.name: MinUnitAmount
measures.description: Minimum UnitAmount observed for the selected scope.

measures.name: MaxUnitAmount
measures.description: Maximum UnitAmount observed for the selected scope.

measures.name: PricelistItemDetailCount
measures.description: Count of pricelist item detail rows (at the defined grain).

measures.name: DistinctProductCount
measures.description: Number of distinct products referenced in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctProductPartCount
measures.description: Number of distinct product parts referenced (nulls are ignored).

measures.name: PositivePriceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UnitAmount > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows with UnitAmount greater than zero.

display.notes: Many UnitAmount values are zero in the source. Default filter excludes zero prices to focus on effective prices; remove filter to see all records.

measures.name: CountRanges
measures.description: Number of price range rows

measures.name: DistinctPriceListItemDetails
measures.description: Number of distinct PriceListItemDetail entities represented in the ranges

measures.name: MinPriceFrom
measures.description: Lowest 'PriceFrom' value in the selected set (start of lowest price bucket)

measures.name: MaxPriceTo
measures.description: Highest 'PriceTo' value in the selected set (null values indicate open-ended ranges and are ignored by this measure)

measures.name: AveragePriceRangeWidth
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN PriceTo IS NOT NULL THEN PriceTo - PriceFrom ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average width (PriceTo - PriceFrom) for ranges that have an upper bound; open-ended ranges (PriceTo IS NULL) are excluded

measures.name: OpenEndedRangeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PriceTo IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of ranges that do not have an upper bound (PriceTo is NULL)

measures.name: TotalOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts associated with the price ranges

measures.name: AverageOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Average one-time amount across ranges

measures.name: AverageExtraFeePercentage
measures.description: Average extra fee percentage applied for the ranges (stored as percentage points, e.g. 40 = 40%)

measures.name: MaxExtraFeePercentage
measures.description: Maximum extra fee percentage observed in the ranges

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of product rows in the ProductionCaseProduct table (each row represents a product assignment to a case).

measures.name: DistinctPricelistItems
measures.description: Number of distinct pricelist items referenced by these production case product rows.

measures.name: DistinctCases
measures.description: Number of distinct production cases represented in the table.

measures.name: ProductsPerCase_Avg
measures.description: Average number of product rows per case (total product rows divided by distinct cases). Returns NULL when there are no cases.

measures.name: DMKeyCoverage
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of rows that have a populated DMKey value (coverage of the data-mart key).

measures.name: PresaleFormCount
measures.description: Count of presale form submissions (one row per submission)

measures.name: AmountWebsite_Sum
measures.description: Total reported website-related amount from presale forms (sum of AmountWebsite). Nulls are ignored by the SUM aggregation.

measures.name: AmountXO_Sum
measures.description: Total reported XO-related amount from presale forms (sum of AmountXO). Many rows are null; SUM ignores nulls.

measures.name: MinBudgetPPC_Avg
measures.description: Average of the minimum PPC budget values supplied on presale forms. Nulls are ignored in the average.

measures.name: MaxBudgetPPC_Avg
measures.description: Average of the maximum PPC budget values supplied on presale forms. Nulls are ignored in the average.

measures.name: PercentWithWebsiteAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AmountWebsite IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of presale forms that include a non-null AmountWebsite value (percentage of total forms).

measures.name: PercentWithXOAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AmountXO IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Share of presale forms that include a non-null AmountXO value (percentage of total forms).

measures.name: Template Count
measures.description: Number of template records (one row per product template).

measures.name: Distinct Template Count
measures.description: Number of distinct XML template values stored in the table.

measures.name: Templates With DM Present
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DMKey IS NOT NULL OR DMTable IS NOT NULL OR DMCharKey IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of templates that have any downstream mapping (DMKey, DMTable or DMCharKey) populated.

measures.name: Template Null Percent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Template IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of rows for which the Template column is NULL (should normally be 0 for this table).

measures.name: Average Template Length (chars)
measures.description: Average number of characters in the Template XML across rows. Uses LEN() and therefore counts characters (not bytes).

measures.name: Maximum Template Length (chars)
measures.description: Maximum number of characters observed in the Template XML column.

measures.name: Total Template Size (bytes)
measures.description: Total storage size in bytes for all Template values (DATALENGTH returns byte size for NVARCHAR/XML). Useful for storage and ETL sizing.

measures.name: Average Entry Count (approx)
measures.description: Approximate average number of <Entry> elements per template calculated by counting occurrences of the substring '<Entry'. Useful to understand template complexity. This is an approximation based on string operations.

display.notes: Default breakdowns assume a Product dimension joined via the ID foreign key. 'HasDM' is a suggested boolean breakdown derived from DMKey/DMTable/DMCharKey presence.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of production case product records (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: DistinctCases
measures.description: Count of unique production cases referenced by these product rows.

measures.name: DistinctPricelistItems
measures.description: Count of unique pricelist items referenced by these production case product rows.

measures.name: AvgProductsPerCase
measures.description: Average number of product rows per case (records / distinct cases). NULL if there are no cases.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of product-kit membership records (rows)

measures.name: DistinctMemberCount
measures.description: Count of distinct member products referenced in the kit members

measures.name: DistinctKitCount
measures.description: Count of distinct kits represented in the current context

measures.name: MandatoryMemberCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsMandatory = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of members marked as mandatory within kits

measures.name: MandatoryPercentage
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsMandatory = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of kit-member rows that are mandatory

measures.name: AverageFillOrder
measures.description: Average fill order position for members within kits (numeric ordering indicator)

measures.name: Relationship Records
measures.description: Total number of relationship rows (each row represents one relation between two contracts).

measures.name: Distinct Primary Contracts
measures.description: Number of distinct primary contracts that have at least one related contract recorded.

measures.name: Distinct Related Contracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that appear as related contracts.

measures.name: Avg Relationships per Primary Contract
measures.description: Average number of related-contract rows per primary contract (total relationships divided by distinct primary contracts).

measures.name: Self-related Relations
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID = RelatedContractID THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of relationship rows where a contract is related to itself (ContractID = RelatedContractID).

measures.name: Renewal Relationships
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = N'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of relationships whose Type indicates a renewal (Type = '').

measures.name: Share of Renewals
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = N'' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of relationship records that are renewals (Type = '').

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total collected amount (sum of Amount). Amount column has 3 decimal precision. Often analyzed for non-deleted rows by filtering IsDeleted = 0.

measures.name: CollectionCount
measures.description: Number of collection transactions (row count).

measures.name: ActiveCollectionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of collection transactions that are not marked deleted (IsDeleted = 0).

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average Amount per collection transaction. Nulls ignored.

measures.name: MinAmount
measures.description: Minimum transaction Amount recorded.

measures.name: MaxAmount
measures.description: Maximum transaction Amount recorded.

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceipts
measures.description: Number of distinct system receipt numbers present in the dataset.

measures.name: TransferredToERPCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of collections that have been transferred to ERP (TransferDateToERP is not null).

measures.name: AvgTransferDelayDays
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN TransferDateToERP IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, TransferDateToERP)/86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average delay in days between CreatedOn and TransferDateToERP for rows that were transferred. Nulls ignored.

measures.name: CollectionsByPaymentType
measures.description: Count of collections; commonly broken down by PaymentType to show counts per payment method.

measures.name: Total Working Days
measures.description: Total number of working days for the salesperson in the campaign period (row-level aggregation).

measures.name: Total Visits
measures.description: Total number of visits recorded for the salesperson during the campaign period.

measures.name: CO Visits
measures.description: Visits classified as CO (carry-over / continuation) during the campaign period.

measures.name: New Visits
measures.description: Visits to new prospects or newly registered visits during the campaign period.

measures.name: CO Customers
measures.description: Number of customers attributed to CO visits (carry-over/continued customers).

measures.name: CO Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount (USD) associated with CO customers/visits.

measures.name: Loss Customers
measures.description: Number of customers lost in the campaign period.

measures.name: Loss Amount
measures.description: Monetary value (USD) lost due to customer attrition in the campaign period.

measures.name: Increase Customers
measures.description: Number of customers that increased purchases (compared to baseline) during the campaign.

measures.name: Increase Amount
measures.description: Additional monetary amount (USD) resulting from customers who increased purchases.

measures.name: Reduction Customers
measures.description: Number of customers that reduced purchases during the campaign period.

measures.name: Reduction Amount
measures.description: Monetary decrease (USD) resulting from customers who reduced purchases.

measures.name: No Changes Customers
measures.description: Number of customers whose behavior did not change during the campaign.

measures.name: No Changes Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount (USD) from customers with no change in behavior.

measures.name: ROCO Customers
measures.description: Number of customers that returned/reactivated (ROCO) during the campaign period.

measures.name: ROCO Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount (USD) associated with returned/reactivated customers.

measures.name: New Customers
measures.description: Number of newly acquired customers during the campaign period.

measures.name: New Amount
measures.description: Monetary amount (USD) attributed to newly acquired customers.

measures.name: Total Customers
measures.description: Total number of customers reached/recorded for the salesperson during the campaign period.

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Total monetary amount (USD) associated with the salesperson for the campaign period.

measures.name: Average Amount per Customer
measures.expression: CASE WHEN NULLIF(SUM(TotalCustomers),0) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalAmount) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalCustomers),0) END
measures.description: Average revenue (USD) per customer = TotalAmount / TotalCustomers. Null-safe division.

measures.name: Visits per Working Day
measures.expression: CASE WHEN NULLIF(SUM(TotalWorkingDays),0) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalVisits) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalWorkingDays),0) END
measures.description: Average number of visits per working day for the salesperson during the campaign.

measures.name: Average Visit Value
measures.expression: CASE WHEN NULLIF(SUM(TotalVisits),0) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalAmount) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalVisits),0) END
measures.description: Average monetary value (USD) per visit = TotalAmount / TotalVisits.

measures.name: New Customer Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN NULLIF(SUM(TotalCustomers),0) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUM(NewCustomers) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalCustomers),0) END
measures.description: Proportion of customers that are new in the campaign = NewCustomers / TotalCustomers.

measures.name: Loss Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN NULLIF(SUM(TotalCustomers),0) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUM(LossCustomers) / NULLIF(SUM(TotalCustomers),0) END
measures.description: Proportion of customers lost in the campaign period = LossCustomers / TotalCustomers.

measures.name: CO Conversion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN NULLIF(SUM(COVisits),0) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE SUM(COCustomers) / NULLIF(SUM(COVisits),0) END
measures.description: Conversion rate for CO visits = COCustomers / COVisits.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (history records) in the SalesTreeHistory table.

measures.name: ActiveRecordCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records not marked as deleted (IsDeleted = 0).

measures.name: DeletedRecordCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as deleted (IsDeleted = 1).

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct SalesmanID values represented in this dataset.

measures.name: DistinctSupervisors
measures.description: Number of distinct SupervisorID values represented in this dataset.

measures.name: DistinctManagers
measures.description: Number of distinct ManagerID values represented in this dataset.

measures.name: DistinctSegments
measures.description: Number of distinct SegmentID values represented in this dataset.

measures.name: SnapshotYearMin
measures.description: Earliest Year value present in this snapshot of the history table.

measures.name: SnapshotYearMax
measures.description: Latest Year value present in this snapshot of the history table.

measures.name: SnapshotCreatedOn
measures.description: Latest CreatedOn timestamp for records in this snapshot (useful to know when the snapshot was taken).

measures.name: JobCount
measures.description: Number of job history records (rows).

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct job batches represented in the current aggregation scope.

measures.name: RowsAffectedTotal
measures.description: Total number of rows affected by the jobs. Null values are ignored.

measures.name: RowsAffectedAverage
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per job (computed over non-null RowsAffected).

measures.name: RowsAffectedMax
measures.description: Maximum number of rows affected by a single job execution in the aggregation scope.

measures.name: SuccessfulJobs
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of job history records marked with Status = 1 (interpreted as successful runs).

measures.name: FailedJobs
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status <> 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of job history records not marked with Status = 1 (interpreted as non-successful runs).

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of jobs that succeeded (Status = 1) as a fraction of total jobs in the aggregation scope.

display.notes: Status is treated as 1 = success by convention in these measures. Type has a single value in the sample and is not used by default filters.

measures.name: TargetItemCount
measures.description: Number of rows / target group items (one row per target item).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCodes
measures.description: Count of distinct customer codes represented in the target set (Code field). Useful as a proxy for unique customers when Code is present.

measures.name: HasPhoneCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND Phone <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items with at least one phone number recorded.

measures.name: PhoneCoveragePct
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND Phone <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0))
measures.description: Percent of target items that have a phone number recorded.

measures.name: HasFullAddressCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN StreetName IS NOT NULL AND StreetName <> '' AND StreetNumber IS NOT NULL AND StreetNumber <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items where both street name and street number are present (basic address completeness).

measures.name: AddressCompletenessPct
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN StreetName IS NOT NULL AND StreetName <> '' AND StreetNumber IS NOT NULL AND StreetNumber <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0))
measures.description: Percent of target items with both street name and number populated.

measures.name: PaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items flagged with a payment refusal.

measures.name: DisappearedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Disappeared = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items flagged as disappeared.

measures.name: PrecariousnessLegalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PrecariousnessLegal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items marked with legal precariousness.

measures.name: ContinuousPaymentRefusalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContinuousPaymentRefusal = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items with continuous payment refusals.

measures.name: SealedCheckCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SealedCheck = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items flagged with sealed checks.

measures.name: ReliabilityRedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus = 'RED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items whose reliability status is explicitly 'RED'.

measures.name: ReliabilityRedPct
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus = 'RED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0))
measures.description: Percent of target items with reliability status 'RED' (risk indicator).

measures.name: ReliabilityKnownCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ReliabilityStatus IS NOT NULL AND ReliabilityStatus <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of target items with any reliability status recorded.

measures.name: ItemCount
measures.description: Number of target-group item rows (rows in this table).

measures.name: BalanceValue
measures.description: Sum of current balance values for the item.

measures.name: DueBalanceValue
measures.description: Sum of due balances for the item.

measures.name: SettlementBalanceValue
measures.description: Sum of settlement balances for the item.

measures.name: CancelAmount
measures.description: Total cancelled amount (currency).

measures.name: CreditInvoiceValue
measures.description: Sum of credit invoice values.

measures.name: ExchangeSaleValue
measures.description: Sum of exchange-sale values.

measures.name: TotalPreprintedValue
measures.description: Total value for preprinted items (print + internet + multimedia).

measures.name: ExpirationValueInternet
measures.description: Sum of internet expiration values.

measures.name: SubscriptionValue
measures.description: Sum of subscription values.

measures.name: PBDContractsTotal
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Aggregate of PBD (print-business-directory?) contract values across all Y01..Y12 year buckets.

measures.name: PADContractsTotal
measures.expression: SUM(Y01PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11PADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12PADContractsValue)
measures.description: Aggregate of PAD contract values across all Y01..Y12 year buckets.

measures.name: IBDContractsTotal
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IBDContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IBDContractsValue)
measures.description: Aggregate of IBD contract values across all Y01..Y12 year buckets.

measures.name: IADContractsTotal
measures.expression: SUM(Y01IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y02IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y03IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y04IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y05IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y06IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y07IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y08IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y09IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y10IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y11IADContractsValue) + SUM(Y12IADContractsValue)
measures.description: Aggregate of IAD contract values across all Y01..Y12 year buckets.

measures.name: Y01Entries
measures.description: Total number of entries for Y01.

measures.name: Y02Entries
measures.description: Total number of entries for Y02.

measures.name: Y01DirectoriesSections
measures.description: Total directories/sections for Y01.

measures.name: Y02DirectoriesSections
measures.description: Total directories/sections for Y02.

measures.name: HasOnlineCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasOnline = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of items that have online presence (HasOnline flag).

measures.name: HasGraphicFileCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasGraphicFile = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of items that have an associated graphic file.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of TargetGroupItemValue rows

measures.name: TotalTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of TargetValue for the target group item (stored with 3 decimal places)

measures.name: AvgTargetValue
measures.description: Average TargetValue

measures.name: TotalChannelTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of Channel-level target values

measures.name: AvgChannelTargetValue
measures.description: Average ChannelTargetValue

measures.name: TotalUserTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of User-level target values

measures.name: AvgUserTargetValue
measures.description: Average UserTargetValue

measures.name: TotalRequestedDiscountAmount
measures.description: Total requested discount amount (currency)

measures.name: AvgRequestedDiscountAmount
measures.description: Average requested discount amount

measures.name: AvgRequestedDiscountPercentage
measures.description: Average requested discount percentage

measures.name: TotalFixOfferDiffValue
measures.description: Sum of fix-offer difference values

measures.name: TotalVisits
measures.description: Total number of visits recorded

measures.name: TotalLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew counter (loss/print indicator)

measures.name: ReleasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows marked as released

measures.name: ClosedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsClosed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows marked as closed

measures.name: PctReleased
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of records that are marked as released (ReleasedCount / RowCount)

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of tasks (row count).

measures.name: Completed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a completion timestamp.

measures.name: Open Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that are not completed (no CompletedOn).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Portion of tasks that are completed (Completed Count / Task Count).

measures.name: Average Time to Complete (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) / 86400.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average elapsed time from task creation to completion in days (fractional). Nulls ignored.

measures.name: Completed Within 7 Days
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL AND DATEDIFF(day, CreatedOn, CompletedOn) <= 7 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks completed within 7 days of creation.

measures.name: Average Time to Save (hours)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN SavedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(second, CreatedOn, SavedOn) / 3600.0 ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average time between CreatedOn and SavedOn in hours (where SavedOn exists). Useful to measure intermediate persist/save latency.

display.notes: Status, SubStatus and EditorState appear to be low-cardinality or constant in profiling; treat them as attributes/flags rather than numeric measures unless domain knowledge indicates otherwise.

measures.name: TotalActions
measures.description: Total number of action log records (one row per logged action).

measures.name: ActionFlagCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of action rows where Action = 1. (Action appears to be a binary/enum flag; 1 likely indicates the primary action state.)

measures.name: ActionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Action = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of action rows where Action = 1 (ActionFlagCount / TotalActions).

measures.name: UniqueTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks referenced by the action log within the aggregation window.

measures.name: AverageActionsPerTask
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT TaskId) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * COUNT(ID) / COUNT(DISTINCT TaskId) END
measures.description: Average number of action rows per task (TotalActions / UniqueTasks).

measures.name: FirstActionDate
measures.description: Earliest action timestamp in the aggregation window.

measures.name: LastActionDate
measures.description: Latest action timestamp in the aggregation window.

measures.name: ActionDateSpanDays
