measures.expression: CASE WHEN MIN(ActionDate) IS NULL OR MAX(ActionDate) IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE DATEDIFF(day, MIN(ActionDate), MAX(ActionDate)) END
measures.description: Number of days between the first and last recorded action in the aggregation window.

measures.name: LogCount
measures.description: Number of TaskLog rows (events).

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have at least one log entry.

measures.name: AvgEventsPerTask
measures.description: Average number of log events per task (LogCount / DistinctTaskCount). Null when there are no tasks.

measures.name: HasOutcomeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of log rows where an Outcome value is present.

measures.name: HasOutcomePct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of log events that include an Outcome (HasOutcomeCount / LogCount).

measures.name: HasTextCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Text IS NOT NULL AND LEN(Text) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of log rows that include non-empty Text notes.

measures.name: HasTextPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Text IS NOT NULL AND LEN(Text) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of log events that include non-empty Text notes.

measures.name: AvgTextLengthChars
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Text IS NOT NULL THEN LEN(Text) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average length (characters) of the Text field for rows that have text.

measures.name: FirstTimestamp
measures.description: Earliest recorded timestamp in the selected set of log rows.

measures.name: LastTimestamp
measures.description: Most recent recorded timestamp in the selected set of log rows.

measures.name: AvgDaysToOutcome
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN OutcomeDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, Timestamp, OutcomeDate) ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Average number of days between the log Timestamp and OutcomeDate for rows where OutcomeDate exists.

measures.name: LastOutcomeDate
measures.description: Most recent OutcomeDate present in the selected set of rows (null if none).

display.notes: Outcome and Text are stored in Greek collation (Greek_CI_AS). DMKey/DMTable/DMCharKey are rarely populated and are not modeled to specific dimension tables here.

measures.name: Assignment Count
measures.description: Total number of task-type-assignment rows.

measures.name: Distinct Task Type Count
measures.description: Number of distinct TaskType IDs referenced by assignments.

measures.name: Assignments With Role
measures.description: Number of assignments that have a non-null RoleID (assignments tied to a role).

measures.name: AssignmentType = 0 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AssignmentType = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments where AssignmentType = 0.

measures.name: AssignmentType = 1 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AssignmentType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments where AssignmentType = 1.

measures.name: AssignmentType = 2 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AssignmentType = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments where AssignmentType = 2.

measures.name: AssignmentType = 0 Percent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AssignmentType = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of assignments with AssignmentType = 0 (as a percent of total assignments).

measures.name: SpecialType Count (non-null)
measures.description: Number of assignments that have a non-null SpecialType value.

measures.name: Distinct SpecialType Count
measures.description: Number of distinct SpecialType values present in the assignments.

measures.name: Options Present Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Options IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Options)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments where the Options field contains a non-empty value.

measures.name: Tickets
measures.description: Total number of tickets (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points referenced by tickets.

measures.name: CompletedTickets
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn).

measures.name: OpenTickets
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that are not completed (no CompletedOn).

measures.name: CompletionRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of tickets that have been completed (CompletedTickets / Tickets).

measures.name: AvgResolutionTimeMinutes
measures.description: Average time in minutes from ticket creation to completion. Excludes rows where CompletedOn is NULL.

measures.name: AvgTimeToReceiveMinutes
measures.description: Average time in minutes from ticket creation to when it was received. Excludes rows where ReceivedOn is NULL.

measures.name: SumCreditAmount
measures.description: Total credited amount associated with tickets. Many rows appear to be null; verify source population before relying on this measure.

measures.name: SumCancelAmount
measures.description: Total cancellation amount associated with tickets. Many rows appear to be null; verify source population before relying on this measure.

measures.name: NeedEvalCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedEval = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets flagged as needing evaluation.

measures.name: NeedSupervisorCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedSupervisor = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that require a supervisor.

measures.name: ResultCommCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultComm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets with a communication result flag set (ResultComm).

measures.name: HandledTicketsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HandlerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets that have a handler assigned.

display.notes: CreatedOn is a good temporal dimension for slicing measures. Many optional / monetary fields (CreditAmount, CancelAmount) are sparsely populated in the sample  validate their usage before relying on them in dashboards.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of history rows (events).

measures.name: DistinctTicketCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets represented in this history.

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements referenced in the history.

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks associated with these history rows.

measures.name: WorkDoneInProductionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsWorkDoneInProduction = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of history rows where work was done in production.

measures.name: WorkDoneInProductionShare
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsWorkDoneInProduction = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of history rows where work was done in production (percentage of total rows).

measures.name: HistoryTypeValue
measures.description: History type code. Note: current data shows a single value (0) for all rows.

measures.name: Communication Count
measures.description: Number of communication records (messages).

measures.name: Distinct Ticket Count
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets that have at least one communication in the current filter context.

measures.name: Total Characters
measures.description: Total number of characters across all communication texts in the current filter context.

measures.name: Average Characters Per Communication
measures.description: Average number of characters per communication message.

measures.name: Total Words (approx.)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL([CommunicationText],'')) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (LEN(ISNULL([CommunicationText],'')) - LEN(REPLACE([CommunicationText],' ','')) + 1) END)
measures.description: Approximate total word count across communications. Uses spaces to estimate words; punctuation and multi-space sequences may affect accuracy.

measures.name: Average Words Per Communication (approx.)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL([CommunicationText],'')) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (LEN(ISNULL([CommunicationText],'')) - LEN(REPLACE([CommunicationText],' ','')) + 1) END)
measures.description: Approximate average number of words per communication message.

measures.name: Empty Communication Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [CommunicationText] IS NULL OR LEN([CommunicationText]) = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of communication rows where the message text is empty or NULL.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of ticket-task result records (rows)

measures.name: UniqueTickets
measures.description: Number of distinct tickets represented in this fact

measures.name: UniqueTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented in this fact

measures.name: ResolvedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results marked as resolved (Result = 1)

measures.name: ResolvedRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Result = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of rows with Result = 1 (Resolved / Total rows)

measures.name: PerformedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PerformedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions that have a recorded performed timestamp

measures.name: PendingReviewCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PendingReview = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results currently flagged as pending review

measures.name: ResultCustomerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultCustomer = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results confirmed or indicated by the customer

measures.name: ResultCommCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ResultComm = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of results that have a communication flag (ResultComm)

measures.name: UniquePerformers
measures.description: Number of distinct users who performed tasks (PerformedByID)

measures.name: AvgActionsPerTicket
measures.description: Average number of task-result actions recorded per ticket

measures.name: EarliestPerformedOn
measures.description: Earliest PerformedOn timestamp in the current grain/group

measures.name: LatestPerformedOn
measures.description: Latest PerformedOn timestamp in the current grain/group

measures.name: EventCount
measures.description: Number of logged events (one row per event ID).

measures.name: TotalRowsProcessed
measures.description: Total number of rows processed or affected across all logged events (sum of RowCountVal).

measures.name: AverageRowsPerEvent
measures.description: Average number of rows processed per event (average of RowCountVal).

measures.name: TotalDataSizeBytes
measures.description: Total data size in bytes associated with logged events (sum of DataSize).

measures.name: AverageDataSizeBytes
measures.description: Average data size in bytes per event (average of DataSize).

measures.name: TotalLogSizeBytes
measures.description: Total log size in bytes associated with logged events (sum of LogSize).

measures.name: AverageLogSizeBytes
measures.description: Average log size in bytes per event (average of LogSize).

measures.name: DistinctEventGroups
measures.description: Number of distinct EventGroup identifiers observed in the selected scope.

measures.name: ArchiveCount
measures.description: Number of archive records (one per ID).

measures.name: TotalRecs
measures.description: Sum of the Recs column: total number of rows summarized by the archive segments.

measures.name: AverageRecsPerArchive
measures.description: Average number of rows (Recs) per archive record.

measures.name: DistinctEventGroups
measures.description: Number of distinct EventGroup identifiers represented in the filtered set.

measures.name: TotalXml_RowCountVal
measures.expression: SUM( (SELECT SUM(t.c.value('@RowCountVal','bigint')) FROM XmlData.nodes('/row') AS t(c)) )
measures.description: Total of the RowCountVal attributes found inside the XmlData for each archive row. Requires SQL Server XQuery evaluation of XmlData.

measures.name: MaxXml_DataSize
measures.expression: MAX( (SELECT MAX(t.c.value('@DataSize','bigint')) FROM XmlData.nodes('/row') AS t(c)) )
measures.description: Maximum DataSize attribute (in bytes) observed inside the XmlData for the archive. Extracted from XmlData XML nodes; requires XQuery.

measures.name: MaxXml_LogSize
measures.expression: MAX( (SELECT MAX(t.c.value('@LogSize','bigint')) FROM XmlData.nodes('/row') AS t(c)) )
measures.description: Maximum LogSize attribute (in bytes) observed inside the XmlData for the archive. Extracted from XmlData XML nodes; requires XQuery.

foreign_keys.description: EventDate can be linked to a date dimension (DimDate). Prefer mapping by converting EventDate to the DimDate key (DateKey).
Suggested reference to an EventGroup dimension keyed by EventGroup GUID. There is no enforced FK in source but creating a dimension for EventGroup improves analysis.

default_filters.description: Hide archive rows with zero recorded rows by default.

measures.name: Views_Count
measures.description: Number of advertisement view records (row count).

measures.name: Distinct_Advertisements
measures.description: Number of unique advertisements in the current filter context.

measures.name: Distinct_Contracts
measures.description: Number of unique contracts represented in the view.

measures.name: Adv_Gross_Price
measures.description: Sum of advertisement list prices (gross) before discounts.

measures.name: Adv_Total_Discount
measures.description: Sum of direct discounts applied to advertisements.

measures.name: Adv_Rules_Discount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied by rules for advertisements.

measures.name: Adv_Net_Revenue
measures.description: Net revenue for advertisements after subtracting discounts and rules discounts.

measures.name: CP_Gross_Price
measures.description: Sum of contract-product list prices (gross) before discounts.

measures.name: CP_Total_Discount
measures.description: Sum of direct discounts applied at the contract-product level.

measures.name: CP_Rules_Discount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied by rules at the contract-product level.

measures.name: CP_Net_Revenue
measures.description: Net revenue for contract-products after subtracting discounts and rules discounts.

measures.name: Avg_Adv_Price
measures.description: Average advertisement price.

measures.name: Avg_CP_Price
measures.description: Average contract-product price.

measures.name: Adv_Average_Discount_Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Adv_Price) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(Adv_Discount) / NULLIF(SUM(Adv_Price),0) END
measures.description: Share of discount relative to gross advertisement price (Adv_Discount / Adv_Price). Null when gross price is zero.

measures.name: CP_Average_Discount_Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(CP_Price) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CP_Discount) / NULLIF(SUM(CP_Price),0) END
measures.description: Share of discount relative to gross contract-product price (CP_Discount / CP_Price). Null when gross price is zero.

measures.name: Average_Advertisement_Duration_Days
measures.description: Average number of days between advertisement begin date and end date (uses current date when end date is null).

measures.name: ContractCount
measures.description: Total number of contract records (row count) in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct business partner customers (C_BPID) represented by the contracts.

measures.name: ActiveContractCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_BPIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts whose customer business partner is marked active (C_BPIsActive = true).

measures.name: SignedContractCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN C_Signdate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts that have a sign date (C_Signdate not null).

measures.name: PercentSigned
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(C_ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN C_Signdate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(C_ID) END
measures.description: Share of contracts that are signed (SignedContractCount / ContractCount).

measures.name: AverageDaysToSign
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN C_Signdate IS NOT NULL AND C_CreatedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, C_CreatedOn, C_Signdate) END)
measures.description: Average elapsed days between contract creation (C_CreatedOn) and sign date (C_Signdate). Nulls are ignored.

default_filters.description: Show only contracts that have been signed by default

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of contract-product rows in the result (row-level count).

measures.name: DistinctProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct products represented in the selected rows.

measures.name: TotalListPrice
measures.description: Sum of listed product prices before any discounts.

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Sum of all discounts applied to products (explicit discount plus rules-based discount).

measures.name: TotalRulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of discounts that originate from pricing rules.

measures.name: TotalNetRevenue
measures.description: Net revenue after subtracting all discounts from the listed price.

measures.name: AverageListPrice
measures.description: Average listed price per contract-product row.

measures.name: DiscountRate
measures.description: Share of discounts relative to gross charged amount (discounts / (price + discounts)); null when denominator is zero.

measures.name: SubscriptionBasedCount

measures.description: Number of contract-products flagged as subscription-based.

measures.name: RenewableCount

measures.description: Number of contract-products flagged as renewable.

measures.description: Number of contract-products flagged as already renewed.

measures.name: ActiveContractProducts

measures.name: WebSiteAmount

measures.name: TargetingAmountByUser

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints

measures.name: ActiveItemCount

measures.description: Count of items where ItemStatus = 1 (active).

measures.name: WorkingItemCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN WorkingStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of items where WorkingStatus = 1 (working/selected).

measures.name: AverageScoreTotal

measures.name: MaxScoreTotal

measures.name: AverageScoreCustomerBehavior

measures.name: AverageScoreMainActivity

measures.name: AverageScoreDifferenceToAvg

measures.name: Active Items Count

measures.name: Working Items Count

measures.name: Average Score - Main Activity

measures.name: Average Score - Value / Billing Range
measures.description: Average score for value / billing range component

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of market item rows (records) in the aggregation.

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented.

measures.name: SumOfferAmount
measures.description: Total offer amount for the rows (sum of OfferAmount). Null OfferAmount values are ignored.

measures.name: AvgOfferAmount
measures.description: Average offer amount (ignores null OfferAmount values).

measures.name: MinOfferAmount
measures.description: Minimum offer amount found in the aggregation.

measures.name: MaxOfferAmount
measures.description: Maximum offer amount found in the aggregation.

measures.name: OfferAmountMissingRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Fraction of rows with no OfferAmount (NULL) expressed as a percentage of total rows.

measures.name: SumLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew values. Interprets LossPrintedNew as a numeric indicator/count recorded on the row.

measures.name: BPIdentityConfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the Business Point identity is confirmed.

measures.name: IsRedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows marked red (IsRed = 1).

measures.name: IsRedRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of rows flagged as red.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (based on CustomerCodeNumeric) present in the aggregation.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows returned from the view (useful for high-level volumes).

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Count of distinct tasks represented in the current query context.

measures.name: CaseCount
measures.description: Count of distinct case records associated with the rows in scope.

measures.name: OfferAmountSum
measures.description: Total of OfferAmount values. Many rows have NULL OfferAmount; sum ignores NULLs.

measures.name: OfferAmountAvg
measures.description: Average OfferAmount across rows with an OfferAmount value.

measures.name: OfferAmountCount
measures.description: Number of rows with a non-null OfferAmount (useful to understand coverage of monetary data).

measures.name: LossPrintedNewSum
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew values (integer flag/count). Values appear to be small integers (e.g. 0,1,2).

measures.name: LossPrintedNewAvg
measures.description: Average LossPrintedNew per row (useful to understand typical printed-loss level).

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.description: Number of rows marked as subscription (IsSubscription appears constant=0 in sample; include for completeness).

measures.name: UDFValue01Sum
measures.description: Sum of UDFValue01 (user-defined numeric field). Sample shows constant 0.

measures.name: UDFValue02Sum
measures.description: Sum of UDFValue02 (user-defined numeric field). Sample shows constant 0.

measures.name: AppointmentsScheduled
measures.description: Count of rows with a non-null AppointmentDateTime (number of scheduled appointments).

measures.name: BPIdentityConfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points where identity was confirmed (BPIdentityConfirmed bit).

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of task records (rows). TaskID is the grain key.

measures.name: Distinct Customer Count
measures.description: Number of distinct customers represented in the selected set (based on CustomerCode).

measures.name: Total Offer Amount
measures.description: Sum of OfferAmount for tasks. Nulls treated as zero by SQL aggregation semantics.

measures.name: Average Offer Amount
measures.description: Average OfferAmount across tasks (NULLs ignored). Useful to understand typical offer size.

measures.name: Minimum Offer Amount
measures.description: Minimum recorded OfferAmount for the filtered task set.

measures.name: Maximum Offer Amount
measures.description: Maximum recorded OfferAmount for the filtered task set.

measures.name: Loss Printed Count
measures.description: Count of tasks with LossPrintedNew flag set (values expected 0/1).

measures.name: Scheduled Appointment Count
measures.description: Number of tasks that have an AppointmentDateTime (counts non-null appointments).

measures.name: Subscription Count (flag)
measures.description: Sum of IsSubscription flag (typically 0/1). May be zero if not used in source.

measures.name: UDF Value 01 (Total)
measures.description: Total of user-defined numeric field UDFValue01 (source appears constant in sample).

measures.name: UDF Value 02 (Total)
measures.description: Total of user-defined numeric field UDFValue02 (source appears constant in sample).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the view for the selected filter context

measures.name: DistinctTasks
measures.description: Count of distinct tasks

measures.name: DistinctPotentialOwners
measures.description: Count of distinct potential owners referenced in the rows

measures.name: OfferAmount_Sum
measures.description: Total offered amount (sum of OfferAmount). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: OfferAmount_Average
measures.description: Average offered amount per row (ignores null OfferAmount).

measures.name: OfferAmount_Present_Count
measures.description: Number of rows with a non-null OfferAmount

measures.name: OfferAmount_Present_Percentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 100.0 * COUNT(OfferAmount) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of rows that have a non-null OfferAmount

measures.name: LossPrintedNew_Sum
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew values (counts/indicator depending on business meaning)

measures.name: Subscribers_Sum
measures.description: Sum of IsSubscription flags (counts rows marked as subscriptions). May be zero if field is constant.

measures.name: BPIdentityConfirmed_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points where BP identity has been confirmed

measures.name: UDFValue01_Average
measures.description: Average of custom numeric field UDFValue01

measures.name: UDFValue02_Average
measures.description: Average of custom numeric field UDFValue02

display.notes: Preferred date breakdown is TaskCreatedOn (use date dimension for day/month/year). OfferAmount uses currency USD per source hints.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Total number of task assignment records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCaseCount
measures.description: Number of distinct cases referenced by these tasks.

measures.name: ActiveTasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that are not completed (CompletedOn is NULL). Useful to measure open work.

measures.name: AssignedPotentialOwnerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PotentialOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have a potential owner assigned.

measures.name: ActualOwnerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have an actual owner recorded.

measures.name: UniqueDynamicCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct DynamicCode values referenced by these tasks.

measures.name: UnassignedPercentage
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN PotentialOwnerID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of tasks without a potential owner assigned (PotentialOwnerID is NULL).

measures.name: AverageAgeDays
measures.description: Average age of tasks in days since CreatedOn to today. Nulls in CreatedOn are excluded.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (activity records) in the view

measures.name: DistinctTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented in the result set

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (CustomerCode) touched by activities

measures.name: TotalOfferAmount
measures.description: Sum of OfferAmount for activities. Nulls are ignored by the SUM aggregate.

measures.name: AverageOfferAmount
measures.description: Average OfferAmount per row (ignores NULLs)

measures.name: PercentRowsWithOffer
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN OfferAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0)
measures.description: Share of rows that include an OfferAmount value

measures.name: ReleasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the campaign/task row is marked as released

measures.name: AppointmentScheduledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of activities that have an appointment date/time scheduled

measures.name: LossPrintedFlagCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LossPrintedNew > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where LossPrintedNew indicates a loss/printed state (value > 0)

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points involved in the activities

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Number of rows (assignments) in the view. At the defined grain this will typically be 1 per record.

measures.name: DistinctTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented by the filtered set of rows.

measures.name: DistinctStakeHolders
measures.description: Number of distinct stakeholders present in the data. Note: current profiling indicates a single stakeholder value across the sample.

measures.name: AssignedFlagCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN StakeHolderUserID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where a stakeholder user is assigned (StakeHolderUserID is not null). Useful when the dataset may include unassigned tasks.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Total number of tasks (rows) in the view for the selected filter/context.

measures.name: OpenTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that do not have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is NULL). In the current sample CompletedOn is always NULL, so this may equal TaskCount.

measures.name: CompletedTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is NOT NULL). Note: CompletedOn shows 100% null in the sampled data; this measure may be zero or sparse.

measures.name: PercentCompleted
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of tasks that are completed. Returns NULL when there are no tasks in the current context. Because CompletedOn is null in the sample, this will often be 0%.

measures.name: DistinctActualOwners
measures.description: Number of distinct actual owners (users) assigned to tasks in the current context.

measures.name: TasksPerOwnerAvg
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT ActualOwnerID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT ActualOwnerID) END
measures.description: Average number of tasks per actual owner. Returns NULL when there are no owners in the current context.

measures.name: AvgDaysToComplete
measures.description: Average elapsed days between task creation and completion. Will be NULL if no tasks have CompletedOn populated (sample shows CompletedOn null for all rows).

measures.name: EditorState0Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EditorState = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks whose EditorState = 0. Useful to measure distribution of editor states; additional EditorState buckets can be derived similarly.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of task rows (one row per TaskID). Use this as the primary row-count measure for the fact.

measures.name: DistinctCases
measures.description: Count of distinct case IDs referenced by tasks.

measures.name: DistinctSenders
measures.description: Count of distinct task senders (TaskSenderID). Nulls are excluded.

measures.name: DistinctActualOwners
measures.description: Count of distinct actual owners assigned to tasks.

measures.name: OpenTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskStatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks where TaskStatus = 0. Note: TaskStatus in the sampled data is constant (0).

measures.name: TaskStatusValue
measures.description: Representative numeric task status code (aggregated via MAX). In the available sample TaskStatus is constant (0).

measures.name: TaskCaseStateValue
measures.description: Representative numeric case state code (aggregated via MAX). Sample data shows a single value (0).

measures.name: EarliestCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest TaskCreatedOn in the filtered set.

measures.name: LatestCreatedOn
measures.description: Latest TaskCreatedOn in the filtered set.

measures.name: AverageAgeDays
measures.description: Average age in days of tasks measured from TaskCreatedOn to current date/time. Null TaskCreatedOn rows are ignored.

display.notes: TaskStatus and TaskCaseState are constant in the provided sample; filters or domain logic may be required to interpret status codes in production data.

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Total number of task records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: Distinct Case Count
measures.description: Number of unique cases referenced by tasks (distinct TaskCaseID).

measures.name: Distinct Context Entity Count
measures.description: Number of distinct context entities (CaseContextEntityID) referenced by tasks.

measures.name: Percent With Sender
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(TaskID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN TaskSenderID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(TaskID) END
measures.description: Share of tasks that have a sender recorded (TaskSenderID is not null). Note: sample data shows TaskSenderID is null for all rows.

measures.name: Percent With Actual Owner
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(TaskID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN TaskActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(TaskID) END
measures.description: Share of tasks that have an actual owner recorded (TaskActualOwnerID is not null).

measures.name: Average Age (days)
measures.description: Average age of tasks in days measured from TaskCreatedOn to now (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP).

measures.name: Earliest Created On
measures.description: Earliest TaskCreatedOn in the current filter context.

measures.name: Latest Created On
measures.description: Latest TaskCreatedOn in the current filter context.

measures.name: Tasks With Non-zero Status
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskStatus <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks whose TaskStatus is not 0. (In the provided sample TaskStatus is 0 for all rows.)

measures.name: Tasks With Non-zero CaseState
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskCaseState <> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks whose TaskCaseState is not 0. (In the provided sample TaskCaseState is 0 for all rows.)

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of task records (row count). Use this as the primary activity measure for the fact.

measures.name: Distinct Cases
measures.description: Number of distinct cases referenced by the tasks.

measures.name: Tasks per Case (avg)
measures.description: Average number of tasks per case across the selected slice. NULL-safe.

measures.name: Contract Salesman Present (count)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractSalesman IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have a contract salesman associated (non-null ContractSalesman).

measures.name: Contract Salesman Presence Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractSalesman IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID), 0)
measures.description: Share of tasks that include a contract salesman (useful because ContractSalesman is null for the majority of rows).

measures.name: Unique Contract Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct contract-salesman identifiers present in the data (nulls ignored).

measures.name: Tasks with Sender (count)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskSenderID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have a non-null TaskSenderID.

foreign_keys.note: ContractSalesman appears as a string like '[824] Name'. Consider normalizing to a Salesman key in DimSalesman.

display.notes: TaskStatus and TaskCaseState are present but in the current sample are constant (0). If those become varied in production they can be promoted to filters or used to build status-based measures (e.g., Open/Closed counts).

measures.name: Assignments
measures.description: Number of role-to-task assignment rows (one row per TaskID x RoleID assignment).

measures.name: UniqueTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented in the result set.

measures.name: UniqueSenders
measures.description: Number of distinct senders who created tasks (NULL senders are ignored).

measures.name: EarliestTaskCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest TaskCreatedOn timestamp in the current filter context.

measures.name: LatestTaskCreatedOn
measures.description: Latest TaskCreatedOn timestamp in the current filter context.

measures.name: AverageRolesPerTask
measures.description: Average number of role assignments per task (assignments / distinct tasks).

measures.name: OpenAssignmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskStatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments where TaskStatus = 0. Note: TaskStatus appears constant in the provided sample data (0) but is included to support future status variation.

measures.name: ActiveCaseAssignmentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskCaseState = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of assignments where the related case state equals 0. TaskCaseState currently appears constant (0) in samples; kept to support future state values.

measures.name: LossPrintedNew_Sum
measures.description: Total number of new printed loss notices (sum of LossPrintedNew) for the selected slice.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of task-target rows returned (useful as a basic activity volume measure).

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks in the current filter context.

measures.name: AvgCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days (CampStartedOn  CampClosedOn). Null campaign dates are excluded from the average.

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceTaskCreated
measures.description: Average number of days since each task was created (relative to the current system date).

measures.name: Capture Count
measures.description: Number of advertisement capture records (rows) in the view

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Number of unique customers (CustomerCode) represented in the captures

measures.name: Distinct Friendly URLs
measures.description: Count of unique FriendlyUrl values observed

measures.name: Latest Version
measures.description: Highest Version value observed for the capture records (represents the most recent version number)

measures.name: Average Version
measures.description: Average of the Version values (useful to understand typical version level)

measures.name: Has Snapshot Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SnapshotFile IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(SnapshotFile)) <> '' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(SnapshotFile)) <> 'None' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of captures that have an associated snapshot file (not NULL, not empty, not the literal 'None')

measures.name: Snapshot Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SnapshotFile IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(SnapshotFile)) <> '' AND LTRIM(RTRIM(SnapshotFile)) <> 'None' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(Id), 0)
measures.description: Share of captures that include a valid snapshot file

measures.name: Change Type Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 'change' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of captures where Type = 'change'

measures.name: Initiation Type Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 'initiation' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of captures where Type = 'initiation'

measures.name: Latest Capture Date
measures.description: Most recent CaptureDate across the records

measures.name: BannerCount
measures.description: Number of banner records (one row per IL07_CT05_Id)

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented by the active banners

measures.name: AvgContractDurationDays
measures.description: Average planned duration of the contract in days (from StartDate to ExpirationDate). Null expiration dates will be excluded by DATEDIFF semantics.

measures.name: AvgDaysUntilExpiration
measures.description: Average number of days from today until the contract's expiration (can be negative for already expired). Uses server current date (GETDATE()).

measures.name: BannersWithScriptCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(oxScript, '')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of banners that include a non-empty oxScript field

measures.name: ScriptPresenceRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(IL07_CT05_Id) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(oxScript, '')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(IL07_CT05_Id) END
measures.description: Share of banners that include an oxScript (ratio of banners with script to total banners)

measures.name: AvgScriptLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the oxScript content for the banners

measures.name: AvgPrependLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the oxPrepend content

measures.name: AvgAppendLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the oxAppend content

measures.name: ActiveBannerCount_Today
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CT23_StartDate <= GETDATE() AND (CT05_ExpirationDate IS NULL OR CT05_ExpirationDate >= GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of banners considered active as of today (StartDate <= today and not expired)

measures.name: BannerCount
measures.description: Total number of banner rows in the buffer view (one row per banner/contract combination).

measures.name: ActiveBannerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CT23_StartDate <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND (CT05_ExpirationDate IS NULL OR CT05_ExpirationDate >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banners that are currently active (start date on or before now and not expired or no expiration date).

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Count of distinct campaign identifiers present in the buffer.

measures.name: MissingScriptCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN oxScript IS NULL OR LTRIM(RTRIM(oxScript)) = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banners that do not have script content populated (oxScript is null or empty).

measures.name: AvgDaysUntilExpiration
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN CT05_ExpirationDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CT05_ExpirationDate) END)
measures.description: Average number of days from now until expiration for banners that have an expiration date. Negative values indicate already expired.

measures.name: ExpiringIn30DaysCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CT05_ExpirationDate IS NOT NULL AND CT05_ExpirationDate BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND DATEADD(day, 30, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banners that will expire within the next 30 days.

default_filters.description: Include banners that have started
Include banners that have not expired or have no expiration date

measures.name: ActiveBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of business point rows (count of distinct active business points in the result set).

measures.name: ContractsCount
measures.description: Aggregated value of the source column ' '. The source column appears as an integer and is interpreted here as a contract-related count/identifier. Validate semantics in source system  if this column is an identifier (not an additive count) change to MAX or COUNT DISTINCT as appropriate.

measures.name: Campaign Count
measures.description: Number of campaign records (distinct campaigns) in the dataset.

measures.name: Active Campaign Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL OR ClosedOn > GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of campaigns that are currently active (no ClosedOn date or ClosedOn is in the future).

measures.name: Closed Campaign Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL AND ClosedOn <= GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of campaigns that have a ClosedOn date (considered closed up to today).

measures.name: Average Campaign Duration (Days)
measures.description: Average duration in days between StartedOn and ClosedOn for campaigns that have a ClosedOn date. NULL durations are excluded.

measures.name: Total Campaign Duration (Days)
measures.description: Sum of campaign durations (in days). Campaigns without a ClosedOn are excluded from the sum.

measures.name: Percent Closed
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of campaigns that have been closed (ClosedOn is not null) out of all campaigns.

measures.name: Earliest Start
measures.description: The earliest StartedOn date among the selected campaigns.

measures.name: Latest Close
measures.description: The most recent ClosedOn date among the selected campaigns.

measures.name: Ticket Count (Distinct)
measures.description: Number of distinct complaints/tickets represented in the view.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows in the view (each row is a ticket row or a ticket-comment row).

measures.name: Comment Count (Non-null)
measures.description: Number of non-empty comments associated with complaints.

measures.name: Average Comments per Ticket
measures.description: Average number of comments per distinct ticket.

measures.name: Resolved/Closed Count (heuristic)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LOWER(Result) IN ('resolved','closed','done') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the Result indicates the complaint is resolved/closed. Uses a heuristic list; adapt to real result codes if available.

measures.name: Open/Pending Count (heuristic)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LOWER(Result) IN ('open','pending','unresolved') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the Result indicates the complaint is open or pending. Uses a heuristic list; adapt to real result codes if available.

measures.name: Latest Comment Date
measures.description: Most recent comment timestamp for the set of rows.

measures.name: Average Ticket Age (days)
measures.description: Average age in days of tickets measured from creation to today (useful as a proxy for time-to-resolution when combined with closed counts).

measures.name: File Count
measures.description: Total number of file records in the view.

measures.name: Distinct DpsCode Count
measures.description: Number of distinct DpsCode values associated with files (NULLs are ignored).

measures.name: Files With DpsCode (Count)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DpsCode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of files that have a non-null DpsCode.

measures.name: Files With DpsCode (Percent)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN DpsCode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of files that are associated with a DpsCode.

measures.name: Average Filename Length
measures.description: Average number of characters in the filename.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view (each row represents one customer contact record as exposed by the view).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers represented in the view (based on CustomerCode).

measures.name: CustomersWithAnyEmailCount
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN (BillingEmail IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingEmail)) <> '') OR (Email2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Email2)) <> '') THEN CustomerCode END)
measures.description: Count of distinct customers that have at least one non-empty email address (either BillingEmail or Email2).

measures.name: CustomersWithAnyPhoneCount
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN (BillingPhone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingPhone)) <> '') OR (Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '') OR (Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '') THEN CustomerCode END)
measures.description: Count of distinct customers that have at least one non-empty phone number in any of the phone fields.

measures.name: TotalEmailFieldsPopulated
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BillingEmail IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingEmail)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN Email2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Email2)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total number of populated email fields across all rows (counts BillingEmail and Email2 when non-empty).

measures.name: TotalPhoneFieldsPopulated
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BillingPhone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingPhone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total number of populated phone fields across all rows (counts BillingPhone, Phone2 and Phone3 when non-empty).

measures.name: PercentCustomersWithEmail
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(100.0 * COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN (BillingEmail IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingEmail)) <> '') OR (Email2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Email2)) <> '') THEN CustomerCode END) / COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) AS DECIMAL(5,2)) END
measures.description: Percentage of distinct customers that have at least one email address populated (BillingEmail or Email2).

measures.name: PercentCustomersWithPhone
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(100.0 * COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN (BillingPhone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingPhone)) <> '') OR (Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '') OR (Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '') THEN CustomerCode END) / COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) AS DECIMAL(5,2)) END
measures.description: Percentage of distinct customers that have at least one phone number populated (any of the phone fields).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view (rows of customer score mappings)

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers present in the score view

measures.name: NumericScoreCount
measures.description: Count of rows where the score can be interpreted as a numeric value

measures.name: AverageNumericScore
measures.description: Average of scores that can be converted to numeric values (non-numeric scores are ignored)

measures.name: PercentNumericScores
measures.description: Share of rows where the score is numeric, expressed as a percentage of all rows

foreign_keys.note: Assumed logical FK  CustomerCode links to the Customer dimension if available. Validate in source model.

display.description: Mapping of customers to collection scores. The score column is textual; several measures attempt numeric interpretation (using TRY_CAST) to support numeric analysis where applicable.

measures.name: Classification Count
measures.description: Number of classification rows in the view (one row per ClassificationId if the view is de-duplicated by ClassificationId).

measures.name: Customer Rows
measures.description: Number of rows with a non-null CustomerCode (counts rows associated with customers).

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (based on CustomerCode) represented in the view.

measures.name: Distinct Customer Categories
measures.description: Number of distinct customer categories referenced by CustomerCategoryId.

measures.name: Average Classification Type
measures.description: Average numeric value of ClassificationType. Useful as a summary statistic when ClassificationType is numeric-coded; interpret with care.

measures.name: DocumentCount
measures.description: Total number of document records in the view (one row per document).

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented in the document set.

measures.name: DefaultDocumentCount
measures.description: Count of documents marked as default. Assumes IsDefault uses 1 = default, 0 = not default.

measures.name: DefaultDocumentShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(IsDefault) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of documents that are marked as default (DefaultDocumentCount / DocumentCount).

measures.name: MaxOrderNumber
measures.description: Maximum OrderNum value across documents (useful for highest ordering index). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: MinOrderNumber
measures.description: Minimum OrderNum value across documents. Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: AverageOrderNumber
measures.description: Average of OrderNum values for documents (nulls ignored). Cast to float for fractional average.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of classification records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctDescriptionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Description values present.

measures.name: AvgDescriptionLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the Description field.

measures.name: MaxDescriptionLength
measures.description: Maximum length (in characters) of the Description values.

measures.name: MinDescriptionLength
measures.description: Minimum length (in characters) of the Description values.

measures.name: ShareOfAllClassifications
measures.description: Proportion of total classification records represented by the current grain (useful when grouping by Description).

measures.name: Channel Count
measures.description: Number of advertisement channel records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: Active Channel Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of channels where IsActive = true.

measures.name: Inactive Channel Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of channels where IsActive = false.

measures.name: Active Channel %
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Percentage of channels that are active (IsActive = true).

measures.name: Medium Active Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN MediumIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of channels whose associated medium is marked active (MediumIsActive = true).

measures.name: Distinct Mediums
measures.description: Number of distinct MediumCode values represented in the dataset.

measures.name: Distinct Categories
measures.description: Number of distinct Category values (e.g., Print, ...).

measures.name: Most Recent Modification
measures.description: Latest LastModificationDate timestamp across the selected rows  useful to know recency of channel metadata.

measures.name: Bank Count
measures.description: Total number of bank mapping records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: Active Bank Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banks marked as active (IsActive = true).

measures.name: Active Bank Percentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of bank mappings that are active (Active Bank Count / Bank Count).

measures.name: Distinct Bank Descriptions
measures.description: Number of distinct bank description values (unique bank names).

measures.name: Campaign Count
measures.description: Number of campaign records (one row per campaign)

measures.name: Distinct Codes
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign codes present in the data

measures.name: Total Duration (days)
measures.description: Sum of campaign durations in days (ClosedOn - StartedOn) across the aggregated set. Null ClosedOn or StartedOn will result in NULL for that row's contribution.

measures.name: Average Duration (days)
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days (average of ClosedOn - StartedOn)

measures.name: Open Campaigns Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of campaigns that do not have a ClosedOn date (currently open)

measures.name: Percent Open
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of campaigns that are currently open

measures.name: Most Recent Modification
measures.description: Latest LastModificationDate across the aggregated campaigns (may be NULL if no modifications recorded)

measures.name: ChannelCount
measures.description: Total number of channel rows in the view (should be small / enumerated).

measures.name: ActiveChannelCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of channels marked as active.

measures.name: ActiveChannelRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of channels that are active (value between 0 and 1).

measures.name: DistinctDescriptionCount
measures.description: Number of unique channel descriptions; useful for validating expected enumeration size.

measures.name: PersonCount
measures.description: Number of distinct collection persons (by Code) represented in the view.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view. Useful when Code may not be unique.

measures.name: ActivePersonCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of persons marked as active (IsActive = true).

measures.name: InactivePersonCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of persons marked as inactive (IsActive = false).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of rows that are active (ActivePersonCount / RowCount).

measures.name: LastModifiedDate_Max
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate across the set of rows.

measures.name: DaysSinceLastModified_Max
measures.description: Number of days since the most recent LastModifiedDate (relative to query execution time).

measures.name: DistinctFullNameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct FullName values. Useful to detect duplicates or multiple codes per name.

measures.name: Company Count
measures.description: Total number of rows (company records) in the view.

measures.name: Distinct Company Count
measures.description: Number of distinct companies based on the ID column.

measures.name: Active Company Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of companies where IsActive is true.

measures.name: Active Company Percentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of companies that are active (Active Company Count / Company Count).

measures.name: Contract Count
measures.description: Number of contract records in the current filter context.

measures.name: Distinct Business Point Count
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPointCode values associated with contracts in the current filter context.

measures.name: Business Point Assignments
measures.description: Total number of business point assignments (rows)  useful when there can be multiple rows per contract/business point mapping.

measures.name: Average Business Points per Contract
measures.description: Average number of business point assignments per distinct contract in the current filter context.

display.notes: Use BusinessPointCode as the primary breakdown to see contract distribution by business point. There is no date dimension in this view.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of contract line rows in the view (row-level count).

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements referenced by contract lines.

measures.name: TotalNetAmount
measures.description: Sum of NetAmount for contract lines. Represents billed amount before alterations/adjustments.

measures.name: AverageNetAmount
measures.description: Average NetAmount per contract line.

measures.name: TotalAdvancedPayment
measures.description: Total of advanced payments applied to contract lines.

measures.name: TotalAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of AlteredAmount. Note: field is mostly null in the source; nulls are ignored by SUM.

measures.name: SumInvoiceQuantity
measures.description: Total number of invoices (sum of InvoiceQuantity) across lines.

measures.name: AverageInstallmentsPerInvoice
measures.description: Average number of installments per invoice (InstallmentsPerInvoice).

measures.name: MaxInstallmentSequence
measures.description: Maximum installment sequence value found for the selected rows.

measures.name: RenewableLineCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged as renewable (IsRenewable = true).

measures.name: Contract Count
measures.description: Total number of contracts (one row per ContractID).

measures.name: Distinct Customer Count
measures.description: Number of distinct customer billing codes represented in this set of contracts.

measures.name: Contracts Signed
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts that have a SignedDate (indicates a signed/recorded contract).

measures.name: Related Ticket Count
measures.description: Number of contracts that reference a RelatedTicket (counts non-null RelatedTicket values).

measures.name: Total Contract Altered Amount
measures.description: Sum of ContractAlteredAmount across contracts. Stored as integer in source; verify unit (e.g., cents vs major currency) before financial reporting.

measures.name: Average Contract Altered Amount
measures.description: Average ContractAlteredAmount for contracts with a non-null value.

measures.name: Active Contract Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts with Status = '' (Greek for 'active'). Adjust status literal if status values vary or are normalized elsewhere.

measures.name: CardTypeCount
measures.description: Total number of credit card types (row count)

measures.name: DistinctCardDescriptions
measures.description: Number of distinct credit card description values

measures.name: ActiveCardTypeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of credit card types marked as active

measures.name: InactiveCardTypeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of credit card types marked as inactive

measures.name: PercentActive
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(Id), 0)
measures.description: Share of card types that are active (ActiveCardTypeCount / CardTypeCount)

display.description: Reference view mapping YPS credit card type identifiers to EBS descriptions. Use measures to understand counts and active/inactive distribution of card types.

measures.name: AddressCount
measures.description: Number of address records (rows). Use when aggregating to show how many addresses are in the current filter/slice.

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Number of unique customers (MainCustomerCode) represented by the selected addresses.

measures.name: DistinctContacts
measures.description: Number of distinct contact records referenced by the selected addresses.

measures.name: HasPhone1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of addresses that have a primary phone number (Phone1).

measures.name: HasPhone1_Pct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(AddressID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of addresses with a primary phone number (Phone1) out of total addresses in the current slice.

measures.name: HasPhone2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of addresses that have a secondary phone number (Phone2).

measures.name: HasEmail_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Email IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of addresses that have a contact email.

measures.name: HasInvoiceEmail_Pct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN InvoiceEmail IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(AddressID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of addresses that have a separate invoice email populated.

measures.name: HasFax_Pct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Fax IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(AddressID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of addresses with a fax number.

measures.name: AverageDaysSinceLastModified
measures.description: Average age in days since each address record was last modified (relative to the query time). NULL-safe when no rows.

display.notes: Common explorations: contactability (phone/email coverage), address counts by city/district, and recency of address updates.

measures.name: CategoryRowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the Customer Category view (useful for profiling and validating the lookup)

measures.name: DistinctCategoryCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customer categories (distinct IDs)

foreign_keys.description: Likely reference from Customer table to category ID; verify actual upstream FK in source system

display.description: Lookup of customer category identifiers and names. Primarily used as a dimension/lookup for customer-related facts.

measures.name: CustomerRecordCount
measures.description: Number of customer records in the aggregation (at the row level, each Code represents one record).

measures.name: HasAlternativeCodeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AlternativeCode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customer records that have an AlternativeCode populated.

measures.name: IsActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customer records marked as active.

measures.name: IsActivePct
measures.description: Proportion of records that are active (0..1 as stored; presented as percentage).

measures.name: NoTaxVatCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NoTaxVat = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customer records flagged as having no VAT/tax number (NoTaxVat = true).

measures.name: KEPYOFlagCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN KEPYOStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customer records where KEPYOStatus = 1 (flag indicating KEPYO status).

measures.name: KEPYOFlagPct
measures.description: Proportion of records with KEPYOStatus = 1 (interpreted as percentage).

measures.name: HasVATCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN VATStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customer records where VATStatus = 1 (has VAT status). Note: VATStatus appears constant in the sample.

measures.name: VATCoveragePct
measures.description: Proportion of records with VATStatus = 1 (useful to detect coverage; may be 100% if VATStatus is constant).

measures.name: AlternativeCodePresencePct
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN AlternativeCode IS NOT NULL THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of records that include an AlternativeCode.

measures.name: LastModifiedDateMax
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate for the aggregated set of customer records.

measures.name: LastModifiedDateMin
measures.description: Earliest LastModifiedDate for the aggregated set of customer records.

display.notes: Use Code as the primary identifier for customer records. VATStatus appears constant in the sample  include VAT measures for monitoring changes over time or across sources.

measures.name: CustomerCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (customers) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (distinct ID).

measures.name: AverageCustomerScore
measures.description: Average numeric score parsed from the Name column. The view encodes a category and score in Name (e.g. ' - 2.75'); this measure extracts the value after the dash and averages it.

measures.name: MaxCustomerScore
measures.description: Maximum numeric score parsed from the Name column.

measures.name: MinCustomerScore
measures.description: Minimum numeric score parsed from the Name column.

measures.name: RowsWithParsedScore
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TRY_CAST(LTRIM(RTRIM(SUBSTRING(Name, CHARINDEX('-', Name) + 1, 100))) AS FLOAT) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where a numeric score could be successfully parsed from the Name column.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view (total sequence code mappings).

measures.name: DistinctCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct sequence codes present in the view.

measures.name: ActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings marked as active (IsActive = true).

measures.name: InactiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings marked as inactive (IsActive = false).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Proportion of mappings that are active (ActiveCount / RowCount).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of status mapping rows in the view.

measures.name: ActiveStatusCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of status rows marked as active (IsActive = True).

measures.name: ActiveStatusPercentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of status rows that are active.

measures.name: DistinctCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Code values present in the mapping.

measures.name: Error_Rows
measures.description: Number of log rows (error occurrences) in the view

measures.name: Distinct_Batches
measures.description: Number of distinct batches represented in the log

measures.name: Distinct_ErrorTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct error type codes found in the selected rows

measures.name: Distinct_Customers
measures.description: Number of distinct customer codes referenced by the log rows

measures.name: Total_CL_NetAmount
measures.description: Sum of advertisement/contract net amounts (CL_NetAmount). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: Total_CL_AdvancedPayment
measures.description: Sum of advanced payments associated with contracts/advertisements (CL_AdvancedPayment). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: Total_CL_InvoiceQuantity
measures.description: Total invoice quantity across matching contract lines (CL_InvoiceQuantity)

measures.name: Sum_CL_InstallmentsPerInvoice
measures.description: Sum of installments-per-invoice values across contract lines (CL_InstallmentsPerInvoice)

measures.name: Avg_CL_InstallmentsPerInvoice
measures.description: Average installments-per-invoice for contract lines (CL_InstallmentsPerInvoice)

measures.name: Distinct_CL_InstallmentSequences
measures.description: Count of distinct installment sequence identifiers encountered

measures.name: Customers_IsActive_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Cust_IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the customer is marked active (Cust_IsActive = 1)

measures.name: Customers_NoTaxVat_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Cust_NoTaxVat = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the customer is flagged as no-tax/no-VAT (Cust_NoTaxVat = 1)

measures.name: Customers_KEPYOStatus_True_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Cust_KEPYOStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where KEPYO status flag equals 1 (Cust_KEPYOStatus = 1)

measures.name: Customers_VATStatus_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Cust_VATStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where customer VAT status equals 1 (Cust_VATStatus = 1)

measures.name: ErrorCount
measures.description: Total number of post-check error records in the result set or grouping.

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct error type codes present in the result set or grouping.

measures.name: RowsWithEntityData
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of error rows that include non-null EntityData (indicates an associated payload was captured).

measures.name: PctRowsWithEntityData
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN EntityData IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of rows that include EntityData (RowsWithEntityData / ErrorCount).

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of receipt Amount values (stored currency). Represents total collected amount for the receipts in this fact.

measures.name: AverageAmount
measures.description: Average receipt Amount. Nulls are not counted; useful to assess typical receipt size.

measures.name: TransactionCount
measures.description: Number of receipts / collection transactions in the selected set.

measures.name: PayoffCount
measures.description: Count of receipts marked as payoffs (IsPayoff = 1). IsPayoff is stored as integer 0/1.

measures.name: PayoffRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(SystemReceiptID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(IsPayoff) * 1.0 / COUNT(SystemReceiptID) END
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs: SUM(IsPayoff) / COUNT(SystemReceiptID). Returned as a ratio (0..1) and typically displayed as percentage.

measures.name: AverageCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Average number of credit-card installments for transactions that used credit card payments. Sparse (most rows null); AVG ignores nulls.

measures.name: SalesPersonCount
measures.description: Number of salesperson rows in the current filter (count of distinct Code at this grain).

measures.name: ActiveSalesPersonCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of salespersons marked as active in the current filter.

measures.name: ActiveSalesPersonPercentage
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(Code), 0)
measures.description: Share of salespersons that are active (ActiveSalesPersonCount / SalesPersonCount). Returns NULL when SalesPersonCount is zero.

measures.name: MostRecentLastModified
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate across the rows in the current filter (useful to know when mapping data was last updated).

measures.name: DaysSinceMostRecentUpdate
measures.description: Number of days since the most recent LastModifiedDate for rows in the current filter. Useful to identify stale mappings.

measures.name: DistinctFullNameCount
measures.description: Count of distinct FullName values in the current filter  helpful for detecting duplicates or multiple display names.

measures.name: ServiceCount
measures.description: Total number of service rows (one row per service ID).

measures.name: ActiveServiceCount
measures.description: Number of services marked active (IsActive uses 1 = active, 0 = inactive).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.description: Share of services that are active (ActiveServiceCount / ServiceCount). Returns 0 when there are no rows.

measures.name: BundleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of services that are bundles (IsBundle flag is true).

measures.name: BundleRate
measures.expression: DIVIDE(SUM(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0))
measures.description: Share of services that are bundles (BundleCount / ServiceCount).

measures.name: ActiveBundleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 AND IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of services that are both active and bundles.

measures.name: MostRecentModificationDate
measures.description: Most recent LastModificationDate across the services in the current filter context.

measures.name: TaxOfficeCount
measures.description: Total number of tax office records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctTaxOfficeCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tax office codes (Code).

measures.name: ActiveTaxOfficeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tax offices marked as active.

measures.name: InactiveTaxOfficeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tax offices marked as inactive.

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of tax offices that are active (ActiveTaxOfficeCount / TaxOfficeCount).

measures.name: Status Count
measures.description: Total number of VAT status rows in this view (counts all records)

measures.name: Distinct Code Count
measures.description: Number of distinct VAT status codes (Code values) represented

measures.name: Active Status Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of statuses that are marked active (IsActive = true / 1)

measures.name: Active Status Percentage
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of statuses that are active, expressed as a percentage of all statuses

measures.name: ContractAmountTotal
measures.description: Sum of the contractual amounts for the contract product rows (gross contract value).

measures.name: PriceTotal
measures.description: Sum of listed prices for the product rows before discounts.

measures.name: DiscountTotal
measures.description: Total discounts applied to the product rows.

measures.name: PriceAfterDiscountTotal
measures.description: Sum of the price after discount field (row-level price after discount).

measures.name: AlteredAmountTotal
