measures.description: Sum of any altered amounts or manual adjustments associated with the product rows.

measures.name: FinalPriceAfterDiscountTotal
measures.description: Net realized revenue for the product rows after all discounts and adjustments. Good proxy for realized revenue at row level.

measures.name: AveragePrice
measures.description: Average listed price per product row.

measures.name: AverageDiscount
measures.description: Average discount amount per product row.

measures.name: DiscountPercentOfPrice
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Price) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(Discount) / SUM(Price) END
measures.description: Total discounts as a percentage of total listed price (NULL when total price = 0).

measures.name: ContractProductCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contract product rows represented in the current aggregation.

measures.name: AdvertisementCount
measures.description: Distinct advertisements associated with the selected rows.

measures.name: AutoRenewalSum
measures.description: Sum of the Auto_Renewal integer field (useful if field encodes number of renewals or a 0/1 flag indicating auto-renew).

measures.name: PreviousSubscribersRevenue
measures.description: Total revenue after discount from previously subscribed customers for the previous campaign

measures.name: PreviousNonSubscribersRevenue
measures.description: Total revenue after discount from previously non-subscribed customers for the previous campaign

measures.name: PreviousTotalRevenueAfterDiscount
measures.description: Combined previous campaign revenue after discounts (subscribers + non-subscribers)

measures.name: PreviousFinalPrice_Sum
measures.description: Sum of final prices observed in the previous campaign across the grain

measures.name: CurrentFinalPrice_Sum
measures.description: Sum of final prices observed for the current campaign across the grain

measures.name: AvgPreviousFinalPrice
measures.description: Average final price in the previous campaign (NULLs ignored by AVG)

measures.name: PriceChange
measures.description: Absolute change in summed final price between current and previous campaign

measures.name: PriceChangePct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(ISNULL(PreviousFinalPrice, 0)) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(ISNULL(CurrentFinalPrice, 0)) - SUM(ISNULL(PreviousFinalPrice, 0))) / NULLIF(SUM(ISNULL(PreviousFinalPrice, 0)), 0) END
measures.description: Relative change (percentage) in summed final price from previous to current campaign; NULL when previous total is zero

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the view. Use to count observations/contacts processed by campaigns.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points involved in the campaign group.

measures.name: PreviousPriceTotal
measures.description: Aggregated previous final price (sum of PreviousFinalPrice) for the group.

measures.name: CurrentPriceTotal
measures.description: Aggregated current final price (sum of CurrentFinalPrice) for the group.

measures.name: PriceChangeAbsolute
measures.description: Absolute change in total price: current total minus previous total.

measures.name: PriceChangePercentage
measures.description: Relative change between current and previous total prices. Null-safe division; returns percent change vs previous total.

measures.name: SubscribersRevenue
measures.description: Total revenue after discount from subscriber-related activity (SubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount).

measures.name: NonSubscribersRevenue
measures.description: Total revenue after discount from non-subscriber activity (NoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount).

measures.name: AutoRenewableRevenue
measures.description: Total revenue after discount attributable to auto-renewable items.

measures.name: AutoRenewableShareOfRevenue
measures.description: Share of auto-renewable revenue compared to total reported revenue (subscriber + non-subscriber).

measures.name: AvgPreviousPrice
measures.description: Average previous final price per record (ignores NULLs).

measures.name: AvgCurrentPrice
measures.description: Average current final price per record (ignores NULLs).

measures.name: PreviousFinalPrice
measures.description: Sum of the previous final price recorded for the row (source-provided previous price).

measures.name: CurrentFinalPrice
measures.description: Sum of the current final price for the row (source-provided current price).

measures.name: SubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Total amount after discounts for subscribing customers.

measures.name: NoSubrTotalAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Total amount after discounts for non-subscribing customers.

measures.name: AutoRenewableAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Total amount after discounts for auto-renewable items.

measures.name: TotalAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Combined total amount after discounts (subscribing + non-subscribing).

measures.name: PriceChangeAmount
measures.description: Change in total price: difference between summed current and previous final prices.

measures.name: PriceChangePercent
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(PreviousFinalPrice) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(CurrentFinalPrice) - SUM(PreviousFinalPrice)) / SUM(PreviousFinalPrice) END
measures.description: Relative percent change between current and previous summed final prices. Null when previous total is zero.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view (useful for sanity checks).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the current filtered set.

measures.name: TotalContractAmount
measures.description: Total original contract amount for the row (sum of ContractAmount).

measures.name: TotalPrice
measures.description: Sum of listed prices before discounts.

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Total discount amount applied.

measures.name: TotalPriceAfterDiscount
measures.description: Sum of intermediate price after discount (PriceAfterDiscount).

measures.name: TotalFinalPriceAfterDiscount
measures.description: Sum of final prices after all adjustments and discounts.

measures.name: TotalAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of altered adjustments to amounts (if any).

measures.name: AutoRenewalFlagSum
measures.description: Sum of the Auto_Renewal field. Interpreted as a count when Auto_Renewal is used as a 0/1 flag.

measures.name: OldContractCount
measures.description: Aggregate of OldCtr (legacy/previous contract counter).

measures.name: ContractsCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contract products in the result set.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows returned (useful for debugging / row-level analysis).

measures.name: AveragePrice
measures.description: Average listed price (ignores NULLs).

measures.name: AverageFinalPrice
measures.description: Average final price after discounts and adjustments (ignores NULLs).

measures.name: DiscountShareOfPrice
measures.description: Share of discounts relative to total price: SUM(Discount) / SUM(Price). Returns NULL if total price is zero.

measures.name: AveragePriceAfterDiscountPerContract
measures.description: Average PriceAfterDiscount per distinct contract product.

measures.name: FileCount
measures.description: Total number of file upload records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns that have file uploads recorded.

measures.name: DistinctUploaderCount
measures.description: Number of distinct users who uploaded files (CreatedByUserID).

measures.name: LatestUploadDatetime
measures.description: Most recent file upload timestamp in the current filter context.

measures.name: EarliestUploadDatetime
measures.description: Earliest file upload timestamp in the current filter context.

measures.name: FilesWithHistoryCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasFileHistoryDetail = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of files that have file history details (HasFileHistoryDetail = true).

measures.name: FilesDeletableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CanDeleteFromBucket = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of files that can be deleted from the bucket (CanDeleteFromBucket = true).

measures.name: PercentFilesDeletable
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(FileID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CanDeleteFromBucket = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(FileID) END
measures.description: Share of files that are deletable (FilesDeletableCount / FileCount).

measures.name: AverageFilesPerCampaign
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(FileID) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT CampaignID) END
measures.description: Average number of files uploaded per campaign in the current filter context.

display.notes: This view represents one row per campaign-file upload status. Use CampaignID and FileID to uniquely identify rows. CreatedByUser* columns provide uploader metadata; CreatedOn is the upload timestamp.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of view rows (records) in this aggregation/grain

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the result set

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points (locations) represented

measures.name: HasSalesMarketCaseCount
measures.description: Count of records flagged as having a sales market case (sum of the HasSalesMarketCase flag). Assumes HasSalesMarketCase is 0/1.

measures.name: HasSalesMarketCaseRate
measures.description: Share of records that have a sales market case (HasSalesMarketCase / total rows).

measures.name: HasCRMTicketCount
measures.description: Count of records that have a CRM ticket. Converts the BIT HasCRMTicket to integer and sums.

measures.name: HasCRMTicketRate
measures.description: Share of records that have a CRM ticket (HasCRMTicket / total rows).

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows in the report (one row per pivot item). Use for validating row-level volume.

measures.name: Number of Cases
measures.description: Total number of cases associated with the campaign pivot rows.

measures.name: Loss Quantity
measures.description: Total lost quantity aggregated across rows.

measures.name: New Quantity
measures.description: Total new quantity aggregated across rows.

measures.name: CO Quantity
measures.description: Total CO (carry-over / change-of) quantity aggregated across rows.

measures.name: Total Quantity (Loss + New + CO)
measures.description: Aggregate of Loss, New and CO quantities to provide a combined quantity measure.

measures.name: Average Loss Quantity Percentage
measures.description: Average of the LossQuantityPercentage values across rows. Useful when percentages are pre-computed per row.

measures.name: Average New Quantity Percentage
measures.description: Average of the NewQuantityPercentage values across rows.

measures.name: Average CO Quantity Percentage
measures.description: Average of the COQuantityPercentage values across rows.

measures.name: Contract Amount
measures.description: Total contract monetary amount (stored with three decimals, displayed to two).

measures.name: Subscription Amount
measures.description: Total subscription-related amount.

measures.name: Renewal Amount
measures.description: Total renewal-related amount.

measures.name: Non-Subscription Amount
measures.description: Total non-subscription amount.

measures.name: Average Subscription Amount Percentage
measures.description: Average of pre-calculated subscription amount percentages across rows.

measures.name: Average Renewal Amount Percentage
measures.description: Average of pre-calculated renewal amount percentages across rows.

measures.name: Average Non-Subscription Amount Percentage
measures.description: Average of pre-calculated non-subscription amount percentages across rows.

measures.name: Derived: Subscription % of Contract (aggregated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(ContractAmount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(SubscriptionAmount) / SUM(ContractAmount) END
measures.description: Derived percentage: aggregated subscription amount divided by aggregated contract amount. Use when you want a true aggregate share rather than averaging row-level percentages.

measures.name: Derived: Renewal % of Contract (aggregated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(ContractAmount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(RenewalAmount) / SUM(ContractAmount) END
measures.description: Derived percentage: aggregated renewal amount divided by aggregated contract amount.

measures.name: Derived: Non-Subscription % of Contract (aggregated)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(ContractAmount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(NonSubscriptionAmount) / SUM(ContractAmount) END
measures.description: Derived percentage: aggregated non-subscription amount divided by aggregated contract amount.

measures.name: Contract Amount per Case
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCases) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(ContractAmount) / SUM(NumberOfCases) END
measures.description: Average contract amount per case (aggregated).

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of rows (market view items) represented in the fact for the selected grain

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Count of unique business points in the selection

measures.name: SumFinalPrice
measures.description: Total of FinalPrice across matching rows

measures.name: AvgFinalPrice
measures.description: Average FinalPrice per row (ignores NULL FinalPrice)

measures.name: MinFinalPrice
measures.description: Minimum FinalPrice observed

measures.name: MaxFinalPrice
measures.description: Maximum FinalPrice observed

measures.name: SumRenewalTotalAmount
measures.description: Aggregate of RenewalTotalAmount (renewal-related revenue/amounts)

measures.name: SumSubrTotalAmountDiscount
measures.description: Total subscription discounts applied (sum of SubrTotalAmountDiscount)

measures.name: SumNoSubrTotalAmountDiscounts
measures.description: Total non-subscription discounts

measures.name: SumPrePrintedTotalAmount
measures.description: Aggregate amount from pre-printed items

measures.name: CountTasksWithStatus
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskStatus IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that have a TaskStatus value

measures.name: CountCasesWithState
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CaseState IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows associated with a CaseState (non-null)

measures.name: DistinctSplitGroupCount
measures.description: Number of distinct split groups represented in the selection

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the view. Useful for validating cardinality and simple counts.

measures.name: TotalCustomers
measures.description: Total number of customers aggregated for the selected grain or filters. Nulls in NumberOfCustomers are ignored by SUM.

measures.name: AvgCustomersPerRecord
measures.description: Average number of customers per record (average of NumberOfCustomers across the selected rows).

measures.name: TotalCoAmount
measures.description: Sum of TotalCoAmount (company/coordinated amount) for the selected rows. Values are stored in USD.

measures.name: TotalRoCoAmount
measures.description: Sum of TotalRoCoAmount (rolled-up or reconciled amount) for the selected rows. Values are stored in USD.

measures.name: TotalNew
measures.description: Sum of TotalNew (new revenue/amount) for the selected rows. Values are stored in USD.

measures.name: RoCoMinusCo
measures.description: Difference between rolled/reconciled amount and company amount (TotalRoCoAmount - TotalCoAmount). Useful to measure uplift or adjustments.

measures.name: RoCoOverCoPct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TotalCoAmount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE (SUM(TotalRoCoAmount) - SUM(TotalCoAmount)) / SUM(TotalCoAmount) END
measures.description: Relative difference (percentage) between TotalRoCoAmount and TotalCoAmount: (RoCo - Co) / Co. Null when TotalCoAmount sums to zero.

measures.name: AvgCoAmountPerCustomer
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(NumberOfCustomers) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TotalCoAmount) / SUM(NumberOfCustomers) END
measures.description: Average company amount per customer: total company amount divided by total number of customers. Null when summed customers is zero.

measures.name: ContactCount
measures.description: Total number of contact/action records in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers involved in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctActionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct action types recorded in the selected scope.

measures.name: FirstContactDate
measures.description: Earliest contact timestamp present in the aggregation window.

measures.name: LastContactDate
measures.description: Most recent contact timestamp present in the aggregation window.

measures.name: ContactsPerCustomer
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(*) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT CustomerCode) END
measures.description: Average number of contacts (rows) per distinct customer in the selected scope.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of customer identification records (rows) in this view

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct CustomerCode values represented in the result set

measures.name: IdentityConfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records where identity has been explicitly confirmed

measures.name: IdentityUnconfirmedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IdentityConfirmed = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records where identity has been explicitly marked as not confirmed

measures.name: IdentityUnknownCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IdentityConfirmed IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records where identity confirmation is unknown (NULL)

measures.name: IdentityConfirmedPct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ActionId) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IdentityConfirmed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ActionId) END
measures.description: Share of records with confirmed identity (confirmed / total)

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceCreated
measures.description: Average number of days elapsed since the CreatedOn timestamp for records in the set

measures.name: Ticket Count
measures.description: Total number of rows (tickets) in the view for the current filter context.

measures.name: Distinct Contracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts referenced by the tickets. Null ContractID values are excluded from the distinct count.

measures.name: Need Supervisor Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedSupervisor = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets flagged as requiring a supervisor.

measures.name: Need Cancel Contract Evaluation Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedCancelContractEval = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets that require evaluation for contract cancellation.

measures.name: Need Evaluation Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NeedEval = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets that require any evaluation.

measures.name: Complaint Count (non-empty)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Complaint IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Complaint)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tickets where a complaint text is present (non-null and non-empty).

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Number of distinct customer codes referenced by the tickets. Null values are excluded.

measures.name: Distinct Created By Users
measures.description: Number of distinct users who created tickets in the current filter context.

foreign_keys.note: Assumes a Contract dimension or table named Contract in dbo schema.
Reference to ticket type dimension.
Reference to the source/origin of the ticket.
Company dimension keyed by CompanyCode (tinyint).
Customer dimension keyed by CustomerCode (numeric).
Reference to an Action or Status dimension.
User dimension keyed by username (NVARCHAR(15)).

default_filters.note: Default to recent data; adjust as needed for reporting window.

measures.name: Action Count
measures.description: Number of actions (row count), aggregated over the selected grain or filters.

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Count of unique BusinessPointCode values in the result set.

measures.name: Last Action Date
measures.description: Most recent action creation timestamp for the aggregated group.

measures.name: Recent Actions (30d)
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActionCreatedOn >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of actions created in the last 30 days.

measures.name: Recent Actions % (30d)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ActionID)=0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN ActionCreatedOn >= DATEADD(day, -30, GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ActionID) END
measures.description: Percentage of actions that were created in the last 30 days relative to total actions in the current context.

measures.name: Action Count
measures.description: Total number of action records (one row per action).

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers represented in the result set.

measures.name: Distinct Companies
measures.description: Number of distinct companies associated with the actions.

measures.name: First Action Date
measures.description: Earliest action CreatedOn timestamp in the aggregation.

measures.name: Last Action Date
measures.description: Most recent action CreatedOn timestamp in the aggregation.

measures.name: Average Actions per Customer
measures.description: Average number of actions per distinct customer (null when no customers).

measures.name: RelationshipCount
measures.description: Number of relationship rows (one row per MainCustomerID -> CustomerID relationship).

measures.name: DistinctRelatedCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct related customers in the result set.

measures.name: BothActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN MainCustomerIsActive = 1 AND CustomerIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of relationships where both the main customer and the related customer are marked active.

measures.name: MainCustomerActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN MainCustomerIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of relationships where the main customer is active.

measures.name: RelatedCustomerActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CustomerIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of relationships where the related customer is active.

measures.name: ActiveRelationshipRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN MainCustomerIsActive = 1 AND CustomerIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of relationships where both parties are active (BothActiveCount / RelationshipCount).

measures.name: CustomerTypeCode
measures.description: Numeric code for customer relationship type. Typically a small set of integer codes; use with caution as this is categorical.

measures.name: RelationshipCount
measures.description: Total number of relationships (rows) in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctMainCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct main customers present in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct related customers present in the view.

measures.name: MainCustomerActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN MainCustomerIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of relationships where the main customer is marked active.

measures.name: CustomerActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CustomerIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of relationships where the related customer is marked active.

measures.name: ActiveRelationshipCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN MainCustomerIsActive = 1 AND CustomerIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of relationships where both the main customer and the related customer are active.

measures.name: PctActiveRelationships
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN MainCustomerIsActive = 1 AND CustomerIsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of relationships where both parties are active.

measures.name: AverageLevel
measures.description: Average lvl value for the relationships (useful if lvl is populated for hierarchical depths).

measures.name: RelationshipCount
measures.description: Number of relationship records for the given grain (rows). Useful as a baseline row-count measure.

measures.name: DistinctRelatedCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct related customers associated with the primary CustomerID over the evaluated set.

measures.name: DuplicateCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDuplicate = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records flagged as duplicates. Useful to quantify duplicate relationship detections.

measures.name: EvidenceCount
measures.description: Total number of evidence points or signals that support the relationship (e.g., matching attributes, interactions).

measures.name: AverageMatchScore
measures.description: Average similarity/match score between the Customer and RelatedCustomer across supporting signals. Assumes MatchScore is 0..1.

measures.name: MaxMatchScore
measures.description: Maximum observed match/similarity score for the relationship. Helpful to find strongest matches.

measures.name: WeightedMatchScore
measures.description: Evidence-weighted average match score: gives more weight to matches backed by more evidence.

measures.name: LatestDetectionDate
measures.description: Most recent date this relationship was detected or updated.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view (task  reason  export snapshot).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points present in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented in the data.

measures.name: DistinctReasonCount
measures.description: Number of distinct reasons observed.

measures.name: ReasonAssignmentCount
measures.description: Total number of non-null reason assignments (rows where a reason is present).

measures.name: CallResultMissingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CallResultID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows with a missing/null CallResultID (CallResult not populated).

measures.name: CallResultMissingRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CallResultID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of rows where CallResultID is null. Useful to quickly identify completeness of call results.

measures.name: LastExportDate
measures.description: Most recent ExportDate in the scanned dataset (snapshot timestamp).

measures.name: AverageRowsPerExportDay
measures.description: Average number of rows (task-reason rows) per export day in the current selection.

measures.name: RelationshipCount
measures.description: Number of relationship rows (each association of a product to a classifier node and attribute value).

measures.name: DistinctProductCount
measures.description: Count of unique products participating in the selected relationship set.

measures.name: DistinctAttributeValueCount
measures.description: Count of unique attribute values referenced in the selected relationship set.

measures.name: DistinctClassifierNodeCount
measures.description: Count of unique classifier nodes referenced in the selected relationship set.

foreign_keys.description: Links to the product dimension / master record.
Links to the classifier node (category / taxonomy) dimension.
Links to the attribute value dimension (value for a product attribute).

display.notes: DirProductName is a descriptive attribute useful for UI display; DirProductId is the stable identifier for joins. Use DistinctProductCount when summarizing across attribute selections to avoid double counting duplicates.

measures.name: RelationshipCount
measures.description: Number of product-heading relationship rows in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctProductCount
measures.description: Number of distinct products involved in relationships in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctHeadingCount
measures.description: Number of distinct headings associated with products in the current filter context.

measures.name: AverageHeadingsPerProduct
measures.description: Average number of headings mapped to each product (RelationshipCount divided by distinct product count). Returns NULL when there are no products in context.

measures.name: ProductCount
measures.description: Total number of product rows in the view.

measures.name: ActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of products marked as active (IsActive = true/1).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of products that are active (ActiveCount / ProductCount).

measures.name: DistinctProductNames
measures.description: Number of distinct product names in the view.

measures.name: ContractCount
measures.description: Total number of contract rows in the view.

measures.name: DistinctBillingPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct billing points referenced by the contracts.

measures.name: RelatedTicketCount
measures.description: Count of non-null RelatedTicket values (how many contracts reference a related ticket).

measures.name: DistinctRelatedTicketCount
measures.description: Count of distinct RelatedTicket IDs referenced by contracts (excludes nulls).

measures.name: ContractAlteredAmountTotal
measures.description: Sum of altered contract amounts. Many rows are null; SUM ignores nulls.

measures.name: ContractAlteredAmountAverage
measures.description: Average altered amount for contracts (computed over non-null values).

measures.name: ContractAlteredAmountCount
measures.description: Number of contracts that have a non-null ContractAlteredAmount.

measures.name: ActiveContracts
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of contracts with Status = '' (active).

measures.name: AddressCount
measures.description: Total number of address rows in the view.

measures.name: DistinctQueryCount
measures.description: Number of distinct geocoding query strings observed (unique GeoModelQueryString values).

measures.name: AvgLongitude
measures.description: Average Longitude value. Values appear to be in a projected coordinate system (not WGS84 degrees)  treat as coordinate units (e.g., meters) until coordinate system is confirmed.

measures.name: MinLongitude
measures.description: Minimum Longitude (projected coordinate) observed.

measures.name: MaxLongitude
measures.description: Maximum Longitude (projected coordinate) observed.

measures.name: AvgLatitude
measures.description: Average Latitude value. Values appear to be in a projected coordinate system (not WGS84 degrees)  treat as coordinate units (e.g., meters) until coordinate system is confirmed.

measures.name: MinLatitude
measures.description: Minimum Latitude (projected coordinate) observed.

measures.name: MaxLatitude
measures.description: Maximum Latitude (projected coordinate) observed.

measures.name: GeocodedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN GeoModelType IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that have a geocode/model type (rows considered geocoded).

measures.name: PercentGeocoded
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN GeoModelType IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)*1.0/COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of rows with a GeoModelType (percent geocoded).

measures.name: AvgGeoModelScore
measures.description: Average geocoding score (GeoModelScore). Higher values indicate better confidence; nulls are ignored in the average.

measures.name: HighConfidencePct
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID)=0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN GeoModelScore >= 90 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)*1.0/COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Percentage of rows with high-confidence geocode (GeoModelScore >= 90).

measures.name: DistinctNumericZipCount
measures.description: Number of distinct numeric postal codes present in the dataset.

measures.name: UserOverridesCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UserOverrideLine1 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the Line1 value was manually overridden by a user (UserOverrideLine1 = true).

measures.name: AttributeRowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (attribute values) in the result set

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented

measures.name: CP_Price_Sum
measures.description: Sum of product price defined on the contract product (CP_Price)

measures.name: CP_Discount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of explicit discounts applied on the contract product (CP_Discount)

measures.name: CP_RulesDiscount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied on the contract product (CP_RulesDiscount)

measures.name: CP_NetPrice
measures.description: Net price for contract products after discounts (CP_Price minus CP_Discount and CP_RulesDiscount)

measures.name: Adv_Price_Sum
measures.description: Sum of advertising price (Adv_Price)

measures.name: Adv_Discount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of explicit discounts applied on the advertisement (Adv_Discount)

measures.name: Adv_RulesDiscount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of rule-based discounts applied on the advertisement (Adv_RulesDiscount)

measures.name: Adv_NetPrice
measures.description: Net price for advertisement entries after discounts

measures.name: SubscriptionProductsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products flagged as subscription-based

measures.name: RenewableProductsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products flagged as renewable

measures.name: RenewedProductsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products flagged as already renewed

measures.name: Adv_QA_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Adv_QA = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisement rows where the QA flag is true

measures.name: ProductIsCompositeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_ProductIsComposite = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products marked as composite

measures.name: HasCavValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Cav_Value IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Cav_Value)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attribute rows that have a non-empty Cav_Value

measures.name: AvgCavValueLength
measures.description: Average length (characters) of Cav_Value values (nulls ignored)

measures.name: MaxCavSeqNo
measures.description: Maximum sequence number (Cav_SeqNo) per aggregation

measures.name: MinCavSeqNo
measures.description: Minimum sequence number (Cav_SeqNo) per aggregation

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (advertisement occurrences) in the view

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented

measures.name: DistinctContractProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct contract-product entries

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisements
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements

measures.name: Contract_Gross_Price
measures.description: Sum of gross prices at the contract-product level (CP_Price)

measures.name: Contract_Total_Discount
measures.description: Total discounts applied at the contract-product level (explicit + rules)

measures.name: Contract_Net_Revenue
measures.description: Net revenue at contract-product level after discounts

measures.name: Contract_Average_Price
measures.description: Average contract-product price

measures.name: Contract_Discount_Rate
measures.description: Share of discounts over gross contract-product price (0-1)

measures.name: Advertisement_Gross_Price
measures.description: Sum of gross prices at the advertisement level (Adv_Price)

measures.name: Advertisement_Total_Discount
measures.description: Total discounts applied at the advertisement level

measures.name: Advertisement_Net_Revenue
measures.description: Net revenue at advertisement level after discounts

measures.name: Advertisement_Average_Price
measures.description: Average advertisement price

measures.name: Renewed_Contract_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract-products marked as renewed

measures.name: SubscriptionBased_Contract_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract-products marked as subscription-based

measures.name: Active_BusinessPartners
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN C_BPIsActive = 1 THEN C_BPID ELSE NULL END)
measures.description: Number of distinct active business partners for contracts

measures.name: Area Count
measures.description: Number of geo area rows in the current filter context. Use this to count areas (MGA) shown.

measures.name: Distinct Root Area Count
measures.description: Number of distinct root geo areas referenced by the rows in the current filter context.

measures.name: Average Level
measures.description: Average hierarchy level (Lvl) across the matched areas. Useful to understand typical depth of selected areas.

measures.name: Minimum Level
measures.description: Shallowest (lowest numeric) hierarchy level among the matched areas.

measures.name: Maximum Level
measures.description: Deepest (highest numeric) hierarchy level among the matched areas.

foreign_keys.description: Self-reference to the parent area in the same view (hierarchy link). Many ParentMGAID values are null for top-level nodes.
Self-reference to the root/top-level area for this area.

default_filters.description: Only include areas with a defined non-negative level (defensive filter; Lvl has no nulls in samples).

notes: MGACode and PMGACode have very high null rates; prefer descriptive columns (MGADESCR / RootMGADESCR) for user-facing reports.
Use ParentMGAID and RootMGAID to build parent-child hierarchies in visuals.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of master heading rows (useful as a basic row count when grouping).

measures.name: DistinctRootCount
measures.description: Count of distinct root master headings referenced by these rows.

measures.name: Roots
measures.description: Number of rows marked as root headings (IsRoot = 1).

measures.name: ParentsThatAreRoot
measures.description: Number of rows whose parent is flagged as a root (ParentIsRoot = 1).

measures.name: HasChildrenCount
measures.description: Number of rows that have lower-level (child) headings (HasLower = 1).

measures.name: AverageLevel
measures.description: Average hierarchical level (Lvl) for the selected set of headings.

measures.name: MaxLevel
measures.description: Maximum hierarchical level (Lvl) present in the selected set.

measures.name: MinLevel
measures.description: Minimum hierarchical level (Lvl) present in the selected set.

measures.name: PercentRoots
measures.description: Share of rows that are roots (IsRoot = 1) out of total rows.

measures.name: PercentWithChildren
measures.description: Share of rows that have children (HasLower = 1) out of total rows.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (VGI records) in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctVGICount
measures.description: Count of distinct VGI items.

measures.name: HasLowerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasLower = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of VGIs that have lower (child) items.

measures.name: ParentIsRootCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ParentIsRoot = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of VGIs whose parent is marked as root. (Per current statistics this is always 0 but included for completeness.)

measures.name: AvgLevel
measures.description: Average hierarchy level (Lvl) across the selected VGIs. Useful when VGI rows represent multiple levels in aggregate queries.

measures.name: DistinctVGITypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct VGIType codes present in the selection.

measures.name: DistinctRootVGITypeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct RootVGIType codes present in the selection.

measures.name: HasHeadingCodeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HeadingCode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of VGIs that have a non-null HeadingCode.

measures.name: DistinctBranchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct branches represented in the selection.

foreign_keys.description: Hierarchical parent reference to another VGI in the same view.
Reference to the root VGI of the hierarchy.
Likely references a medium/version dimension (inferred). Validate against the environment.
Likely references a source heading dimension (inferred). Many rows have this populated.
Possible reference to a geography dimension; high null rate in this column.
Polymorphic link. DMKey together with DMTable identifies the referenced dimension row. Sample data shows DMTable='GroupHeading'.

display.notes: VGIs are primarily descriptive/category rows (hierarchy). Many integer-coded columns (VGIType, RootVGIType, HasLower, ParentIsRoot) are categorical flags  prefer using them as breakdowns/filters rather than numeric trends. DMKey is polymorphic; consult DMTable to determine the correct referenced table.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view (each row represents a version/section instance).

measures.name: DistinctVersionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct VSID values (unique versions).

measures.name: DistinctBranchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct branches represented in the view.

measures.name: ParentlessCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ParentVSID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that do not have a parent (top-level items).

measures.name: ParentMissingRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ParentVSID IS NULL THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of rows that are parentless (ParentVSID is NULL).

measures.name: IsRootCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN VSID = RootVSID THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the record is its own root (VSID equals RootVSID).

measures.name: IsRootRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN VSID = RootVSID THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of rows that are root nodes (VSID equals RootVSID).

measures.name: AverageLevel
measures.description: Average Lvl value across rows; indicates typical depth/level of items.

measures.name: ParentIsRootCount
measures.description: Count of rows whose parent is flagged as root (ParentIsRoot = 1). Uses 0 for NULLs.

measures.name: PriceTotal
measures.description: Sum of Price values for the placement rows (gross price before discounts).

measures.name: DiscountTotal
measures.description: Sum of explicit discounts applied to the placements.

measures.name: RulesDiscountTotal
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied by business rules for the placements.

measures.name: NetAmount
measures.description: Net amount after subtracting explicit and rule-based discounts from price.

measures.name: AveragePrice
measures.description: Average Price per placement row.

measures.name: AdCount
measures.description: Count of placement rows (Ad identifiers) in the result set.

measures.name: DiscountRate
measures.description: Ratio of explicit discounts to gross price (0 when total price is zero).

measures.name: TotalDiscountRate
measures.description: Ratio of total discounts (explicit + rules) to gross price.

measures.name: AssociationCount (Expr9)
measures.description: Sum of the Expr9 integer column. Likely represents a count or intensity of associations/links for the product-part row. Semantic should be validated against the source / ETL logic before use in business reporting.

measures.name: OptionalIntegerMetric (Expr10)
measures.description: Sum of the Expr10 integer column. This is an optional/nullable integer metric in the source; confirm the business meaning (e.g., secondary count, fallback value) before exposing broadly.

measures.name: Expr13_Total
measures.description: Sum of the Expr13 integer column. Unknown semantic; included as a generic integer aggregate for analytical use. Validate meaning with data owners.

measures.name: SingleAppearanceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SingleAppearance = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where SingleAppearance is true (1). Useful to measure how many product-part combinations are flagged as single-appearance.

measures.name: SingleAppearanceRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN SingleAppearance = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of rows at the chosen aggregation level where SingleAppearance is true. Represented as a percentage (0-100).

display.notes: Expr9, Expr10 and Expr13 were detected as potential measure columns but their business semantics are unknown. Validate with domain owners before naming or using them in critical reports.

measures.name: UDAC Count
measures.description: Number of UDAC records (rows) in the view

measures.name: Distinct UDAC Codes
measures.description: Number of distinct UDAC codes

measures.name: Total MinMembers
measures.description: Sum of MinMembers across UDACs (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Average MinMembers
measures.description: Average of MinMembers per UDAC (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Minimum of MinMembers

measures.name: Total MaxMembers
measures.description: Sum of MaxMembers across UDACs (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Average MaxMembers
measures.description: Average of MaxMembers per UDAC (nulls ignored)

measures.name: Maximum of MaxMembers
measures.description: Largest MaxMembers value observed

measures.description: Count of UDACs marked as composite

measures.name: UDACs With Optional Members

measures.description: Count of UDACs that allow optional members

measures.name: Dependent UDAC Count

measures.description: Count of UDACs flagged as dependent

measures.name: Deleted UDAC Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDeleted = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of UDACs marked as deleted

measures.name: Distinct UdacType Count
measures.description: Number of distinct values for UdacType

measures.name: Distinct Characterization Count

measures.name: Linked NewUdac Count
measures.description: Count of rows that reference a NewUdacID (non-null)

measures.name: Non-null DMKey Count

foreign_keys.description: Self-reference to the UDAC that replaced or links to this one (if any)

default_filters.description: Exclude deleted UDACs by default

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of mapping rows in the view

measures.name: ValidMappingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsValid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of mappings marked as valid (IsValid = 1)

measures.name: SameUdacCount
measures.description: Count of rows where SameUdac is set (indicates target uses the same UDAC)

measures.name: DistinctNewProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct target (new) products represented in the mapping

measures.name: DistinctOldProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct source (old) products represented in the mapping

measures.name: DistinctProductParts
measures.description: Number of distinct product parts in the mapping

measures.name: DistinctCadAttributes
measures.description: Number of distinct CAD/attribute definitions referenced (CadID)

measures.name: MappingCount
measures.description: Total number of mapping rows (rows in the view).

measures.name: DistinctMVIDCount
measures.description: Number of distinct source MVIDs represented in the view.

measures.name: DistinctNextMVIDCount
measures.description: Number of distinct successor MVIDs (excludes NULL).

measures.name: DistinctMVCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct MVCode values associated with mapping rows.

measures.name: NextExistsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NextMVID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings that have a successor (NextMVID is not null).

measures.name: NextMissingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NextMVID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings that do not have a successor (NextMVID is null / terminal nodes).

measures.name: NextMissingPct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN NextMVID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of mapping rows that are terminal (NextMVID is null).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of mapping rows in the view (each row represents one Old->New product mapping)

measures.name: UniqueOldProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct old product IDs present in the mapping

measures.name: UniqueNewProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct new product IDs present in the mapping

measures.name: SameUdacCount
measures.description: Count of mappings where the UDAC indicator equals 1 (indicator that UDAC is the same between old and new)

measures.name: SameUdacRate
measures.description: Proportion of mapping rows where UDAC is unchanged (SameUdac = 1). Null when there are no rows.

measures.name: AvgMappingsPerOldProduct
measures.description: Average number of mapping rows per distinct old product (useful to detect 1:N or N:1 mappings)

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of mapping rows (one row per Medium / MediumVersion / VersionSection)

measures.name: MappedToNextCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NextMVID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings that have a defined next MediumVersion (NextMVID)

measures.name: MappedToNextPercent
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN NextMVID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of mapping rows that point to a next MediumVersion (NextMVID) expressed as a percentage

measures.name: DistinctTargetSections
measures.description: Number of distinct target version sections referenced by these mappings (ignores NULLs)

measures.name: DistinctNextMediumVersions
measures.description: Number of distinct next MediumVersion identifiers referenced from this mapping (ignores NULLs)

measures.name: NullTargetCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TargetVersionSectionID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings that do not have a target version section

measures.name: MappingCount
measures.description: Number of mapping rows (records)  base row count.

measures.name: DistinctSourceProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct source products covered by the current filter/context.

measures.name: DistinctTargetProducts
measures.description: Number of distinct target products covered by the current filter/context.

measures.name: DistinctTargetCads
measures.description: Number of distinct target CAD entries in the current filter/context.

measures.name: Sum_TargetPartMinOccurence
measures.description: Sum of TargetProductPartMinOccurence across the selected mappings; useful for capacity/quantity planning.

measures.name: Avg_TargetPartMinOccurence
measures.description: Average minimum occurrence required for target parts across selected mappings.

measures.name: Max_TargetPartMinOccurence
measures.description: Maximum configured minimum occurrence among target parts for the selected mappings.

measures.name: ValidMappingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsValid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings flagged as valid (IsValid = 1).

measures.name: ValidMappingPercent
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsValid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of mappings that are valid (ValidMappingCount / MappingCount).

measures.name: MappingCount
measures.description: Total number of mapping rows in the view (one row per MVID in the grain).

measures.name: DistinctMVCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct MVCode values represented in the mapping.

measures.name: DistinctMVNameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct MVName (market vertical name) values in the mapping.

measures.name: HasNextCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NextMVID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings that point to a subsequent (Next) MVID (NextMVID is not NULL).

measures.name: NextMissingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NextMVID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings that do not have a NextMVID (NextMVID is NULL).

measures.name: HasNextPercent
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NextMVID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of mapping rows that have a NextMVID (non-null).

measures.name: DistinctNextMVIDCount
measures.description: Number of distinct NextMVID values referenced by mappings.

foreign_keys.description: Reference to the Market Vertical dimension (current MVID).
Reference to the Market Vertical dimension for the next/target MVID (may be NULL).
Optional reference to the MV code in the Market Vertical dimension.

display.notes: This view maps a market-vertical identifier (MVID) to a subsequent MVID (NextMVID). NextMVID contains NULLs for mappings without a successor; the HasNextPercent measure gives the completeness of successor links.

measures.name: MappingCount
measures.description: Number of mapping rows. At the chosen grain (OldProductID) this is typically 1 and can be used to verify uniqueness.

measures.name: DistinctNewProductCount
measures.description: Number of distinct NewProductID values associated with the OldProductID. Useful to detect 1-to-many mappings.

measures.name: NewUdacDefined_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RenewalDefinition = 'NewUdacDefined' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings for which the renewal definition indicates a new UDAC is defined.

measures.name: SameUdac_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RenewalDefinition = 'SameUdac' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings for which the renewal definition indicates the same UDAC is preserved.

measures.name: Pct_NewUdacDefined
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN RenewalDefinition = 'NewUdacDefined' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of mappings (for the grain) that are marked as NewUdacDefined. Expressed as a percentage.

measures.name: MappingCount
measures.description: Number of mapping rows (each row links a medium version to a version section).

measures.name: DistinctMediumVersions
measures.description: Number of distinct medium versions represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctTargetSections
measures.description: Number of distinct target version sections referenced by mappings.

measures.name: MappingsWithNext
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NextMVID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of mappings that reference a subsequent MediumVersion (NextMVID is not null).

measures.name: PctMappingsWithNext
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN NextMVID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of mappings that have a NextMVID (indicates an explicit next-medium-version link).

measures.name: DistinctCodes
measures.description: Number of distinct Code values present in the mappings (useful to understand classification coverage).

foreign_keys.description: References the medium (e.g., publication/channel) dimension.
References the source medium version dimension.
If present, references the subsequent medium version (self relationship on MediumVersion).
References the source version section dimension.
References the target version section dimension (mapping destination).
