measures.description: Number of distinct MasterHeadings values present in the view.

measures.name: DistinctClassifierNodes
measures.description: Number of distinct classifier nodes represented in the view.

measures.name: AvgMasterHeadingsPerNode
measures.description: Average number of MasterHeadings entries per ClassifierNode.

measures.name: AvgMasterHeadingLength
measures.description: Average character length of the MasterHeadings string.

measures.name: MaxMasterHeadingLength
measures.description: Maximum character length of the MasterHeadings string.

measures.name: MessageCount
measures.description: Total number of communication action records (messages/files) in the view.

measures.name: UniqueRecipients
measures.description: Number of distinct recipient addresses that received messages.

measures.name: DistinctCustomers
measures.description: Number of distinct business points / customers present in the dataset.

measures.name: DeliveredCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CommResult = 'Delivery' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of messages whose communication result indicates delivery.

measures.name: DeliveryRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(1)=0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN CommResult = 'Delivery' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(1) END
measures.description: Share of messages that were delivered out of total messages.

measures.name: EmailCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UPPER(ContactType) = 'EMAIL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of messages where ContactType is EMAIL.

measures.name: AvgMessagesPerRecipient
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT Receiver)=0 THEN NULL ELSE COUNT(1)*1.0/COUNT(DISTINCT Receiver) END
measures.description: Average number of messages sent per distinct recipient.

foreign_keys.notes: Maps business point / customer identifier to the business point dimension.
Optional mapping to customer dimension if CustomerCode is maintained as an alternate key.
SentDate can be linked to the date dimension for time-based analysis.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view (each row represents a single content attribute value instance).

measures.name: Distinct Attribute Value Count
measures.description: Number of distinct content attribute value records.

measures.name: Distinct Contracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts referenced by attribute values.

measures.name: Distinct Attributes
measures.description: Number of distinct content attribute definitions (Cad_ID) referenced.

measures.name: Sum Contract Product Price (CP)
measures.description: Sum of CP_Price for rows in the view (contract product prices).

measures.name: Average Contract Product Price (CP)
measures.description: Average CP_Price for contract products appearing in the view.

measures.name: Sum Contract Product Discount (CP)
measures.description: Total CP_Discount across rows (monetary discounts applied to contract products).

measures.name: Contract Product Discount % (CP)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(CP_Price) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CP_Discount) / NULLIF(SUM(CP_Price),0) END
measures.description: Share of discounts vs. price for contract products (SUM(CP_Discount) / SUM(CP_Price)). NULL when total price is zero.

measures.name: Sum Advertisement Price (Adv)
measures.description: Sum of Adv_Price for advertisement rows in the view.

measures.name: Sum Advertisement Discount (Adv)
measures.description: Total Adv_Discount across rows (monetary discounts applied to advertisements).

measures.name: Advertisement Discount % (Adv)
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(Adv_Price) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(Adv_Discount) / NULLIF(SUM(Adv_Price),0) END
measures.description: Share of discounts vs. price for advertisements (SUM(Adv_Discount) / SUM(Adv_Price)). NULL when total adv price is zero.

measures.name: Max Cav SeqNo
measures.description: Maximum Cav_SeqNo for an attribute value (useful to understand ordering/priority when present).

measures.name: Average Cav SeqNo
measures.description: Average Cav_SeqNo (ordinal position) across attribute values.

measures.name: TotalPrice
measures.description: Sum of listed product prices on the contract product rows

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Sum of all discounts applied to contract products (manual + rule based)

measures.name: TotalNetPrice
measures.description: Net value after discounts for contract products

measures.name: AveragePrice
measures.description: Average listed price per contract product row

measures.name: ProductRowCount
measures.description: Number of contract-product rows in the selected scope

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products that are subscription-based

measures.name: RenewableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewable = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products flagged as renewable

measures.name: RenewedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CP_IsRenewed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract products that have been renewed

measures.name: ExchangeSaleCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PM_IsExchangeSale = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contract product rows where the payment method indicates an exchange sale

measures.name: DiscountRate
measures.description: Discounts as a share of gross price (total discounts divided by total price). NULL when total price is zero.

measures.name: AgentRowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (agents) in the view.

measures.name: UniqueAgentIDs
measures.description: Number of distinct agent identifiers. Should match AgentRowCount when ID is unique.

measures.name: UniqueUserNameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct UserName values (unique login names).

measures.name: NameCompletenessPct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN FirstName IS NOT NULL AND LastName IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of agents that have both FirstName and LastName populated.

measures.name: FirstNameMissingPct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN FirstName IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of agents with a missing (NULL) FirstName.

measures.name: LastNameMissingPct
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN LastName IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of agents with a missing (NULL) LastName.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view (each row is a phone + business point + usage mapping).

measures.name: DistinctPhoneCount
measures.description: Number of unique phone numbers observed in the view.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of unique business points (by code) referenced in the view.

measures.name: DistinctPhoneBusinessPairs
measures.description: Number of unique phone+business point combinations.

measures.name: DuplicatePhoneRows
measures.description: Number of rows that represent additional occurrences of the same phone number (rows beyond the first occurrence of each phone).

measures.name: DuplicatePhoneRate
measures.description: Share of rows that are duplicates of phone numbers (proportion of rows beyond unique-phone count).

measures.name: DistinctUsages
measures.description: Number of distinct phone usage categories (e.g., Business, Billing).

measures.name: NullOrEmptyPhoneCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PhoneNumber IS NULL OR LTRIM(RTRIM(PhoneNumber)) = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows with missing or empty phone number values.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points in the listing (unique BusinessPointID).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the view. For this view this typically equals BusinessPointCount since BusinessPointID is the grain.

measures.name: HasInternetMasterHeadingCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN HasInternetMasterHeading = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings that have an Internet Master Heading flag.

measures.name: PctWithInternetMasterHeading
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN HasInternetMasterHeading = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percent of listings that have an Internet Master Heading (0-100%).

measures.name: RegularCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRegular = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings marked as regular.

measures.name: PctRegular
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsRegular = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percent of listings marked as regular (0-100%).

measures.name: ProspectCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsProspect = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings flagged as prospects.

measures.name: PctProspect
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsProspect = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percent of listings flagged as prospects (0-100%).

measures.name: SignedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LastSignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of listings with a non-null LastSignedDate (indicates a recorded signing date).

measures.name: PctSigned
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN LastSignedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percent of listings that have a recorded LastSignedDate (0-100%).

measures.name: AvgDaysSinceLastSigned
measures.description: Average number of days since the LastSignedDate. Null LastSignedDate values are excluded from the calculation. Uses GETDATE() as reference.

measures.name: DistinctBrandCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BrandName values present in the view (includes blanks/nulls as distinct where applicable).

measures.name: DistinctMainActivityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct main activities represented by MainActivityID.

measures.name: SolvencyKnownCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of listings with a known solvency classification (SolvencyID not null).

measures.name: PctSolvencyKnown
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN SolvencyID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Percent of listings with a known solvency classification (0-100%).

measures.name: Section Count
measures.description: Number of distinct sections (one row per section ID). Use this as the primary measure for the fact (grain = ID).

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of rows returned by the view. Useful for monitoring differences between COUNT(*) and COUNT(ID) if ID can be null.

measures.name: Distinct Root Count
measures.description: Number of distinct rootIDs present in the result set (samples indicate a single Internet root).

foreign_keys.description: Inferred relationship: rootID likely references the Internet root entity. Confirm against source/DWH FK definitions.
Inferred relationship: ID likely references a Section or VersionSection dimension. Confirm against source/DWH FK definitions.

default_filters.note: Sample data shows rootID = 580 (Internet root). Remove or adjust this filter for full-scope analysis.

measures.name: IdentificationCount
measures.description: Number of identification rows (one row per ID).

measures.name: UniqueBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points referenced in the view.

measures.name: Phone1PresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone1)) <> '' AND LOWER(Phone1) <> 'none' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with a populated primary phone (Phone1).

measures.name: MobilePhonePresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN MobilePhone IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(MobilePhone)) <> '' AND LOWER(MobilePhone) <> 'none' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with a populated mobile phone.

measures.name: BillingEmailPresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BillingEmailAddress IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(BillingEmailAddress)) <> '' AND LOWER(BillingEmailAddress) <> 'none' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records with a billing email address.

measures.name: PercentWithMobilePhone
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN MobilePhone IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(MobilePhone)) <> '' AND LOWER(MobilePhone) <> 'none' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percentage of identification records that include a mobile phone.

measures.name: PercentWithBillingEmail
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BillingEmailAddress IS NOT NULL AND RTRIM(LTRIM(BillingEmailAddress)) <> '' AND LOWER(BillingEmailAddress) <> 'none' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percentage of identification records that include a billing email address.

measures.name: DistinctCityCount
measures.description: Number of distinct cities represented in the view.

measures.name: IncompleteContactInfoCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ( (Phone1 IS NULL OR RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone1)) = '' OR LOWER(Phone1) = 'none') AND (MobilePhone IS NULL OR RTRIM(LTRIM(MobilePhone)) = '' OR LOWER(MobilePhone) = 'none') AND (Email1 IS NULL OR RTRIM(LTRIM(Email1)) = '' OR LOWER(Email1) = 'none') ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records missing primary phone, mobile phone and primary email simultaneously (likely incomplete contact info).

measures.name: PercentIncompleteContactInfo
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ( (Phone1 IS NULL OR RTRIM(LTRIM(Phone1)) = '' OR LOWER(Phone1) = 'none') AND (MobilePhone IS NULL OR RTRIM(LTRIM(MobilePhone)) = '' OR LOWER(MobilePhone) = 'none') AND (Email1 IS NULL OR RTRIM(LTRIM(Email1)) = '' OR LOWER(Email1) = 'none') ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID),0)
measures.description: Percentage of records with no primary phone, mobile phone and primary email (likely need data enrichment).

foreign_keys.description: Links this identification row to the business point dimension (one business point may have multiple identifications historically).
Normalized reference to taxpayer/company by tax identifier (inferred).
Reference to a city dimension (inferred by textual city name).
Reference to a legal form dimension (inferred by textual legal form).
Reference to a tax office dimension (inferred by textual tax office name).
Possible link to a contract dimension (column currently fully null in this view; relationship is optional/inferred).

default_filters.description: Exclude rows with no business point name (there are none in current sample but this ensures meaningful labels in UI).

display.notes: This view is identification / master-data oriented. Most measures are counts or data-quality metrics (presence of contact information). Several FK relationships are inferred from textual keys and should be validated before enabling join-heavy dashboards.

measures.name: Case Count
measures.description: Number of case rows in the view (one row per CaseID).

measures.name: Distinct Salesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct ContractSalesman values (excludes NULL). Includes placeholder values such as 'None' as distinct values.

measures.name: Assigned Salesman Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractSalesman IS NOT NULL AND ContractSalesman NOT IN ('None','') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of cases that have a non-empty, non-'None' ContractSalesman value (i.e., appear to be assigned to a salesman).

measures.name: Unassigned Salesman Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractSalesman IS NULL OR ContractSalesman IN ('None','') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of cases where ContractSalesman is NULL or has a placeholder value such as 'None' (i.e., appear unassigned).

measures.name: Assigned Salesman Percentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN ContractSalesman IS NOT NULL AND ContractSalesman NOT IN ('None','') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of cases that are assigned to a ContractSalesman (excludes NULL/'None' values).

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows (market item records)

measures.name: Distinct Tasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented

measures.name: Distinct Target Group Items
measures.description: Number of distinct target group items

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (numeric customer code)

measures.name: Sum Offer Amount
measures.description: Total offered amount (sum of OfferAmount). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: Average Offer Amount
measures.description: Average offered amount per record (ignores null OfferAmount values)

measures.name: Minimum Offer Amount
measures.description: Minimum non-null OfferAmount in the group

measures.name: Maximum Offer Amount
measures.description: Maximum OfferAmount in the group

measures.name: Released Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 OR IsReleased = 'True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where the offer/campaign is marked as released

measures.name: BP Identity Confirmed Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BPIdentityConfirmed = 1 OR BPIdentityConfirmed = 'True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of business points where identity was confirmed

measures.name: Offers With Appointment
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN AppointmentDateTime IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that have a scheduled appointment date/time

measures.name: Sum LossPrintedNew
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew values (integer indicator/score captured in the source)

measures.name: Count IsRed
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records flagged as 'red' (IsRed = 1)

measures.name: CRM Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CRM = 1 OR CRM = 'True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows that are marked as CRM = true

measures.name: Last Task Created On
measures.description: Most recent TaskCreatedOn timestamp in the group

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the view for the selected grain and filters.

measures.name: Related Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsRelated = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows marked as related (IsRelated = true).

measures.name: Related Percentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsRelated = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*),0) END
measures.description: Share of rows that are related (Related Count / Row Count).

measures.name: Distinct Progress Points
measures.description: Number of distinct progress points present in the current selection.

measures.name: Estimated Date Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EstimatedDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows with a non-null EstimatedDate.

measures.name: First Estimated Date
measures.description: Earliest EstimatedDate in the selection (NULL if no estimated dates).

measures.name: Last Estimated Date
measures.description: Latest EstimatedDate in the selection (NULL if no estimated dates).

measures.name: Actual Date Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActualDate IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows with a non-null ActualDate.

measures.name: First Actual Date
measures.description: Earliest ActualDate in the selection (NULL if no actual dates).

measures.name: Last Actual Date
measures.description: Latest ActualDate in the selection (NULL if no actual dates).

measures.name: Comments Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Comments IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Comments)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where Comments is present (non-empty).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (versions) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctVersionNames
measures.description: Number of distinct version names.

measures.name: HasVersionYearCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN VersionYear IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where VersionYear is populated.

measures.name: HasVersionYearPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN VersionYear IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of rows that have a VersionYear value.

measures.name: MaxVersionYear
measures.description: Maximum (most recent) VersionYear present in the data.

measures.name: CirculationSum
measures.description: Total circulation (sum of Circulation). Note: this column has a very high null rate in the current sample.

measures.name: CirculationAvg
measures.description: Average circulation per row (ignores NULLs). High null rate may make this null or misleading.

measures.name: PagesAvg
measures.description: Average page count for rows where Pages is populated. Pages is currently mostly null in the sample.

measures.name: PaperWeightAvg
measures.description: Average paper weight. Unit is not specified in the source metadata; values are currently null in the sample.

measures.name: IsActualPagesCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActualPages = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where IsActualPages is true.

measures.name: StepsCompletedTotal
measures.expression: SUM((CASE WHEN IR1 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN IR2 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN IR3 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN IR4 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN IR5 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN IR6 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN IR7 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN IR8 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))
measures.description: Total number of completed step flags (IR1..IR8) aggregated across all rows. Useful to measure overall completion volume.

measures.name: Step1CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IR1 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where step IR1 is marked completed.

measures.name: Step2CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IR2 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where step IR2 is marked completed.

measures.name: Step3CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IR3 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where step IR3 is marked completed.

measures.name: Step4CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IR4 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where step IR4 is marked completed.

measures.name: Step5CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IR5 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where step IR5 is marked completed.

measures.name: Step6CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IR6 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where step IR6 is marked completed.

measures.name: Step7CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IR7 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where step IR7 is marked completed.

measures.name: Step8CompletedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IR8 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows where step IR8 is marked completed.

display.notes: Name and VersionYear are the most useful dimensions for slicing the measures. Many numeric columns (Circulation, Pages, PaperWeight) have extremely high null rates in the sample; treat their aggregates accordingly.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the view (one row per BusinessPointID expected).

measures.name: TotalPhoneNumbers
measures.expression: SUM((CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone3 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone4 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone5 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))
measures.description: Total count of non-null phone values across all phone columns. Aggregates the presence of Phone1..Phone5; useful for understanding phone coverage and volume.

measures.name: AvgPhonesPerBusinessPoint
measures.expression: AVG((CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone3 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone4 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone5 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))
measures.description: Average number of phone entries (Phone1..Phone5) per business point. Useful to see how many numbers are typically stored per location.

measures.name: PercentWithSecondaryPhone
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points that have a populated Phone2 (i.e., at least one secondary phone). If Phone1 is primary, this measures adoption of a second contact number.

measures.name: ApproxDistinctPhoneValues
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT Phone1) + COUNT(DISTINCT Phone2) + COUNT(DISTINCT Phone3) + COUNT(DISTINCT Phone4) + COUNT(DISTINCT Phone5)
measures.description: Approximate count of distinct phone strings across columns. This is an over-estimate if the same phone appears in multiple columns; for exact distinct phone values unpivoting to a single phone column is recommended.

measures.name: Row Count
measures.description: Total number of attribute value rows in the view.

measures.name: Distinct Point Count
measures.description: Number of distinct points (PointID) that have one or more attribute values.

measures.name: Distinct Group Count
measures.description: Number of distinct attribute groups (GroupName) present in the dataset.

measures.name: Distinct Label Count
measures.description: Number of distinct labels (LabelName) present in the dataset.

measures.name: Non-empty Value Row Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [value] IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM([value])) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the value column is not null or empty.

measures.name: Total Parsed Value Items
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [value] IS NULL OR LTRIM(RTRIM([value])) = '' THEN 0 ELSE (LEN([value]) - LEN(REPLACE([value], ',', '')) + 1) END)
measures.description: Estimated total number of individual items contained in the value column across all rows. The value column often contains comma-separated items; this measure counts items by counting commas + 1 per non-empty value.

measures.name: Rows With Multiple Values
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [value] LIKE '%,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows whose value field contains more than one comma-separated item.

measures.name: Share of Rows With Multiple Values
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [value] LIKE '%,%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of rows that contain multiple comma-separated items in the value column.

measures.name: AttributeValueCount
measures.description: Total number of attribute value rows (rows in this view) for the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct points that have at least one attribute value in the current filter context.

measures.name: FilledValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Value)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attribute value rows where Value is not empty (not NULL and not just whitespace).

measures.name: EmptyValueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NULL OR LTRIM(RTRIM(Value)) = '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of attribute value rows where Value is NULL or empty/whitespace.

measures.name: PercentageFilled
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN Value IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Value)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of attribute value rows that are filled (not null/empty) out of total attribute rows in the current filter context.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct business points represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: ActiveBusinessPoints
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActiveFlag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points marked as active.

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActiveFlag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID), 0)
measures.description: Share of business points that are active (ActiveFlag = true) within the current filter context.

measures.name: POIBusinessPoints
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPOI = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points designated as points of interest (POI).

measures.name: POIRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPOI = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID), 0)
measures.description: Share of business points that are POIs within the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerSources
measures.description: Number of distinct customer source identifiers observed across the selected business points.

measures.name: DistinctActivityClassifiers
measures.description: Number of distinct activity classifier nodes associated with the selected business points.

measures.name: BusinessPointNameCompleteness
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BusinessPointName IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BusinessPointName)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT BusinessPointID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of business points that have a non-empty BusinessPointName value.

measures.name: TotalBusinessPoints
measures.description: Total number of business points (BP) in the selected grain (sums BPcount across rows).

measures.name: AverageBusinessPointsPerArea
measures.description: Average number of business points per prefecture/area (mean of BPcount).

measures.name: MaxBusinessPoints
measures.description: Maximum BPcount observed for a single area (highest number of business points in an area).

measures.name: MinBusinessPoints
measures.description: Minimum BPcount observed for a single area (lowest number of business points in an area).

measures.name: AreaCount
measures.description: Number of distinct areas/prefectures represented in the result set.

measures.name: ActiveAreaCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActiveFlag = 1 OR ActiveFlag = 'True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of areas marked as active.

measures.name: InactiveAreaCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActiveFlag = 0 OR ActiveFlag = 'False' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of areas marked as inactive.

measures.name: PercentActiveAreas
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActiveFlag = 1 OR ActiveFlag = 'True' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of areas that are active (ActiveAreaCount / total areas).

foreign_keys.description: Suggested link to dimensional table containing area/prefecture metadata (name, region, hierarchy).

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of task rows in the view (row count).

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks (distinct TaskID).

measures.name: ContractedTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that are associated with a contract (ContractID not null).

measures.name: UncontractedTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks with no associated contract (ContractID is null).

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts referenced by tasks.

measures.name: ContractFinalPrice_Sum
measures.description: Sum of ContractFinalPrice for tasks. Note: source shows high null rate; verify completeness before use.

measures.name: ContractFinalPrice_Avg
measures.description: Average ContractFinalPrice for tasks (ignores nulls).

measures.name: ContractFinalPrice_Min
measures.description: Minimum ContractFinalPrice observed for tasks.

measures.name: ContractFinalPrice_Max
measures.description: Maximum ContractFinalPrice observed for tasks.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of production tasks (row count). Use this as the primary activity measure for the view.

measures.name: DistinctMasterCaseCount
measures.description: Number of distinct master cases referenced by tasks. MasterCaseID has no nulls in sampling and is a common breakdown.

measures.name: TasksWithContractCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that are associated with a contract (ContractID is not null). Note: ContractID has a high null rate in sampling.

measures.name: TasksWithContractPct
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(TaskID), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of tasks that have an associated contract. Calculated as TasksWithContractCount / TaskCount. Expect many nulls in source ContractID.

measures.name: ContractFinalPriceSum
measures.description: Total final price across contracts linked to tasks. Source column ContractFinalPrice identified as currency (USD) but sampling shows high null rate; treat results accordingly.

measures.name: ContractFinalPriceAvg
measures.description: Average final contract price for tasks with a value. Useful for monitoring contract size when ContractFinalPrice is populated.

measures.name: TasksWithPaymentMethodWayCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PaymentMethodWay IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks where PaymentMethodWay is present. In current sampling PaymentMethodWay appears entirely null; this measure is included for completeness if data becomes available.

measures.name: TasksWithTicketCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TicketID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that are linked to a ticket (TicketID not null). TicketID is sparse in the sample but useful for ticket-related breakdowns when present.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of task records (one per TaskID)

measures.name: DistinctCases
measures.description: Number of distinct cases referenced by the tasks

measures.name: DistinctSenders
measures.description: Number of distinct senders who created tasks (nullable values ignored)

measures.name: DistinctActualOwners
measures.description: Number of distinct actual owners assigned to tasks

measures.name: OpenTasks
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskStatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks with status = 0 (interpreted as 'open' in source). If TaskStatus semantics change, adjust expression accordingly.

measures.name: TasksPerCaseAvg
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT TaskCaseID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(COUNT(TaskID) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(DISTINCT TaskCaseID) END
measures.description: Average number of tasks per case (TaskCount / DistinctCases). Null when no cases present.

measures.name: FirstCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest TaskCreatedOn in the current result set

measures.name: LastCreatedOn
measures.description: Latest TaskCreatedOn in the current result set

display.notes: Default foreign-key references are inferred from column names and should be validated against target model. The TaskStatus and TaskCaseState columns appear constant in the sample; if they carry business meaning in production, consider adding explicit measures or status dimension joins.

measures.name: FailureRows
measures.description: Total number of failure rows (events) in the slice.

measures.name: DistinctContracts
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that experienced at least one failure.

measures.name: DistinctBatches
measures.description: Number of distinct batches present in the query result.

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct error types observed.

measures.name: IsInvalidCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsInvalid = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows marked as invalid (IsInvalid = 1).

measures.name: Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged with Invalid_Target_CP_ProductID.

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged with Invalid_Target_ADV_ProductID.

measures.name: Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged with Invalid_Target_ADV_HeadingID.

measures.name: Invalid_NotPassedQA_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Invalid_NotPassedQA = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that did not pass QA checks.

measures.name: Adv_ProductIsComposite_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Adv_ProductIsComposite = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the advertised product is marked as composite.

measures.name: IsCustomerRed_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsCustomerRed = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged as 'customer red' (high priority/important customers).

measures.name: SubChannelUserExists_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SubChannelUserExists = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where a sub-channel user exists.

measures.name: DistinctSalesmen
measures.description: Number of distinct salesmen associated with the failure rows.

measures.name: CampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the view (distinct CampaignID). Use this to get the true campaign-level count when the view can contain multiple rows per campaign.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows returned by the view. Useful for diagnostics when the view has one-to-many rows per campaign.

measures.name: ReleasedRows
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of rows flagged as released (IsReleased = true).

measures.name: ReleasedRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of rows that are released. Calculated as released rows divided by total rows.

measures.name: AverageCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days, computed as the difference between CampaignClosedOn and CampaignStartedOn.

measures.name: DistinctSupervisors
measures.description: Number of distinct supervisors assigned to campaigns in the view.

measures.name: AverageTaskEditorState
measures.description: Average of the TaskEditorState code. TaskEditorState is an integer-coded status; averaging is useful for monitoring shifts in the distribution of that code over time (interpret with caution).

measures.name: MaxVersion
measures.description: Maximum version value present in the data. Useful to detect which version(s) of campaign records are included.

measures.name: DistinctCampaignStates
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign state codes present in the result set.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (placements/records) in the view  useful as the basic activity/placement count.

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of unique campaigns represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctUnits
measures.description: Number of unique inventory units or placements represented.

measures.name: DistinctOwners
measures.description: Number of distinct owners/responsible persons associated with the rows.

measures.name: TotalActiveDays
measures.description: Total number of active days across all rows (sum of EndDate - StartDate).

measures.name: AverageDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days between StartDate and EndDate per row.

measures.name: TotalActiveMonths
measures.description: Total duration in months across all rows (sum of month difference). Useful for medium-term planning views.

display.notes: Use StartDate (and EndDate) for time-based rollups (year/month). If a true row-unique key exists upstream, replace the grain with that key to allow distinct-count aggregations at the row level.

measures.name: CampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns in the current result set.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (campaign  unit combinations) returned.

measures.name: DistinctUnitCount
measures.description: Number of distinct units participating in the campaigns.

measures.name: TotalCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Sum of campaign durations in days. Rows with missing start or end dates contribute 0 days.

measures.name: AvgCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days across rows. NULL durations treated as 0 for averaging.

measures.name: MinStartDate
measures.description: Earliest StartDate among the rows in the result set.

measures.name: MaxEndDate
measures.description: Latest EndDate among the rows in the result set.

measures.name: ActiveCampaigns
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EndDate IS NULL OR EndDate >= GETDATE() THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of campaigns that are currently active (no EndDate or EndDate in the future). Uses system date (GETDATE()).

measures.name: ScheduledDaysRemaining
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EndDate IS NOT NULL AND EndDate >= GETDATE() THEN DATEDIFF(day, GETDATE(), EndDate) ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Total remaining scheduled days across campaigns that have an EndDate in the future. Uses system date (GETDATE()).

measures.name: Rows
measures.description: Number of rows (records) in the view. Use for total record counts.

measures.name: TotalTargetValue
measures.description: Sum of TargetValue across rows. Represents the aggregated target monetary value for the campaign/market analysis. Currency assumed USD  confirm with source system if different.

measures.name: AverageTargetValue
measures.description: Average TargetValue per record. Useful to compare typical target amounts across segments.

measures.name: NonNullTargetValueCount
measures.description: Count of rows with a non-null TargetValue.

measures.name: TotalTargetCount
measures.description: Sum of TargetCount across all rows. TargetCount appears to be 1 for each row in current sample; this yields the number of target records when that semantics holds.

measures.name: UniqueCampaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns represented in the result set.

measures.name: AverageCustomerRating
measures.description: Average customer rating. Rating scale and meaning should be validated with business (e.g., 1-5).

display.notes: TargetValue treated as currency (USD) by default  please confirm currency mapping. ID is used as the row grain; if this view is non-unique at ID, revise grain accordingly.

measures.name: LosingRecords
measures.description: Total number of losing records (row count) in the view for the selected breakdown.

measures.name: DistinctCampaigns
measures.description: Number of unique campaigns represented in the current filter context.

measures.name: TotalLosingDays
measures.description: Sum of campaign durations in days (inclusive) across all rows in the current filter context.

measures.name: AverageLosingDays
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days (inclusive) for the current filter context.

foreign_keys.description: References the campaign dimension.
References the employee/owner dimension (ActualOwner).
References the unit/location dimension.
Link to date dimension using the start date (map StartDate to DimDate.DateKey/Date as appropriate).
Link to date dimension using the end date (map EndDate to DimDate.DateKey/Date as appropriate).

display.notes: Because the source view has no declared primary key, the declared grain uses all identifying columns (CampaignID, UnitID, ActualOwnerID, StartDate, EndDate). If a dedicated surrogate key or different uniqueness exists, adjust the grain accordingly.

measures.name: PendingAssignmentCount
measures.description: Number of pending market-analysis assignments (rows) in the current filter context

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Count of distinct campaigns represented in the result set

measures.name: DistinctUnitCount
measures.description: Count of distinct units associated with pending assignments

measures.name: TotalScheduledDays
measures.description: Total scheduled duration in days across all pending assignments (sum of each assignment's EndDate - StartDate)

measures.name: AverageScheduledDays
measures.description: Average scheduled duration in days per pending assignment

measures.name: EarliestStartDate
measures.description: Earliest StartDate among the pending assignments in the filtered set

measures.name: LatestEndDate
measures.description: Latest EndDate among the pending assignments in the filtered set

foreign_keys.description: References the campaign dimension or master table
References the employee (owner) responsible for the assignment
References the organizational or sales unit for the assignment

default_filters.description: Include assignments that have started on or before today (active or historical)
Include assignments whose EndDate is today or in the future (pending/active)

measures.name: TotalTargetValue
measures.description: Total target monetary amount for the campaign-owner-unit period (sum of TargetValue). Currency not specified in source.

measures.name: AverageTargetValue
measures.description: Average target monetary amount per row (average of TargetValue). Useful to see typical target size.

measures.name: TotalTargetCount
measures.description: Total number of target items across the period (sum of TargetCount).

measures.name: AverageTargetCount
measures.description: Average number of target items per row (average of TargetCount).

measures.name: TargetValuePerTarget
measures.expression: CASE WHEN SUM(TargetCount) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(TargetValue) / SUM(TargetCount) END
measures.description: Average monetary value per target item for the aggregated selection (TotalTargetValue divided by TotalTargetCount). Returns NULL when TotalTargetCount is zero.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (market-item tasks) in the view

measures.name: OfferAmountTotal
measures.description: Total monetary value of offers associated with the market items (sum of OfferAmount). Nulls are ignored.

measures.name: OfferAmountAverage
measures.description: Average offer amount for records with a non-null OfferAmount.

measures.name: OfferAmountCount
measures.description: Count of records that have a non-null OfferAmount (number of offers with an amount).

measures.name: LossPrintedTotal
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew. Interpreted as the total count/instances of printed-loss events recorded across rows.

measures.name: LossPrintedMax
measures.description: Maximum value of LossPrintedNew observed for a single row (useful to detect highest printed-loss indicator).

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.description: Number of rows marked as subscription (sum of IsSubscription). Note: this field appears to be constant in the sample data.

measures.name: UDFValue01Total
measures.description: Sum of user-defined numeric field UDFValue01. This is a custom metric (often zero in sample data).

measures.name: UDFValue02Total
measures.description: Sum of user-defined numeric field UDFValue02. This is a custom metric (often zero in sample data).

measures.name: OfferAmount
measures.description: Total offered amount for tasks (sum of OfferAmount). Nulls ignored.

measures.name: AverageOfferAmount
measures.description: Average offer amount per task (ignores null OfferAmount values).

measures.name: MinOfferAmount
measures.description: Minimum offer amount observed (ignores nulls).

measures.name: MaxOfferAmount
measures.description: Maximum offer amount observed (ignores nulls).

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Total number of task rows (activities) in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks (useful if the view can contain duplicates).

measures.name: LossPrintedCount
measures.description: Count of records where a loss was printed (LossPrintedNew aggregated).

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.description: Number of subscription flags (IsSubscription). Value appears constant in sample but included for completeness.

measures.name: UDFValue01_Sum
measures.description: Sum of user-defined numeric field UDFValue01 (included for completeness).

measures.name: UDFValue02_Sum
measures.description: Sum of user-defined numeric field UDFValue02 (included for completeness).

measures.name: OfferPresentCount
measures.description: Number of rows with a non-null OfferAmount.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (target-group item assignments).

measures.name: DistinctTasks
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks in the current filter context.

measures.name: DistinctTargetGroupItems
measures.description: Number of distinct target group items.

measures.name: DistinctPotentialOwners
measures.description: Number of distinct potential owners (nullable).

measures.name: SumOfferAmount
measures.description: Total offer amount (sum of OfferAmount). Nulls are ignored; OfferAmount has many nulls in the source.

measures.name: AvgOfferAmount
measures.description: Average offer amount for rows with a non-null OfferAmount.

measures.name: OfferAmountCount
measures.description: Number of rows where OfferAmount is not null.

measures.name: SumLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew values. This column appears to be a small integer flag/code; SUM gives total of that code across rows.

measures.name: DistinctLossPrintedNewValues
measures.description: Number of distinct values present in LossPrintedNew within the current context.

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.description: Number of subscriptions (sum of IsSubscription). Source sample shows IsSubscription = 0 for all rows, but measure included for completeness.

measures.name: UDFValue01Sum
measures.description: Sum of user-defined numeric value UDFValue01 (numeric scale 1).

measures.name: UDFValue02Sum
measures.description: Sum of user-defined numeric value UDFValue02 (numeric scale 1).

measures.name: EarliestTaskCreatedOn
measures.description: Earliest task creation time in the current context.

measures.name: LatestAppointmentDateTime
measures.description: Latest appointment date/time among rows in the current context (nulls ignored).

measures.name: Task Count
measures.description: Number of task records (one row per task instance in the view).

measures.name: Unique Case Count
measures.description: Number of distinct business cases (CaseID) represented by the tasks in the result set.

measures.name: Completed Task Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn).

measures.name: Completion Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of tasks that are completed (CompletedOn populated) as a percentage of total tasks. NULL when there are no tasks.

measures.name: Potential Owner Assigned Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PotentialOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks with a potential owner assigned (PotentialOwnerID populated).

measures.name: Actual Owner Assigned Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ActualOwnerID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks with an actual owner assigned (ActualOwnerID populated).

measures.name: Average Task Age (days)
measures.description: Average age in days for tasks. For completed tasks uses CreatedOn->CompletedOn, for open tasks uses CreatedOn->current date. Useful for SLA and backlog analysis.

measures.name: Distinct Dynamic Codes
measures.description: Number of distinct DynamicCode values represented (useful to understand variety of referenced market items/products).

measures.name: Status = 0 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks whose Status = 0. Note: in the sampled data Status is constant; this measure is included for completeness and to support analyses when other statuses exist.

measures.name: SubStatus = 0 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN SubStatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks whose SubStatus = 0. Included for parity and filtering purposes; may be constant in this view's sample.

measures.name: EditorState = 0 Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN EditorState = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks whose EditorState = 0. Included to support scenarios where editor state indicates processing stage.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (assignments of potential owners to tasks) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks represented in the selected scope.

measures.name: DistinctPotentialOwnerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct potential owners referenced by the rows in the view.

measures.name: ReleasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the task/assignment is marked as released (IsReleased = true).

measures.name: ReleasedRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of rows marked released. Calculated as average of the IsReleased flag (1/0).

measures.name: DistinctCampaignCount
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns present in the current filter context.

measures.name: ActiveCampaignCount_assumingState3IsActive
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN CampaignState = 3 THEN CampaignID END)
measures.description: Number of distinct campaigns in CampaignState = 3. Note: the view sample shows state = 3 frequently; confirm domain meaning (e.g., 'active') before relying on this as an 'active' count.

measures.name: AvgCampaignDurationDays
measures.description: Average campaign duration in days computed from StartDate and EndDate. Null dates are ignored by DATEDIFF semantics.

measures.name: AvgTaskEditorState
measures.description: Numeric average of TaskEditorState codes. Useful as a high-level indicator of editor-state distribution; treat as ordinal/categorical in detailed analysis.

notes: TaskID + PotentialOwnerID is chosen as the grain to represent individual potential-owner assignments. If TaskID is globally unique in your source, TaskID alone could also serve as the grain.

CampaignState and TaskEditorState are coded integers in the source. They are provided here as a numeric aggregate (AvgTaskEditorState) and as a sample-driven 'ActiveCampaignCount' using state = 3; confirm code meanings with domain owners before using as business semantics.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks (rows at grain TaskID)

measures.name: AppointmentCount
measures.description: Number of records with a scheduled AppointmentDateTime (non-null AppointmentDateTime)

measures.name: OfferAmountTotal
measures.description: Total offer amount associated with activities (sum of OfferAmount). Nulls are ignored by the aggregation.

measures.name: OfferAmountAverage
measures.description: Average of OfferAmount across records with non-null OfferAmount.

measures.name: OfferAmountRecords
measures.description: Count of records where OfferAmount is provided (non-null). Useful to calculate fill-rate.

measures.name: LossPrintedTotal
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew values. Interprets LossPrintedNew as a numeric indicator (0/1/2).

measures.name: ReleasedTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsReleased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks marked as released.

measures.name: CRMTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CRM = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks flagged as CRM.

measures.name: SubscriptionCount
measures.description: Sum of IsSubscription values. Note: this column appears constant in samples and may have very low variance.

measures.name: UDFValue01Total
measures.description: Sum of UDFValue01 (user-defined numeric field). Often used for custom numeric flags/metrics.

measures.name: UDFValue02Total
measures.description: Sum of UDFValue02 (user-defined numeric field).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPointID values represented in the filtered context.

measures.name: ActiveCampaignTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CampaignState = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that belong to campaigns in state 3 (interpreted as 'active' or specific campaign state). Adjust filter/value as needed for your business meanings of CampaignState.

measures.name: TaskEditorStateZeroCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN TaskEditorState = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks where TaskEditorState = 0. Use similar expressions to create counts for other TaskEditorState values if required.

measures.name: AssignmentCount
measures.description: Number of assignment records (rows) in the dataset.

measures.name: UniqueTaskCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tasks that have stakeholder assignments.

measures.name: UniqueStakeHolderCount
measures.description: Number of distinct stakeholder users present in the view.

foreign_keys.description: References the task (work item) record.
References the stakeholder user assigned to the task.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Total number of tasks (rows) in the view.

measures.name: OpenTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that are not completed (CompletedOn is NULL).

measures.name: CompletedTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a completion timestamp (CompletedOn is not NULL). Note: sampled data shows CompletedOn is currently empty for the population.

measures.name: DistinctCaseCount
measures.description: Number of distinct cases referenced by the tasks (distinct CaseID). Useful to understand case coverage.

measures.name: DistinctOwnerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct actual owners assigned to tasks.

measures.name: AverageTaskAgeDays
measures.description: Average age of tasks in days, measured from CreatedOn to CompletedOn; for open tasks uses current UTC date.

measures.name: TasksWithDynamicCodeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DynamicCode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks that have a DynamicCode value populated.

measures.name: TasksWithOutcomeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of tasks with a non-null Outcome. Note: sampled data shows Outcome mostly null.

display.notes: Common analysis patterns: TaskCount broken down by TaskTypeID, ActualOwnerFullName or EditorState. Use OpenTaskCount / CompletedTaskCount to measure backlog and throughput. CreatedOn is provided as the primary date for time-series; CompletedOn when populated can be used for completion time analysis.

measures.name: TaskCount
measures.description: Number of task rows (one row per task).

measures.name: DistinctCaseCount
measures.description: Number of distinct cases represented in the tasks set.

measures.name: OpenTaskCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CompletedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that are not completed (CompletedOn is NULL).

measures.name: TasksPerCase_Avg
measures.description: Average number of tasks per case (TaskCount divided by distinct case count).

measures.name: TasksWithOutcomeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Outcome IS NOT NULL AND Outcome <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of tasks that have a non-empty outcome.

display.notes: CreatedOn can be used as the date dimension for time-series breakdowns. Many outcome/owner/completion fields are null for the provided sample; measures that depend on them will reflect that.

measures.name: TaskCount

measures.name: UnassignedTaskCount

measures.description: Count of tasks that do not have an assigned actual owner.

measures.description: Number of tasks that are linked to a contract with a known ContractDate.

measures.description: Sum of the Flag values across the selected tasks. Flag semantics are unknown  interpret carefully.

measures.name: AvgFlag
measures.description: Average of Flag values. Useful for trend or quality checks when Flag represents a numeric score or tier.

measures.description: Average age in days of tasks measured from TaskCreatedOn to today. Null TaskCreatedOn rows are excluded.

measures.name: Banner Count
measures.description: Number of banner records (counts rows by IL07_CT05_Id).

measures.name: Distinct Campaigns
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign identifiers present in the result set.

measures.name: Active Banners Today
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CT23_StartDate <= GETDATE() AND (CT05_ExpirationDate IS NULL OR CT05_ExpirationDate >= GETDATE()) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of banners that are active as of the current date (start <= today and not expired).

measures.name: Total Planned Duration Days
measures.description: Sum of planned durations (in days) between CT23_StartDate and CT05_ExpirationDate for rows where both dates exist.

measures.name: Average Planned Duration Days
measures.description: Average planned duration (in days) for banners with both start and expiration dates.

measures.name: Banners With Script Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN oxScript IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(oxScript)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banners that include a non-empty oxScript value.

measures.name: Distinct Brands
measures.description: Number of distinct brand names present (CM22_BrandName).

measures.name: BannerRecordCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (banner records) in the buffer view.

measures.name: DistinctBannerCount
measures.description: Count of distinct banner instances (unique IL07_CT05_Id).

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Count of distinct contracts represented in the buffer.

measures.name: TotalPotentialActiveDays
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CT23_StartDate IS NOT NULL AND CT05_ExpirationDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, CT23_StartDate, CT05_ExpirationDate) ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Sum of potential active days per banner calculated as difference between start date and expiration date. Null start/expiration are counted as 0 days.

measures.name: HasScriptCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(oxScript,'')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of banner records that include a non-empty oxScript value.

measures.name: PctWithScript
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN LEN(ISNULL(oxScript,'')) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Percentage of banner records that include a non-empty oxScript.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Total number of business points (rows) in this view.

measures.name: ActiveBusinessPointCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [ .  ] IS NOT NULL AND [ .  ] >= CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND ([.  ] IS NULL OR [.  ] > CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points considered active today (end-of-display date not passed and no interruption date or interruption in the future). Uses server current date (GETDATE()).

measures.name: LastContractNumber
measures.description: Maximum value of the stored contract number/identifier field (as provided in the source). Useful as a reference for the most recent contract id recorded.

measures.name: MobilePhoneAvailableCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [] IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM([])) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points with a non-empty mobile phone value.

measures.name: SignedWithinLast365DaysCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN [ . ] IS NOT NULL AND [ . ] >= DATEADD(day, -365, CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE)) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of business points with a signature date within the last 365 days (relative to server date).

measures.name: CampaignCount
measures.description: Total number of campaign rows (count of distinct campaign IDs)

measures.name: ActiveCampaignCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of campaigns that are still open (no ClosedOn date)

measures.name: ClosedCampaignCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of campaigns that have been closed (ClosedOn is not null)

measures.name: AverageDurationDays
measures.description: Average duration in days from StartedOn to ClosedOn. For open campaigns (ClosedOn is NULL) the current date is used.

measures.name: MaxDurationDays
measures.description: Maximum campaign duration in days (uses current date for open campaigns)

measures.name: OpenRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of campaigns that are currently open (ActiveCampaignCount / CampaignCount)

measures.name: Complaint Rows
measures.description: Number of rows returned by the view. Each row typically represents a complaint record or a comment on a complaint.

measures.name: Distinct Tickets
measures.description: Number of unique complaint tickets in the dataset.

measures.name: Comments Count
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN CommentText IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(CommentText)) <> '' THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Number of non-empty comment entries associated with complaints.

measures.name: Comments per Ticket (avg)
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN CommentText IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(CommentText)) <> '' THEN 1 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT Ticket), 0)
measures.description: Average number of comments per distinct ticket.

measures.name: Resolved Tickets
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN Result IN ('Resolved','Closed','Solved') THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Count of tickets whose Result indicates a resolved/closed outcome. (Adjust IN list to match actual result codes used.)

measures.name: Resolution Rate
measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN Result IN ('Resolved','Closed','Solved') THEN 1 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT Ticket), 0)
measures.description: Share of distinct tickets that are marked resolved/closed. (Numerator uses common resolved values; adjust as needed.)

measures.name: Earliest Complaint Created On
measures.description: Earliest creation timestamp among the rows in the current filter context.

measures.name: Latest Complaint Created On
measures.description: Most recent creation timestamp among the rows in the current filter context.

measures.name: FileCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (file records) in the view.

measures.name: UniqueFiles
measures.description: Count of unique files based on the combination of Path and filename (handles identical filenames in different paths).

measures.name: DistinctPaths
measures.description: Number of distinct Path values present in the view.

measures.name: DistinctDpsCodes
measures.description: Number of distinct DpsCode values associated with files. Nulls are excluded from this count.

measures.name: FilesMissingDpsCode
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DpsCode IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of file rows that do not have an associated DpsCode (useful for data quality checks).

measures.name: CustomerRows
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view (useful for ETL validation).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers represented in the view.

measures.name: PrimaryEmailPresentCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BillingEmail IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingEmail)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of customers that have a non-empty primary billing email.

measures.name: PrimaryEmailPresentPct
measures.expression: 100.0 * AVG(CASE WHEN BillingEmail IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingEmail)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Percentage of customers that have a non-empty primary billing email.

measures.name: TotalEmailCount
measures.expression: SUM((CASE WHEN BillingEmail IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingEmail)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Email2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Email2)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))
measures.description: Total count of email addresses across all customers (counts primary and secondary email occurrences).

measures.name: TotalPhoneCount
measures.expression: SUM((CASE WHEN BillingPhone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingPhone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + (CASE WHEN Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))
measures.description: Total count of phone numbers across all customers (counts billing phone, phone2 and phone3 occurrences).

measures.name: CustomersWithAnyPhoneCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN (BillingPhone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingPhone)) <> '') OR (Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '') OR (Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of customers who have at least one non-empty phone number in any of the three phone fields.

measures.name: CustomersWithAnyPhonePct
measures.expression: 100.0 * AVG(CASE WHEN (BillingPhone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(BillingPhone)) <> '') OR (Phone2 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)) <> '') OR (Phone3 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)) <> '') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Percentage of customers who have at least one non-empty phone number.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view.

measures.name: ScoredRowCount
measures.description: Number of scored records (id is not null).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers that have at least one score row.

measures.name: PercentDistinctCustomersPerRow
measures.description: Distinct customers divided by total rows  useful to see one-to-many density (guarded against division by zero).

measures.name: AverageScoreNumeric
measures.description: Average of score interpreted as a numeric value. Returns meaningful results only when score values are numeric or convertible to numeric.

measures.name: MaxScoreNumeric
measures.description: Maximum of score interpreted as a numeric value when convertible; NULL for non-numeric scores.

foreign_keys.description: Links the scored row to the master customer record (Customer.CustomerCode).
Optional lookup into a score dimension/lookup table (if implemented) describing score categories or labels.

display.notes: The 'score' column is stored as text. Numeric aggregations use TRY_CAST and will return NULL for non-numeric score values. If you have a canonical score dimension, link it to DimCustomerScore.Score for richer slicing.
