measures.expression: COUNT(CASE WHEN ClassificationType IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that include a ClassificationType value. Useful to validate presence of classification type across rows.

foreign_keys.notes: Inferred: CustomerCode likely refers to the customer master key.
Inferred: ClassificationId likely references a classification/segment lookup.
Inferred: CustomerCategoryId likely references a category lookup table.

measures.name: Document Count
measures.description: Total number of document records. ID is the row-level identifier for each document.

measures.name: Distinct Contract Count
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts that have one or more documents in this view.

measures.name: Distinct Customer Count
measures.description: Number of distinct main customers referenced by the documents.

measures.name: Default Document Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDefault = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of documents flagged as default (IsDefault = 1). Treats IsDefault as a boolean indicator.

measures.name: Default Document Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsDefault = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of documents that are marked as default (Default Document Count / Document Count).

measures.name: Max Order Number
measures.description: Maximum OrderNum value among documents. Useful for identifying the highest sequence or priority value.

measures.name: Min Order Number
measures.description: Minimum OrderNum value among documents.

measures.name: Average Order Number
measures.description: Average of OrderNum values. Null OrderNum rows are ignored in the average.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the YPSToCollectionMainClassification view.

measures.name: ClassificationCount
measures.description: Number of classification records (count of non-null ID values).

measures.name: DistinctDescriptionCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Description values in the view.

measures.name: AverageDescriptionLength
measures.description: Average length (in characters) of the Description field.

measures.name: ChannelCount
measures.description: Total number of advertisement channels (rows) in the view.

measures.name: ActiveChannelCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of channels marked as active (IsActive = true).

measures.name: ActiveChannelShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of channels that are active (ActiveChannelCount / ChannelCount).

measures.name: DistinctMediumCount
measures.description: Number of distinct medium codes referenced by channels.

measures.name: ActiveDistinctMediumCount
measures.expression: COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN MediumIsActive = 1 THEN MediumCode END)
measures.description: Number of distinct medium codes where the medium is marked as active.

measures.name: MostRecentModification
measures.description: The most recent modification date across all channels.

measures.name: BankCount
measures.description: Total number of bank records (rows) in the view

measures.name: DistinctBankNames
measures.description: Number of unique bank descriptions/names

measures.name: ActiveBankCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of banks marked as active

measures.name: ActiveBankShare
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of banks that are active (ActiveBankCount / BankCount)

measures.name: Campaign Count
measures.description: Total number of campaign records (rows) in the view.

measures.name: Distinct Campaign Codes
measures.description: Number of distinct campaign codes present in the data.

measures.name: Open Campaigns
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of campaigns that do not have a Close date (still open).

measures.name: Total Campaign Duration (days)
measures.description: Sum of durations in days for campaigns with both StartedOn and ClosedOn. Campaigns without ClosedOn are excluded from the duration calculation.

measures.name: Average Campaign Duration (days)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, StartedOn, ClosedOn) END)
measures.description: Average duration in days between StartedOn and ClosedOn for campaigns that have a ClosedOn value.

measures.name: Average Time to Close (months)
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN ClosedOn IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, StartedOn, ClosedOn) / 30.0 END)
measures.description: Average time to close expressed in approximate months (days/30) for campaigns that have been closed.

measures.name: Channel Count
measures.description: Total number of channel rows (by ID)

measures.name: Active Channel Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of channels marked active

measures.name: Active Channel Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ID), 0)
measures.description: Share of channels that are active (Active Channel Count / Channel Count)

measures.name: Distinct Description Count
measures.description: Number of distinct channel descriptions

measures.name: PersonRowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view. Use COUNT(DISTINCT Code) to count unique person codes if Code is not guaranteed unique.

measures.name: DistinctPersonCount
measures.description: Number of distinct person codes (unique people) present in the view.

measures.name: ActivePersonCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of persons marked as active (IsActive = true).

measures.name: InactivePersonCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of persons marked as inactive (IsActive = false).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(Code), 0)
measures.description: Share of persons that are active (ActivePersonCount / PersonRowCount). Returns 0 when there are no rows.

measures.name: LastModifiedDate_Max
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate for any person in the dataset.

measures.name: LastModifiedDate_Min
measures.description: Earliest LastModifiedDate for any person in the dataset.

measures.name: Company Count
measures.description: Number of distinct companies represented in the view.

measures.name: Active Company Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of companies where the IsActive flag is true.

measures.name: Inactive Company Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of companies where the IsActive flag is false.

measures.name: Active Company Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT ID) END
measures.description: Proportion of companies that are active (Active Company Count / Company Count).

measures.name: Distinct Codes
measures.description: Number of distinct company codes present in the view.

measures.name: Contract Count
measures.description: Number of contracts (row count). At the ContractId grain this will be 1 per row; useful when aggregated by BusinessPointCode or other dimensions.

measures.name: Distinct Business Point Count
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPointCode values represented in the selected context. Useful to understand how many business points hold contracts in the filter scope.

measures.name: Average Contracts per Business Point
measures.description: Average number of contracts per business point in the current filter context. NULL when there are zero business points in scope.

measures.name: TotalNetAmount
measures.description: Sum of NetAmount for the contract line (net revenue excluding taxes/fees).

measures.name: TotalAdvancedPayment
measures.description: Total advanced payments received for the contract line. Field may be zero for most rows.

measures.name: TotalAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of any altered/adjusted amounts applied to the contract line (largely null in the source).

measures.name: TotalInvoiceQuantity
measures.description: Total number of invoices associated with the contract line.

measures.name: AverageInstallmentsPerInvoice
measures.description: Average number of installments billed per invoice for this contract line.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Number of rows (contract-advertisement line occurrences) in the current scope.

measures.name: DistinctAdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of distinct advertisements represented.

measures.name: DistinctContractCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contracts represented.

measures.name: Contract Count
measures.description: Number of contracts (rows) in the view. ContractID is the row grain.

measures.name: Distinct Customer Count
measures.description: Number of distinct customer billing codes associated with contracts. Null/empty billing codes are excluded by COUNT(DISTINCT).

measures.name: Contracts With Related Ticket
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RelatedTicket IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts that reference a related ticket (RelatedTicket is not null).

measures.name: Percent Contracts With Related Ticket
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN RelatedTicket IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ContractID), 0)
measures.description: Share of contracts that have a related ticket. Calculated as contracts with RelatedTicket divided by total contracts.

measures.name: Sum Contract Altered Amount
measures.description: Total of ContractAlteredAmount for contracts. NULL values are ignored in the sum. Currency assumed to be EUR based on source locale; validate against source system if necessary.

measures.name: Average Contract Altered Amount
measures.description: Average ContractAlteredAmount across contracts where a value is present. Currency assumed EUR; verify with source.

measures.name: Contracts With Altered Amount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractAlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of contracts that have a non-null ContractAlteredAmount (indicates an alteration was recorded).

measures.name: Percent Contracts Altered
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN ContractAlteredAmount IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(ContractID), 0)
measures.description: Share of contracts that include a ContractAlteredAmount value.

measures.name: CreditCardTypeCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (card types) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCreditCardTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct credit card types (distinct Id values).

measures.name: ActiveCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of credit card types that are marked as active.

measures.name: ActivePercentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(Id) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(Id) END
measures.description: Percentage of credit card types that are active (ActiveCount / TotalCount).

measures.name: AddressCount
measures.description: Number of address records (rows) in the result set. Aggregates by the fact grain.

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (MainCustomerCode) represented by the addresses.

measures.name: DistinctContactCount
measures.description: Number of distinct contacts (ContactCode) associated with addresses.

measures.name: AddressesWithInvoiceEmail
measures.description: Count of address rows that have a non-null InvoiceEmail (SQL COUNT ignores NULLs).

measures.name: AddressesWithAnyEmail
measures.description: Count of address rows that have a non-null Email field.

measures.name: AddressesWithPhone2
measures.description: Count of address rows where a secondary phone (Phone2) is present (non-null).

measures.name: PercentWithInvoiceEmail
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 100.0 * COUNT(InvoiceEmail) / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Percentage of address rows that include an InvoiceEmail.

measures.name: MostRecentModification
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate across the aggregated rows.

measures.name: AverageDaysSinceModified
measures.description: Average number of days since each address was last modified (uses server current date).

measures.name: CategoryRecordCount
measures.description: Total number of rows returned from the view (useful for QA and quick counts).

measures.name: DistinctCategoryIDCount
measures.description: Number of distinct category IDs. For a well-formed lookup this should equal the number of rows.

measures.name: CustomerRowCount
measures.description: Number of rows in the view (one row per customer record per company).

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers identified by Code.

measures.name: ActiveCustomers
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers flagged as active (IsActive = 1).

measures.name: InactiveCustomers
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers flagged as inactive (IsActive = 0).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(1), 0)
measures.description: Share of active customers (ActiveCustomers / total rows).

measures.name: NoTaxVatCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN NoTaxVat = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers flagged as having no VAT (NoTaxVat = 1).

measures.name: KEPYOEnabledCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN KEPYOStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers with KEPYOStatus = 1. (KEPYOStatus appears to be a binary flag in the sample.)

measures.name: VATRegisteredCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN VATStatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of customers with VATStatus = 1. (In the sample VATStatus is constant = 1.)

measures.name: DistinctBrandCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BrandName values represented.

measures.name: DistinctOccupationCount
measures.description: Number of distinct Occupation values represented.

measures.name: LastModified_Max
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate for the records in the current filter context.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows in the view.

measures.name: DistinctIDCount
measures.description: Number of distinct ID values (should equal row count when ID is unique).

measures.name: ParsedScoreCount
measures.description: Count of rows where a numeric score could be parsed from the Name field (non-null parsed score).

measures.name: AverageScore
measures.description: Average of numeric scores parsed from the Name text (extracts text to the right of the first '-' and casts to float).

measures.name: MinimumScore
measures.description: Minimum numeric score parsed from the Name field.

measures.name: MaximumScore
measures.description: Maximum numeric score parsed from the Name field.

measures.name: ScoreStandardDeviation
measures.description: Sample standard deviation of numeric scores parsed from the Name field.

display.notes: The measures that operate on numeric scores parse the numeric portion after the first '-' in the Name column. Apply the default filter above to focus on rows where a hyphen-delimited score is present.

facts.name: YPS to EBS GL Sequence Code

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Total number of mapping records in the view (row count).

measures.name: Distinct Code Count
measures.description: Number of distinct GL sequence codes present in the dataset.

measures.name: Active Record Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as active (IsActive = true).

measures.name: Inactive Record Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records marked as inactive (IsActive = false).

measures.name: Active Rate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(1) END
measures.description: Proportion of records that are active (Active Record Count / Record Count).

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of status rows.

measures.name: ActiveRowCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of status rows that are marked active.

measures.name: ActivePercentage
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of rows that are active (ActiveRowCount / RowCount).

measures.name: DistinctCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct status codes represented in the set.

measures.name: MinCode
measures.description: Minimum numeric status code.

measures.name: MaxCode
measures.description: Maximum numeric status code.

measures.name: ErrorRecordCount
measures.description: Total number of error log records (rows)

measures.name: DistinctCustomerCount
measures.description: Number of distinct customers (by Cust_Code) appearing in the log

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct error types observed in the result set

measures.name: NetAmount_Sum
measures.description: Sum of contract/line net amounts (CL_NetAmount). NULLs are ignored.

measures.name: NetAmount_Average
measures.description: Average CL_NetAmount per record (ignores NULLs)

measures.name: AdvancedPayment_Sum
measures.description: Total advanced payments for contract lines (CL_AdvancedPayment). Assumed same currency as CL_NetAmount.

measures.name: InvoiceQuantity_Sum
measures.description: Total invoice quantity across contract lines (CL_InvoiceQuantity)

measures.name: InstallmentsPerInvoice_Average
measures.description: Average number of installments per invoice (CL_InstallmentsPerInvoice)

measures.name: InstallmentSequence_Max
measures.description: Maximum installment sequence number observed for a contract line (CL_InstallmentSequence)

measures.name: ActiveCustomerCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Cust_IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where the customer is marked active (Cust_IsActive = true)

measures.name: NoTaxVatCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Cust_NoTaxVat = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where customer has NoTaxVat flag set

measures.name: Pct_Cust_KEPYO_Active
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN Cust_KEPYOStatus = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of rows where Cust_KEPYOStatus = 1 (interpreted as a boolean flag). Expressed as a percentage.

measures.name: Customers_With_VATStatus_2_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Cust_VATStatus = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where customer VAT status equals 2

display.notes: ErrorDate is the natural time dimension for temporal analysis. Many customer/contract columns are sparse  use Cust_Code and C_ContractID/CL_ContractID to join to richer dimensions.

measures.name: ErrorCount
measures.description: Total number of post-check error records (row count). Use this to measure volume of errors.

measures.name: DistinctErrorTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct error type codes observed in the view.

measures.name: EntitiesAffected
measures.description: Count of distinct EntityData values (distinct entities) that have at least one error. Note: EntityData is XML and can be null; XML representation may need normalization if you need a stable entity identifier.

measures.name: AvgErrorsPerEntity
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(DISTINCT EntityData) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) / COUNT(DISTINCT EntityData) END
measures.description: Average number of error records per distinct entity. Null when there are no entities in the current filter context.

measures.name: Receipt Count
measures.description: Number of receipts (rows) in the collection.

measures.name: Total Amount
measures.description: Total collected amount across receipts. Stored in USD according to column hints.

measures.name: Average Amount
measures.description: Average collected amount per receipt.

measures.name: Minimum Amount
measures.description: Smallest collected amount observed for a receipt.

measures.name: Maximum Amount
measures.description: Largest collected amount observed for a receipt.

measures.name: Payoff Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of receipts marked as payoffs (IsPayoff = 1).

measures.name: Payoff Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsPayoff = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(SystemReceiptID), 0)
measures.description: Share of receipts that are payoffs (Payoff Count / Receipt Count). Returns NULL when there are no receipts.

measures.name: Distinct Customers
measures.description: Number of distinct customers observed in the dataset using CustomerCode.

measures.name: Average Credit Card Installments
measures.description: Average number of credit card installments for receipts where installments are present. Note: credit card-related fields are mostly null in the sample.

measures.name: Credit Card Transactions Count
measures.description: Count of receipts that have a (non-null) credit card transaction identifier.

measures.name: Bank Deposit Count
measures.description: Count of receipts with a bank deposit number (non-null).

measures.name: Completed Receipts Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 'COMPLETED' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(SystemReceiptID), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of receipts whose Status is 'COMPLETED'.

measures.name: SalesPersonCount
measures.description: Total number of salesperson records (row count) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctFullNameCount
measures.description: Number of distinct FullName values; useful to detect duplicates or multiple codes per person.

measures.name: ActiveSalesPersonCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of salespeople currently marked active (IsActive = 1).

measures.name: InactiveSalesPersonCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of salespeople currently marked inactive (IsActive = 0).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Proportion of salespeople that are active (ActiveSalesPersonCount / SalesPersonCount).

measures.name: LastModifiedTimestamp
measures.description: Most recent LastModifiedDate across all salesperson rows (useful for freshness checks).

measures.name: Service Count
measures.description: Total number of service records (one row per service ID).

measures.name: Distinct Codes
measures.description: Number of distinct service codes.

measures.name: Active Services
measures.description: Count of services marked as active (IsActive = 1). Assumes IsActive is 0/1.

measures.name: Active Rate
measures.description: Share of services that are active (Active Services / Service Count).

measures.name: Bundle Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of services that are marked as bundles (IsBundle = 1).

measures.name: Bundle Rate
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN IsBundle = 1 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END)
measures.description: Share of services that are bundles (Bundle Count / Service Count).

measures.name: Days Since Last Modification (avg)
measures.description: Average number of days since the last modification of the service. Null LastModificationDate rows are excluded.

measures.name: OfficeCount
measures.description: Total number of rows (tax office mappings) in the view.

measures.name: DistinctCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct tax office codes represented in the view.

measures.name: ActiveOfficeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of offices/rows that are marked as active.

measures.name: InactiveOfficeCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of offices/rows that are marked as inactive.

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE 1.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Percentage of rows that are active (ActiveOfficeCount / OfficeCount). Returns 0 when there are no rows.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of mapping rows in this view (useful for audits and joins).

measures.name: DistinctCodeCount
measures.description: Number of distinct VAT code values observed in the mapping.

measures.name: ActiveRecords
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows flagged as active (IsActive = True).

measures.name: ActiveRate
measures.expression: 100.0 * SUM(CASE WHEN IsActive = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Share of mapping rows that are active, expressed as a percentage of total rows.

measures.name: PaymentMethodCount
measures.description: Total number of payment method records (row count).

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethodTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method types observed.

measures.name: TotalInstallments
measures.description: Sum of installment counts across all payment records.

measures.name: AverageInstallments
measures.description: Average number of installments per payment method record.

measures.name: AverageInterval
measures.description: Average interval value. Interval appears to be a small categorical/integer field (interpret accordingly).

measures.name: TotalNumberOfInvoices
measures.description: Total number of invoices associated with these payment method records.

measures.name: AverageInvoicesPerPayment
measures.description: Average number of invoices per payment method record.

measures.name: CountCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Count of records with a non-null CreditCardInstallments value (note: this column is mostly null).

measures.name: TotalCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Sum of credit-card-specific installment counts. Sparse  many values are null; interpret with caution.

measures.name: ReceiptsRecorded
measures.description: Count of non-null SystemReceiptNumber values (indicates records that have a system receipt associated).

measures.name: AdvancedPolicyAmountTotal
measures.description: Total AdvancedPolicyAmount. Column metadata indicates currency USD but the sample shows all values are null in this extract; this measure may be zero if the column is empty.

measures.name: AdvancedPolicyAmountCount
measures.description: Number of records with a non-null AdvancedPolicyAmount.

measures.name: PaymentsWithUserSpecifiedMonth
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN UserSpecifiedPaymentMonth = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payments where a user explicitly specified the payment month flag.

measures.name: PreInvoiceCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PreInvoice = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of payment records that are marked as pre-invoice.

measures.name: RowCount
measures.description: Total number of rows/backup records in the result set.

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPoints
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPointID values represented in the table.

measures.name: DistinctClassifierNodes
measures.description: Number of distinct classifier node identifiers referenced by the backup records.

measures.name: DistinctClassifierIDs
measures.description: Number of distinct classifier identifiers (expected to be small; sample shows a single classifier).

measures.name: MappedDimensionKeysCount
measures.description: Count of distinct DMKey values (dimension mapping keys). Sample data shows these are null; measure helps detect mapped vs. unmapped records.

measures.name: PercentMappedToDimension
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(DISTINCT DMKey) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) END
measures.description: Share of backup records that have a non-null/unique DMKey (indicates records mapped to a downstream dimension).

Suggested FK reference to classifier node/dimension.

measures.name: Record Count
measures.description: Total number of rows in the backup classification table. Each row represents one classification assignment record.

measures.name: Distinct Business Points
measures.description: Number of unique business points referenced in the selected scope.

measures.name: Distinct Classifier Nodes
measures.description: Number of unique classifier nodes referenced by these backup records.

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of business point rows in this extract (one row per BusinessPointID).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Distinct count of BusinessPointID (should match BusinessPointCount when BusinessPointID is unique).

measures.name: TotalSubscriptionValue
measures.description: Total subscription value. Source did not include a currency hint for this column; EUR is assumed based on locality  verify with source owners. Sample values are all 0.000.

measures.name: TotalPreprintedAdValue
measures.description: Total value of preprinted advertisements. Source provided a currency hint of USD.

measures.name: TotalLossPrintedNew
measures.description: Total count of newly printed losses (LossPrintedNew).

measures.name: RecordsWithSecondaryPhone1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone1 IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone1)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of records that include a secondary phone number (Phone1). Useful to understand availability of additional contact numbers.

measures.name: PhoneM11_TrueCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN PhoneM11 = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows where PhoneM11 flag is true. (PhoneM11 is a bit flag present on every row.)

measures.name: BusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of rows / business points in this snapshot (one row per BusinessPointID in this extract).

measures.name: DistinctBusinessPointCount
measures.description: Number of distinct BusinessPointID values (should match BusinessPointCount when BusinessPointID is the grain).

measures.name: SubscriptionValueSum
measures.description: Total subscription value from the extract. Column stored at 3 decimal places; currency not provided in metadata (verify source currency).

measures.name: Y01ADTotalPreprintedValueSum
measures.description: Total preprinted advertisement value (Y01ADTotalPreprintedValue). Source metadata indicates USD.

measures.name: LossPrintedNewSum
measures.description: Sum of LossPrintedNew (numeric indicator of new printed losses).

measures.name: PrimaryPhoneExistsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Phone IS NOT NULL AND LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone)) <> '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that have a non-empty primary Phone value.

measures.name: HasAnyAlternativePhoneCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN COALESCE(NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone1)),''), NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone2)),''), NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone3)),''), NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone4)),''), NULLIF(LTRIM(RTRIM(Phone5)),'')) IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of rows that have at least one alternative phone (Phone1..Phone5) populated.
